complaint_text: I ordered a high-end laptop for my work, but the package delivered today was empty. I am shocked and disgusted by this level of service. I demand an immediate investigation and a replacement. This is a huge amount of money for me.
translated_text_en: I ordered a high-end laptop for my work, but the package delivered today was empty. I am shocked and disgusted by this level of service. I demand an immediate investigation and a replacement. This is a huge amount of money for me.
reply: We are extremely sorry for this experience. We have initiated an internal investigation immediately.

complaint_text: My flight to London was cancelled by the airline, but your portal is refusing to give me a full refund. I have been on hold for over forty minutes. This is completely unacceptable and I will take legal action if this isn't resolved. I need my 65000 rupees back now.
translated_text_en: My flight to London was cancelled by the airline, but your portal is refusing to give me a full refund. I have been on hold for over forty minutes. This is completely unacceptable and I will take legal action if this isn't resolved. I need my 65000 rupees back now.
reply: We apologize for the wait. Your refund is being processed as per the airline's policy.

complaint_text: The refrigerator I purchased last week stopped working within two days. All my food items have spoiled and the house smells terrible. I have raised three tickets but no technician has visited yet. Your after-sales service is pathetic.
translated_text_en: The refrigerator I purchased last week stopped working within two days. All my food items have spoiled and the house smells terrible. I have raised three tickets but no technician has visited yet. Your after-sales service is pathetic.
reply: We regret the inconvenience caused. A senior technician has been assigned for a visit today.

complaint_text: I was charged for a premium subscription that I never signed up for. This is a fraudulent deduction from my saved credit card. I want this subscription cancelled and the money refunded immediately. I never even opened your app this month.
translated_text_en: I was charged for a premium subscription that I never signed up for. This is a fraudulent deduction from my saved credit card. I want this subscription cancelled and the money refunded immediately. I never even opened your app this month.
reply: We have cancelled the subscription and initiated a refund for the unauthorized charge.

complaint_text: The delivery partner was extremely rude and used foul language when I asked him to wait for two minutes. He threw the package near the gate and drove off. The item inside is now broken. I expect a formal apology and a replacement.
translated_text_en: The delivery partner was extremely rude and used foul language when I asked him to wait for two minutes. He threw the package near the gate and drove off. The item inside is now broken. I expect a formal apology and a replacement.
reply: We are deeply sorry for the behavior. We are taking strict action against the delivery partner.

complaint_text: I received a used and dirty pair of shoes instead of a brand new one. There are even scuff marks on the soles. How can you ship such products to your loyal customers? This is a total waste of my time and energy.
translated_text_en: I received a used and dirty pair of shoes instead of a brand new one. There are even scuff marks on the soles. How can you ship such products to your loyal customers? This is a total waste of my time and energy.
reply: This is not the experience we want for you. Please share photos and we will replace them.

complaint_text: Your mobile application keeps crashing every time I try to complete the KYC process. I have tried clearing the cache and reinstalling but nothing works. My account is blocked and I cannot access my funds. This is very urgent for me.
translated_text_en: Your mobile application keeps crashing every time I try to complete the KYC process. I have tried clearing the cache and reinstalling but nothing works. My account is blocked and I cannot access my funds. This is very urgent for me.
reply: Our technical team is looking into the app bug. Please try the website in the meantime.

complaint_text: I have not received the 5000 rupees cashback promised during the festive sale. I made the purchase specifically for this offer. Your support team keeps telling me to wait for 48 hours but it has been two weeks. Don't mislead your customers.
translated_text_en: I have not received the 5000 rupees cashback promised during the festive sale. I made the purchase specifically for this offer. Your support team keeps telling me to wait for 48 hours but it has been two weeks. Don't mislead your customers.
reply: We apologize for the delay in credit. The cashback will reflect in your wallet by tomorrow.

complaint_text: मैंने 10 दिन पहले एक कूलर ऑर्डर किया था जो अभी तक डिलीवर नहीं हुआ है। कस्टमर केयर वाले रोज़ नया बहाना बनाते हैं। धूप में मेरी हालत खराब हो रही है और आप लोग बस इंतज़ार करने को कह रहे हैं। ये बिल्कुल गलत है।
translated_text_en: I ordered a cooler 10 days ago which has not been delivered yet. Customer care makes a new excuse every day. I am suffering in the heat and you people are just asking me to wait. This is absolutely wrong.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफी। आपका कूलर आज शाम तक पहुंच जाएगा।

complaint_text: मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से 2000 रुपये कट गए लेकिन बिजली का बिल अभी भी पेंडिंग दिखा रहा है। न तो पैसे वापस आए और न ही बिल भरा गया। अगर मेरी बिजली कट गई तो इसका ज़िम्मेदार कौन होगा? कृपया इसे तुरंत ठीक करें।
translated_text_en: 2000 rupees were deducted from my bank account but the electricity bill is still showing as pending. Neither did the money come back nor was the bill paid. Who will be responsible if my power is cut? Please fix this immediately.
reply: कृपया परेशान न हों। हम आपके भुगतान को अपडेट कर रहे हैं, इसमें थोड़ा समय लग सकता है।

complaint_text: जो साड़ी मैंने मंगवाई थी उसका कपड़ा बहुत ही घटिया क्वालिटी का है। फोटो में ये सिल्क दिख रही थी पर असल में ये प्लास्टिक जैसा कुछ है। मुझे अपना पूरा पैसा वापस चाहिए। आपके स्टोर से ये मेरी आखिरी शॉपिंग है।
translated_text_en: The saree I ordered has very poor quality fabric. It looked like silk in the photo but in reality, it is something like plastic. I want my full money back. This is my last shopping from your store.
reply: हमें दुख है कि आपको साड़ी पसंद नहीं आई। हम आपका रिटर्न और रिफंड स्वीकार कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: गैस सिलेंडर बुक किए हुए एक हफ्ता हो गया है पर अभी तक कोई नहीं आया। फोन करने पर एजेंसी वाले जवाब नहीं देते। घर में खाना नहीं बन पा रहा है। क्या आप लोग अपनी सर्विस सुधारेंगे?
translated_text_en: It has been a week since I booked the gas cylinder but no one has come yet. The agency doesn't answer when called. Food cannot be cooked at home. Will you people improve your service?
reply: अत्यधिक बुकिंग के कारण देरी हुई है। आपका सिलेंडर कल सुबह तक डिलीवर हो जाएगा।

complaint_text: मेरे क्रेडिट कार्ड का बिल गलत आया है। मैंने पिछले महीने कार्ड इस्तेमाल ही नहीं किया फिर भी 500 रुपये लेट फीस लगा दी गई है। ये सरासर लूट है। इसे तुरंत हटाइए वरना मैं अपना कार्ड बंद करवा दूँगा।
translated_text_en: My credit card bill is incorrect. I didn't even use the card last month yet 500 rupees late fee has been charged. This is sheer robbery. Remove it immediately or I will close my card.
reply: हम शुल्कों की समीक्षा कर रहे हैं। यदि यह गलत पाया गया तो इसे वापस कर दिया जाएगा।

complaint_text: आपका डिलीवरी बॉय मेरे घर का रास्ता नहीं ढूंढ पा रहा और ऊपर से मुझ पर ही चिल्ला रहा है। उसने कहा कि वो पार्सल वापस ले जाएगा। ये कैसा व्यवहार है? मुझे मेरा सामान आज ही चाहिए।
translated_text_en: Your delivery boy cannot find my house and on top of that, he is shouting at me. He said he would take the parcel back. What kind of behavior is this? I want my items today.
reply: हम आपसे संपर्क करने की कोशिश कर रहे हैं। डिलीवरी आज ही सुनिश्चित की जाएगी।

complaint_text: Yaar mera refund kyun nahi aa raha? Ek mahina ho gaya watch return kiye huye. Support pe koi sahi jawab nahi deta. Aisa lag raha hai ki mera paisa phas gaya hai. Please ise jaldi process kar do.
translated_text_en: Why is my refund not coming? It has been a month since I returned the watch. No one on support gives a proper answer. It feels like my money is stuck. Please process it quickly.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Refund request technical error ki wajah se stuck thi, ab process ho gayi hai.

complaint_text: Mera internet kal se band hai aur main work from home nahi kar paa raha hoon. Customer care calls pick nahi kar raha. Mera manager mujh par gussa ho raha hai. Isko aaj hi theek karo varna connection kaat do.
translated_text_en: My internet has been down since yesterday and I am unable to work from home. Customer care is not picking up calls. My manager is getting angry with me. Fix it today or cancel the connection.
reply: Humein khed hai. Aapke area mein maintenance chal raha hai, shaam tak theek ho jayega.

complaint_text: App pe dikha raha hai ki order deliver ho gaya par mujhe kuch nahi mila. Security guard ke paas bhi koi parcel nahi hai. Kisko de diya mera samaan? Ye bahut badi laparwahi hai.
translated_text_en: The app shows that the order has been delivered but I haven't received anything. Even the security guard doesn't have any parcel. Who did you give my items to? This is a huge negligence.
reply: Hum delivery executive se confirm kar rahe hain. Agar galat deliver hua toh hum naya bhejenge.

complaint_text: Bhai maine red color ki t-shirt mangayi thi par aapne green bhej di. Size bhi XL ki jagah small hai. Itni badi company hokar aisi mistakes kaise kar sakte ho? Please mera exchange request approve karo.
translated_text_en: I ordered a red color t-shirt but you sent green. The size is also small instead of XL. How can such a big company make these mistakes? Please approve my exchange request.
reply: Maafi chahte hain mix-up ke liye. Exchange request approve ho gayi hai, kal pickup hoga.

complaint_text: Mera UPI payment fail ho gaya shop pe aur mere 5000 rupees cut gaye. Shopkeeper keh raha hai ki usko nahi mile. Main wahan aadhe ghante se khada hoon. Please jaldi refund karo.
translated_text_en: My UPI payment failed at the shop and my 5000 rupees were deducted. The shopkeeper says he didn't get it. I have been standing there for half an hour. Please refund quickly.
reply: Don't worry, bank 3-5 din mein auto-refund kar dega agar shopkeeper ko nahi mila.

complaint_text: Mera parcel Noida mein hi stuck hai pichle 4 din se. Delivery date nikal gayi par status update nahi ho raha. Agar kal tak nahi aaya toh mujhe cancel karna padega. Bahut slow service hai.
translated_text_en: My parcel is stuck in Noida for the last 4 days. The delivery date has passed but the status is not updating. If it doesn't arrive by tomorrow, I will have to cancel. Very slow service.
reply: Logistics delay ki wajah se deri hui hai. Parcel kal tak aapke sheher pahunch jayega.

complaint_text: I have been waiting for my refund for over 15 days now. The customer service executive promised it would be credited in 3 days. This is highly unprofessional and I am losing my patience.
translated_text_en: I have been waiting for my refund for over 15 days now. The customer service executive promised it would be credited in 3 days. This is highly unprofessional and I am losing my patience.
reply: We apologize for the delay. We are looking into your refund status immediately.

complaint_text: मैंने कल शाम को एक ट्रांजेक्शन किया था लेकिन पैसे कट गए और टिकट बुक नहीं हुई। कृपया मेरे पैसे वापस करें या टिकट कन्फर्म करें। मुझे आज रात यात्रा करनी है।
translated_text_en: I made a transaction yesterday evening but the money was deducted and the ticket was not booked. Please refund my money or confirm the ticket. I have to travel tonight.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका रिफंड प्रोसेस कर दिया गया है और 2 दिन में मिल जाएगा।

complaint_text: Bhai mera order abhi tak deliver nahi hua hai. App pe dikha raha hai ki delivery boy nikal gaya par koi call nahi aaya. Ye bahut ghatiya service hai.
translated_text_en: Brother, my order has not been delivered yet. The app shows the delivery boy has left but I received no call. This is very poor service.
reply: We are sorry. We are contacting the delivery partner to expedite your order.

complaint_text: The laptop I received yesterday has a cracked screen and the box was already tampered with. I want a replacement immediately or I will file a consumer court complaint. This is unacceptable for a premium product.
translated_text_en: The laptop I received yesterday has a cracked screen and the box was already tampered with. I want a replacement immediately or I will file a consumer court complaint. This is unacceptable for a premium product.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the damage. A replacement request has been raised.

complaint_text: मैंने जो साड़ी मंगवाई थी उसका रंग बिलकुल अलग है। वेबसाइट पर फोटो में यह लाल दिख रही थी पर मुझे भूरे रंग की मिली है। मुझे इसे तुरंत बदलना है।
translated_text_en: The saree I ordered is of a completely different color. It looked red in the photo on the website but I received a brown one. I want to exchange it immediately.
reply: रंग में अंतर के लिए माफी चाहते हैं। आप ऐप के माध्यम से एक्सचेंज रिक्वेस्ट डाल सकते हैं।

complaint_text: Mera internet kal se band hai aur customer care pe koi utha nahi raha. Work from home kaise karunga agar net nahi chalega? Jaldi fix karo yaar.
translated_text_en: My internet is down since yesterday and nobody is picking up at customer care. How will I work from home if the net is not working? Please fix it quickly.
reply: We understand your urgency. A technician has been assigned to your area.

complaint_text: I was charged twice for the same UPI transaction at the grocery store. The first one failed but money was deducted, and then I had to pay again. Please revert the first deduction of 950 rupees.
translated_text_en: I was charged twice for the same UPI transaction at the grocery store. The first one failed but money was deducted, and then I had to pay again. Please revert the first deduction of 950 rupees.
reply: The failed transaction amount will be automatically reversed to your bank in 5-7 days.

complaint_text: आपका ऐप बार-बार क्रैश हो रहा है जब मैं पेमेंट करने की कोशिश करता हूँ। मैंने अपना फोन रीस्टार्ट किया लेकिन फिर भी वही समस्या है। बहुत परेशानी हो रही है।
translated_text_en: Your app keeps crashing whenever I try to make a payment. I restarted my phone but the same problem persists. It is causing a lot of trouble.
reply: असुविधा के लिए हमें खेद है। कृपया ऐप को लेटेस्ट वर्जन पर अपडेट करें।

complaint_text: Zomato wale ne khana thanda deliver kiya aur packing bhi khuli hui thi. Main ye khana nahi kha sakta, mujhe full refund chahiye abhi ke abhi.
translated_text_en: The Zomato guy delivered cold food and the packing was also open. I cannot eat this food, I want a full refund right now.
reply: We regret the poor experience. A full refund has been initiated to your wallet.

complaint_text: My credit card has been blocked without any prior notification. I am currently at a petrol pump and I am unable to make the payment. This is extremely embarrassing.
translated_text_en: My credit card has been blocked without any prior notification. I am currently at a petrol pump and I am unable to make the payment. This is extremely embarrassing.
reply: We apologize for the inconvenience. Your card was blocked due to a security alert.

complaint_text: डिलीवरी बॉय का व्यवहार बहुत ही बदतमीजी भरा था। उसने मुझसे ऊंची आवाज में बात की और गेट तक आने से मना कर दिया। ऐसे लोगों को काम पर क्यों रखते हो?
translated_text_en: The delivery boy's behavior was very rude. He spoke to me in a loud voice and refused to come to the gate. Why do you hire such people?
reply: हम इस व्यवहार के लिए क्षमा चाहते हैं। हम संबंधित कर्मचारी के खिलाफ सख्त कार्रवाई करेंगे।

complaint_text: Maine 2000 ka recharge kiya tha par cashback credit nahi hua promo code apply karne ke baad bhi. Terms and conditions to check kari thi maine.
translated_text_en: I did a recharge of 2000 but the cashback was not credited even after applying the promo code. I had checked the terms and conditions.
reply: We are checking the eligibility of the promo code and will update you shortly.

complaint_text: Your subscription service renewed automatically even though I had cancelled it last month. I want a reversal of the 999 charge immediately. This is cheating.
translated_text_en: Your subscription service renewed automatically even though I had cancelled it last month. I want a reversal of the 999 charge immediately. This is cheating.
reply: We are sorry for the error. The subscription has been cancelled and refund initiated.

complaint_text: मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से 5000 रुपये कट गए लेकिन एटीएम से पैसे नहीं निकले। ट्रांजेक्शन फेल हो गया था। कृपया इसे जल्दी से सुलझाएं।
translated_text_en: 5000 rupees were deducted from my bank account but no cash came out of the ATM. The transaction had failed. Please resolve this quickly.
reply: चिंता न करें, यदि राशि एटीएम से नहीं निकली है तो यह 24 घंटों में वापस आ जाएगी।

complaint_text: Courier partner ne mera address galat mark kar diya 'Refused by Customer' bol kar. Jabki main ghar pe hi tha pura din. Ye log jhoot kyun bolte hain?
translated_text_en: The courier partner marked my address incorrectly as 'Refused by Customer', whereas I was at home the whole day. Why do these people lie?
reply: We apologize for the false update. We are rescheduling your delivery for today.

complaint_text: I have been trying to reach your helpline for the last two hours but the line is always busy. Is there any way to get actual support instead of bots?
translated_text_en: I have been trying to reach your helpline for the last two hours but the line is always busy. Is there any way to get actual support instead of bots?
reply: We are experiencing high call volumes. A live agent will connect with you shortly.

complaint_text: जो जूते मैंने मंगवाए थे वो दो दिन में ही फट गए। क्या आप घटिया क्वालिटी का सामान बेचते हैं? मुझे पैसे वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: The shoes I ordered tore in just two days. Do you sell poor quality goods? I want my money back.
reply: खराब अनुभव के लिए हमें खेद है। हम जूते वापस मंगवाकर आपका रिफंड प्रोसेस कर देंगे।

complaint_text: Mera order track nahi ho raha hai app pe. Status 'Processing' dikha raha hai 3 din se. Kya mera order cancel ho gaya hai?
translated_text_en: My order is not being tracked on the app. The status shows 'Processing' for 3 days. Is my order cancelled?
reply: Your order is being dispatched from our warehouse. You will be able to track it soon.

complaint_text: The electricity bill for this month is abnormally high. My usage has been the same but the bill is three times higher than usual. Please check the meter reading.
translated_text_en: The electricity bill for this month is abnormally high. My usage has been the same but the bill is three times higher than usual. Please check the meter reading.
reply: We have registered your complaint. A technician will visit to verify the meter reading.

complaint_text: Flight 6E-204 was cancelled without any reason and the alternative flight provided is 10 hours later. I am traveling with an infant and cannot wait this long.
translated_text_en: Flight 6E-204 was cancelled without any reason and the alternative flight provided is 10 hours later. I am traveling with an infant and cannot wait this long.
reply: We deeply regret the disruption. We are looking for an earlier flight on another airline.

complaint_text: I received my order today, but the glass vase is completely shattered. This was supposed to be a gift for my mother and now the occasion is ruined. I demand an immediate refund or replacement as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: I received my order today, but the glass vase is completely shattered. This was supposed to be a gift for my mother and now the occasion is ruined. I demand an immediate refund or replacement as soon as possible.
reply: We apologize for the damage; a replacement has been initiated.

complaint_text: My food order has been delayed by over 90 minutes and the restaurant is not answering. I have tried calling the delivery executive, but his phone is switched off. This is the third time this week your service has failed me.
translated_text_en: My food order has been delayed by over 90 minutes and the restaurant is not answering. I have tried calling the delivery executive, but his phone is switched off. This is the third time this week your service has failed me.
reply: We are sorry for the delay; a full refund is processed.

complaint_text: I paid for my shoes twice because the first transaction showed a failure on your app. However, money was deducted from my bank account for both attempts. Please reverse the extra charge of 2499 INR immediately.
translated_text_en: I paid for my shoes twice because the first transaction showed a failure on your app. However, money was deducted from my bank account for both attempts. Please reverse the extra charge of 2499 INR immediately.
reply: The duplicate amount will be credited within 5-7 business days.

complaint_text: The Kanjeevaram saree I received is of very poor quality and looks nothing like the images shown on the website. I want to return it, but your app is not allowing me to select the return option. Kindly fix this glitch.
translated_text_en: The Kanjeevaram saree I received is of very poor quality and looks nothing like the images shown on the website. I want to return it, but your app is not allowing me to select the return option. Kindly fix this glitch.
reply: Our team is looking into the app glitch; please try again in 2 hours.

complaint_text: Broadband internet has been down in my area for the last 3 days and customer care is useless. I am working from home and this is causing a huge loss to my productivity. No technician has visited despite several complaints.
translated_text_en: Broadband internet has been down in my area for the last 3 days and customer care is useless. I am working from home and this is causing a huge loss to my productivity. No technician has visited despite several complaints.
reply: Technician has been assigned to your location for a priority fix.

complaint_text: My flight from Kolkata to Delhi was cancelled by the airline, but I haven't received my refund yet. It has been more than 15 days since the cancellation occurred. I need a status update on my 6500 INR.
translated_text_en: My flight from Kolkata to Delhi was cancelled by the airline, but I haven't received my refund yet. It has been more than 15 days since the cancellation occurred. I need a status update on my 6500 INR.
reply: We have escalated your refund request to the airline.

complaint_text: I tried to withdraw 2000 INR from the ATM, but the machine did not dispense cash while my account was debited. I have the receipt showing a failed transaction from the machine. Please help me get my money back.
translated_text_en: I tried to withdraw 2000 INR from the ATM, but the machine did not dispense cash while my account was debited. I have the receipt showing a failed transaction from the machine. Please help me get my money back.
reply: Amount will be auto-reversed within 24 hours as per bank policy.

complaint_text: The sofa set delivered yesterday has a big crack on the wooden frame and the fabric is torn. I have been calling customer support for two hours, but no one is picking up. I feel cheated by your company.
translated_text_en: The sofa set delivered yesterday has a big crack on the wooden frame and the fabric is torn. I have been calling customer support for two hours, but no one is picking up. I feel cheated by your company.
reply: We regret the experience; our manager will call you shortly.

complaint_text: मेरा ऑर्डर अभी तक नहीं आया है। पिछले हफ्ते बुक किया था और ट्रैकिंग भी नहीं चल रही। मुझे तुरंत रिफंड चाहिए वरना मैं उपभोक्ता फोरम में शिकायत करूँगा।
translated_text_en: My order hasn't arrived yet. I booked it last week and tracking isn't working either. I want an immediate refund or I will complain to the consumer forum.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है, आपका ऑर्डर कल तक पहुँच जाएगा।

complaint_text: UPI से पैसे कट गए पर दुकानदार को नहीं मिले। बैंक बोल रहा है इंतज़ार करो पर कितना समय लगेगा? मेरी मेहनत की कमाई है, कृपया वापस दिलवाएं।
translated_text_en: Money was deducted via UPI but the shopkeeper didn't receive it. The bank says wait but how long? It is my hard-earned money, please help me get it back.
reply: कृपया 48 घंटे प्रतीक्षा करें, पैसा बैंक में वापस आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: मैंने मोबाइल मंगवाया था और बॉक्स में ईंट निकली है। मैं बहुत परेशान हूँ, ये तो सरेआम धोखाधड़ी है। कृपया तुरंत कार्यवाही करें और मेरे पैसे वापस करें।
translated_text_en: I ordered a mobile and found a brick in the box. I am very upset, this is blatant fraud. Please take immediate action and refund my money.
reply: हमने जांच शुरू कर दी है, 24 घंटे में आपको अपडेट मिलेगा।

complaint_text: मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से बिना बताए 500 रुपये कट गए। कोई जानकारी नहीं मिल रही कि ये चार्जेस किस बात के हैं। जल्दी से मेरे पैसे वापस करो वरना अकाउंट बंद कर दूँगा।
translated_text_en: 500 rupees were deducted from my bank account without notice. No information is available on what these charges are for. Refund my money quickly or I will close the account.
reply: ये चार्जेस आपके मिनिमम बैलेंस न रखने के कारण लगे हैं।

complaint_text: एसी की सर्विसिंग के लिए पैसे पहले ही दे दिए पर कोई नहीं आया। फोन भी नहीं उठा रहे आपके सर्विस वाले। बहुत गर्मी है और हम यहाँ परेशान हो रहे हैं।
translated_text_en: Paid in advance for AC servicing but no one showed up. Your service people aren't even picking up the phone. It's very hot and we are suffering.
reply: तकनीकी खराबी के कारण देरी हुई, कल सुबह सर्विस हो जाएगी।

complaint_text: जो साड़ी मैंने मंगवाई थी उसका रंग फोटो से बिलकुल अलग है। वापस करने की कोशिश की तो कस्टमर केयर वाले मना कर रहे हैं। ये ग्राहकों के साथ धोखा है।
translated_text_en: The saree I ordered has a completely different color from the photo. When I tried to return it, customer care refused. This is cheating the customers.
reply: हमें खेद है, हम आपके रिटर्न की प्रक्रिया शुरू कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Bhai mera order abhi tak out for delivery hi dikha raha hai. Subah se wait kar raha hoon aur ab raat ho gayi. Delivery boy phone nahi utha raha. Refund do jaldi.
translated_text_en: Brother, my order is still showing as out for delivery. I've been waiting since morning and now it's night. The delivery boy isn't picking up. Refund quickly.
reply: Extremely sorry for the delay; your order will be delivered by 10 PM.

complaint_text: Mera payment fail ho gaya par bank se sms aa gaya ki paisa cut gaya. App mein status abhi bhi pending hi hai. Please check karke mere 2000 return karo.
translated_text_en: My payment failed but I got an SMS from the bank that money was deducted. The status in the app is still pending. Please check and return my 2000.
reply: Don't worry, failed payments are usually reversed within 3-5 days.

complaint_text: Yeh kya bakwas service hai aapki? Customer care call utha nahi raha aur bot wahi purane reply de raha hai. Mera refund 10 din se stuck hai, jaldi action lo.
translated_text_en: What nonsense service is this? Customer care isn't picking up and the bot gives the same old replies. My refund is stuck for 10 days, take action quickly.
reply: We are escalating this to our finance team for immediate release.

complaint_text: Maine pizza order kiya tha but delivery boy ne thanda pizza diya. Upar se uska behavior bahut rude tha, tameez nahi hai bilkul. I want a refund now and an apology.
translated_text_en: I ordered a pizza but the delivery boy gave it cold. On top of that, his behavior was very rude, no manners at all. I want a refund now and an apology.
reply: We apologize for the behavior; a credit note has been added to your wallet.

complaint_text: Mera subscription auto-renew ho gaya bina meri permission ke. Mujhe yeh service nahi chahiye thi, please cancel karke paise refund karo. Very bad experience really.
translated_text_en: My subscription auto-renewed without my permission. I didn't want this service, please cancel and refund the money. Very bad experience really.
reply: Subscription cancelled. Refund will reflect in 48 hours.

complaint_text: Shoes ka size bahut chota hai aur return policy clear nahi hai. Chat bot bas gol gol ghuma raha hai koi real person baat nahi kar raha. Help me please urgently.
translated_text_en: The shoe size is too small and the return policy isn't clear. The chat bot is just going in circles, no real person is talking. Help me please urgently.
reply: A support agent will join the chat in 2 minutes to assist you.

complaint_text: I am extremely disappointed with the delivery of my order. The package was supposed to arrive two days ago but it is still showing as out for delivery. This is very frustrating as I needed the items for a family function tonight. Please provide an immediate update on the status.
translated_text_en: I am extremely disappointed with the delivery of my order. The package was supposed to arrive two days ago but it is still showing as out for delivery. This is very frustrating as I needed the items for a family function tonight. Please provide an immediate update on the status.
reply: We apologize for the delay. Our team is looking into this urgently.

complaint_text: मेरा यूपीआई ट्रांजेक्शन फेल हो गया है लेकिन बैंक से पैसे कट गए हैं। मैंने किराने के सामान के लिए ₹500 का भुगतान किया था पर दुकानदार को पैसे नहीं मिले। कृपया मेरे पैसे वापस करें क्योंकि मुझे इसकी बहुत जरूरत है। यह पहली बार नहीं हो रहा है।
translated_text_en: My UPI transaction failed but the money was deducted from the bank. I paid ₹500 for groceries but the shopkeeper didn't receive the money. Please refund my money as I need it urgently. This is not the first time this is happening.
reply: Asuvidha ke liye khed hai. Paisa 3-5 dino mein wapas aa jayega.

complaint_text: Mera order galat deliver hua hai, maine blue shirt mangayi thi par red aa gayi. Size bhi sahi nahi hai aur kapda bahut bekar quality ka hai. Please isse jaldi exchange kijiye ya return le lijiye. I am waiting for your response.
translated_text_en: My order was delivered incorrectly, I ordered a blue shirt but received a red one. The size is also not correct and the cloth is of very poor quality. Please exchange this quickly or take a return. I am waiting for your response.
reply: Sorry for the wrong item. Please initiate a return request from the app.

complaint_text: I requested a refund ten days ago after returning the shoes. Your app says the refund is processed but I haven't seen any money in my bank account. This is a large amount and I am very worried. Please provide the UTR number for the transaction.
translated_text_en: I requested a refund ten days ago after returning the shoes. Your app says the refund is processed but I haven't seen any money in my bank account. This is a large amount and I am very worried. Please provide the UTR number for the transaction.
reply: We have shared the UTR details via email. Please check with your bank.

complaint_text: कल मुझे पार्सल मिला और डब्बा पूरी तरह से फटा हुआ था। अंदर जो कांच का सामान था वो सब टूट चुका है। मुझे समझ नहीं आ रहा कि कूरियर वाले इतने लापरवाह कैसे हो सकते हैं। मुझे तुरंत नया सामान या पूरा पैसा वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: Yesterday I received the parcel and the box was completely torn. The glassware inside was all broken. I don't understand how courier people can be so careless. I want new items or a full refund immediately.
reply: Humein dukh hai ki aapka saaman toot gaya. Refund process kar diya gaya hai.

complaint_text: Maine 2000 ki shopping ki thi isliye ki mujhe 200 ka cashback milega. Transaction complete ho gaya hai par wallet mein abhi tak zero balance dikha raha hai. Terms and conditions mein toh likha tha ki instant milega. Please check karke batao kab tak aayega.
translated_text_en: I shopped for 2000 so that I would get 200 cashback. The transaction is complete but the wallet is still showing zero balance. It was written in terms and conditions that it will be instant. Please check and tell me when it will come.
reply: Cashback will reflect in your wallet within 24 hours of delivery.

complaint_text: The customer service agent I spoke to today was incredibly rude and unhelpful. I was trying to explain my issue with the billing, but he kept interrupting me. I want a formal complaint lodged against this person. This is not how you treat loyal customers.
translated_text_en: The customer service agent I spoke to today was incredibly rude and unhelpful. I was trying to explain my issue with the billing, but he kept interrupting me. I want a formal complaint lodged against this person. This is not how you treat loyal customers.
reply: We are sorry for your experience. We have noted your feedback for training.

complaint_text: आपकी ऐप बार-बार क्रैश हो रही है जब भी मैं पेमेंट करने की कोशिश करता हूँ। मैंने तीन बार कोशिश की लेकिन हर बार ऐप बंद हो जाती है। मेरी बुकिंग अभी तक कन्फर्म नहीं हुई है और समय निकलता जा रहा है। इसे जल्दी ठीक करें।
translated_text_en: Your app is crashing repeatedly whenever I try to make a payment. I tried three times but every time the app closes. My booking is not confirmed yet and time is running out. Fix this quickly.
reply: Kripya app ko update karein ya cache clear karke fir se try karein.

complaint_text: Delivery agent ka behavior bahut battameez tha, usne mujhse extra delivery charge manga. Maine mana kiya toh usne bola ki wo parcel wapas le jayega. Please check kijiye ki aapke partners aise kyun behave kar rahe hain. I am very angry.
translated_text_en: The delivery agent's behavior was very rude, he asked me for extra delivery charges. When I refused, he said he would take the parcel back. Please check why your partners are behaving like this. I am very angry.
reply: We take this seriously. Action will be taken against the delivery partner.

complaint_text: I received the wrong size for the kurta I ordered. I specifically selected 'Large' but the tag on the item I received says 'Small'. I have a wedding to attend this weekend and now I have nothing to wear. Please expedite the exchange process.
translated_text_en: I received the wrong size for the kurta I ordered. I specifically selected 'Large' but the tag on the item I received says 'Small'. I have a wedding to attend this weekend and now I have nothing to wear. Please expedite the exchange process.
reply: We are sorry for the error. Exchange is scheduled for tomorrow.

complaint_text: मेरे खाते से दो बार पैसे कट गए हैं लेकिन आर्डर सिर्फ एक ही बुक हुआ है। पहले ट्रांजेक्शन के ₹1200 और दूसरे के ₹1200, कुल ₹2400 कट गए। मुझे मेरा एक्स्ट्रा पैसा वापस चाहिए। बैंक स्टेटमेंट में भी दो एंट्री दिख रही हैं।
translated_text_en: Money has been deducted twice from my account but only one order is booked. ₹1200 for the first transaction and ₹1200 for the second, total ₹2400 deducted. I want my extra money back. Bank statement also shows two entries.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Dusra transaction 7 dino mein refund ho jayega.

complaint_text: Order bina kisi reason ke cancel kar diya gaya hai, ye kya mazaak hai? Maine itna wait kiya aur ab aap bol rahe ho ki item out of stock hai. Agar out of stock tha toh website pe dikhaya kyun? Refund kab aayega mera?
translated_text_en: Order has been cancelled without any reason, is this a joke? I waited so much and now you are saying the item is out of stock. If it was out of stock, why was it shown on the website? When will my refund come?
reply: We regret the cancellation. Refund has been initiated to your source account.

complaint_text: The quality of the bedsheet I received is very poor compared to the pictures on the website. The fabric is very thin and the color is already fading after one wash. I feel like I have been cheated by the seller. I want a full refund for this.
translated_text_en: The quality of the bedsheet I received is very poor compared to the pictures on the website. The fabric is very thin and the color is already fading after one wash. I feel like I have been cheated by the seller. I want a full refund for this.
reply: We are sorry for the quality issue. We will pick up the item and refund you.

complaint_text: डिलीवरी बॉय ने मुझे फोन भी नहीं किया और ऐप पर लिख दिया कि 'Customer not available'। मैं पूरे दिन घर पर ही था और गेट भी खुला था। अब ऐप में दिखा रहा है कि कल डिलीवरी होगी। ये बहुत गलत बात है।
translated_text_en: The delivery boy didn't even call me and wrote 'Customer not available' on the app. I was at home all day and the gate was open. Now it shows on the app that delivery will be tomorrow. This is very wrong.
reply: Asuvidha ke liye maafi. Humne agent ko instruction bhej diye hain.

complaint_text: Promotion code FESTIVE50 work nahi kar raha hai check out ke time pe. Maine ₹5000 ka cart banaya hai par code invalid dikha raha hai. Kal tak toh ye valid tha. Please help kijiye warna deal miss ho jayegi.
translated_text_en: Promotion code FESTIVE50 is not working at the time of check out. I have made a cart of ₹5000 but the code is showing invalid. It was valid until yesterday. Please help otherwise the deal will be missed.
reply: The code expired at midnight. We have sent a new code to your email.

complaint_text: The delivery person came at 11:30 PM last night and started shouting outside my gate. This is totally unacceptable behavior and very unsafe. Who delivers items at midnight in a residential area? I want to speak with a supervisor immediately.
translated_text_en: The delivery person came at 11:30 PM last night and started shouting outside my gate. This is totally unacceptable behavior and very unsafe. Who delivers items at midnight in a residential area? I want to speak with a supervisor immediately.
reply: This is against our policy. We are investigating this with the courier team.

complaint_text: रिफंड का स्टेटस अभी तक 'Pending' क्यों दिखा रहा है? 5 दिन हो गए हैं लेकिन कोई अपडेट नहीं है। कस्टमर केयर वाले सिर्फ 'इंतजार करें' बोलते हैं। मुझे मेरे ₹3200 की सख्त जरूरत है, कृपया इसे जल्दी प्रोसेस करें।
translated_text_en: Why is the refund status still showing 'Pending'? It's been 5 days but no update. Customer care only says 'wait'. I strictly need my ₹3200, please process it quickly.
reply: Hum check kar rahe hain. Bank ki taraf se deri ho rahi hai, kripya thoda rukien.

complaint_text: Mera subscription bina puche auto-renew ho gaya hai. Mujhe koi notification ya mail nahi aaya renewal se pehle. Mujhe ye service continue nahi karni, please mera subscription cancel karke paise wapas karo.
translated_text_en: My subscription has been auto-renewed without asking. I didn't receive any notification or mail before renewal. I don't want to continue this service, please cancel my subscription and refund the money.
reply: We have cancelled the subscription. Refund will take 5-7 working days.

complaint_text: I received my package today but several items were missing from it. I ordered a set of five items but only two are in the box. The invoice clearly mentions five items. Please send the remaining items or refund the difference.
translated_text_en: I received my package today but several items were missing from it. I ordered a set of five items but only two are in the box. The invoice clearly mentions five items. Please send the remaining items or refund the difference.
reply: We are sorry for the missing items. We are shipping the rest today.

complaint_text: The food I ordered was completely cold and the packaging was leaking oil everywhere. The delivery took over 90 minutes even though it's a 15-minute drive. I will never order from this app again. Highly unprofessional service.
translated_text_en: The food I ordered was completely cold and the packaging was leaking oil everywhere. The delivery took over 90 minutes even though it's a 15-minute drive. I will never order from this app again. Highly unprofessional service.
reply: We apologize for the poor experience. A full refund has been issued.

complaint_text: I am extremely disappointed with the delivery service for my order ORD55291. The package was supposed to arrive two days ago, but there is no update from the courier. I have tried calling the helpline but no one is picking up.
translated_text_en: I am extremely disappointed with the delivery service for my order ORD55291. The package was supposed to arrive two days ago, but there is no update from the courier. I have tried calling the helpline but no one is picking up.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the delay. We are tracking your package and will update you shortly.

complaint_text: मैंने परसों यूपीआई से ₹2000 का भुगतान किया था लेकिन अभी तक पेंडिंग दिखा रहा है। मेरे बैंक से पैसे कट चुके हैं पर आर्डर कन्फर्म नहीं हुआ। कृपया मेरा पैसा वापस करें या आर्डर कन्फर्म करें।
translated_text_en: I paid 2000 rupees via UPI day before yesterday but it is still showing pending. Money has been deducted from my bank but the order is not confirmed. Please refund my money or confirm the order.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। हम आपके ट्रांजैक्शन की जांच कर रहे हैं और जल्द ही अपडेट देंगे।

complaint_text: Bhai refund kab aayega mere bank account mein? 10 din ho gaye return pick up hue but app pe abhi bhi status wahi dikha raha hai. Customer care ko call kiya toh wo log bol rahe wait karo par kitna wait karu?
translated_text_en: Brother, when will the refund come to my bank account? It has been 10 days since the return pickup but the app still shows the same status. I called customer care and they are saying to wait, but how much should I wait?
reply: Hamein khed hai. Aapka refund process ho chuka hai aur 3-5 days mein account mein aa jayega.

complaint_text: The laptop I received yesterday has a cracked screen and the charging port is not working. This is completely unacceptable for a premium product costing 75,000 rupees. I want an immediate replacement or a full refund including shipping charges.
translated_text_en: The laptop I received yesterday has a cracked screen and the charging port is not working. This is completely unacceptable for a premium product costing 75,000 rupees. I want an immediate replacement or a full refund including shipping charges.
reply: We are sorry for the damaged product. A replacement has been initiated and will reach you in 3 days.

complaint_text: कल जो पार्सल मिला उसमें आधी चीजें गायब थीं। मैंने 5 किलो आटा और 2 किलो चीनी मंगवाई थी पर सिर्फ आटा मिला है। बिल में पूरी राशि काटी गई है जो कि बहुत गलत है।
translated_text_en: The parcel received yesterday had half the items missing. I ordered 5kg flour and 2kg sugar but only received flour. The full amount has been charged in the bill which is very wrong.
reply: असुविधा के लिए क्षमा चाहते हैं। गायब सामान का रिफंड आपके वॉलेट में डाल दिया गया है।

complaint_text: App baar baar crash ho rahi hai jab main checkout karne ki koshish karta hoon. Mere cart mein items save nahi ho rahe aur har baar log out ho jata hai. Please isse fix karo kyunki sale khatam ho jayegi.
translated_text_en: The app is crashing repeatedly when I try to checkout. Items are not being saved in my cart and it logs out every time. Please fix this because the sale will end.
reply: Sorry for the technical glitch. Please update your app to the latest version and try again.

complaint_text: The delivery agent was very rude and refused to come up to the third floor. He threatened to cancel my order if I didn't come down to the main gate. This kind of behavior is not expected from a reputed company like yours.
translated_text_en: The delivery agent was very rude and refused to come up to the third floor. He threatened to cancel my order if I didn't come down to the main gate. This kind of behavior is not expected from a reputed company like yours.
reply: We apologize for the behavior of our delivery partner. We have raised a formal complaint against him.

complaint_text: मैंने जो शर्ट मंगवाई थी उसका साइज बिल्कुल छोटा है जबकि मैंने एक्सेल साइज ऑर्डर किया था। कपड़े की क्वालिटी भी वैसी नहीं है जैसी फोटो में दिख रही थी। मुझे यह सामान वापस करना है और पैसे चाहिए।
translated_text_en: The shirt I ordered is way too small even though I ordered XL size. The cloth quality is also not like what was shown in the photos. I want to return this item and get my money back.
reply: निश्चित रूप से, आप ऐप के माध्यम से वापसी का अनुरोध कर सकते हैं। हम कल पिकअप की व्यवस्था करेंगे।

complaint_text: Mera order cancel kyu kar diya bina pooche? Maine offer apply karke sasta mangwaya tha ab wahi item mehnga dikha raha hai. Yeh bahut badi cheating hai customers ke saath.
translated_text_en: Why was my order cancelled without asking? I applied an offer to get it cheap and now the same item is showing as expensive. This is a big cheating with customers.
reply: Technical error ki wajah se order cancel hua tha. Humne aapko ek special coupon mail kiya hai.

complaint_text: I have been charged twice for the same transaction on my credit card. The bank says the merchant has blocked both amounts. Please release the extra 5400 rupees immediately as it is affecting my credit limit.
translated_text_en: I have been charged twice for the same transaction on my credit card. The bank says the merchant has blocked both amounts. Please release the extra 5400 rupees immediately as it is affecting my credit limit.
reply: We have verified the duplicate charge. The additional amount will be reversed within 48 hours.

complaint_text: आपके कस्टमर केयर नंबर पर कोई बात नहीं कर पा रहा है। कॉल कनेक्ट होते ही कट जाती है या सिर्फ म्यूजिक बजता रहता है। मुझे अपने रिफंड के बारे में जानना है जो 15 दिनों से अटका हुआ है।
translated_text_en: Nobody is able to talk on your customer care number. The call gets disconnected or just music keeps playing. I want to know about my refund which has been stuck for 15 days.
reply: संपर्क न हो पाने के लिए क्षमा। आपका रिफंड स्टेटस चेक किया जा रहा है और हम आपको जल्द ही कॉल करेंगे।

complaint_text: Pichle hafte ek table mangwayi thi par uska ek pair toota hua nikla. Maine exchange request dali thi par abhi tak koi lene nahi aaya. Roz msg aata hai ki delivery boy aa raha hai par koi nahi aata.
translated_text_en: Ordered a table last week but one of its legs was broken. I raised an exchange request but nobody has come to pick it up yet. Every day I get a message saying the delivery boy is coming but nobody shows up.
reply: Exchange delay ke liye sorry. Humne priority pick-up schedule kar diya hai aaj ke liye.

complaint_text: I ordered groceries worth 1500 INR and most of the vegetables are rotten. The tomatoes are squashed and the spinach is yellow. I want a refund for the perishable items immediately or send fresh ones.
translated_text_en: I ordered groceries worth 1500 INR and most of the vegetables are rotten. The tomatoes are squashed and the spinach is yellow. I want a refund for the perishable items immediately or send fresh ones.
reply: We are sorry for the poor quality. We have processed a refund for the fresh produce items in your order.

complaint_text: प्रोमो कोड 'FIRST50' काम नहीं कर रहा है जबकि यह मेरी पहली खरीदारी है। जब मैं इसे अप्लाई करता हूँ तो 'Invalid Code' दिखाता है। कृपया इसे ठीक करें ताकि मैं अपना ऑर्डर पूरा कर सकूं।
translated_text_en: Promo code 'FIRST50' is not working even though this is my first purchase. When I apply it, it shows 'Invalid Code'. Please fix this so I can complete my order.
reply: यह कोड केवल ₹500 से अधिक की खरीदारी पर मान्य है। कृपया नियम और शर्तें दोबारा जांचें।

complaint_text: Mera address update nahi ho raha hai app pe. Har baar naya address daalne par purana wala hi dikhata hai. Mera current order galat jagah deliver na ho jaye iska darr hai.
translated_text_en: My address is not getting updated on the app. Every time I enter a new address, it shows the old one. I am afraid my current order might get delivered to the wrong place.
reply: App settings mein cache clear karke dekhiye. Humne aapka delivery address manual update kar diya hai.

complaint_text: The perfume I received is definitely not original. The fragrance lasts for only 5 minutes and the packaging looks very suspicious and cheap. I have used this brand before and this is clearly a fake product.
translated_text_en: The perfume I received is definitely not original. The fragrance lasts for only 5 minutes and the packaging looks very suspicious and cheap. I have used this brand before and this is clearly a fake product.
reply: We take counterfeit claims very seriously. Please share photos of the batch code for investigation.

complaint_text: मेरा पैकेट डिलीवर दिखा रहा है लेकिन मुझे कुछ नहीं मिला। गार्ड और पड़ोसियों से भी पूछ लिया, किसी के पास नहीं है। शायद डिलीवरी बॉय ने गलत जगह दे दिया या झूठ बोल रहा है।
translated_text_en: My packet is showing as delivered but I haven't received anything. I asked the guard and neighbors, no one has it. Maybe the delivery boy gave it to the wrong place or is lying.
reply: असुविधा के लिए क्षमा। हम डिलीवरी पार्टनर से संपर्क कर रहे हैं और जल्द ही स्थिति स्पष्ट करेंगे।

complaint_text: Your return policy is very confusing and hidden. I wanted to return a pair of shoes within 7 days, but the app says this item is non-returnable. This was not mentioned clearly on the product page while buying.
translated_text_en: Your return policy is very confusing and hidden. I wanted to return a pair of shoes within 7 days, but the app says this item is non-returnable. This was not mentioned clearly on the product page while buying.
reply: We apologize for the confusion. We are allowing a one-time return for your order as a gesture of goodwill.

complaint_text: Payment gateway pe mera paisa fas gaya hai. Bank se message aaya ki debit ho gaya hai par aapke page pe error aa gaya. 1 ghanta ho gaya na mail aaya na SMS confirmation.
translated_text_en: My money is stuck at the payment gateway. Received a message from the bank that it's debited but your page showed an error. It's been an hour, neither mail nor SMS confirmation received.
reply: Chinta na karein, agar transaction fail hua hai toh bank 7 din mein paisa wapas kar dega.

complaint_text: I subscribed to the Gold membership yesterday for 999 INR but my account still shows as a Basic user. I am unable to access the free shipping and priority delivery benefits which I paid for.
translated_text_en: I subscribed to the Gold membership yesterday for 999 INR but my account still shows as a Basic user. I am unable to access the free shipping and priority delivery benefits which I paid for.
reply: We have manually activated your Gold membership. You can now enjoy all the benefits. Thank you.

complaint_text: मेरा रिफंड अभी तक नहीं आया है। मैंने ५ दिन पहले आर्डर कैंसिल किया था पर पैसे बैंक में नहीं दिखे। कृपया जल्दी जांच करें वरना मुझे बैंक में शिकायत करनी होगी।
translated_text_en: My refund has not arrived yet. I cancelled the order 5 days ago but the money is not visible in the bank. Please check quickly or I will have to complain to the bank.
reply: We apologize for the delay. Your refund has been initiated and will reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.

complaint_text: I ordered a premium smartphone, but the box I received today was completely empty. This is a very serious issue and feels like a theft. I want a full refund or a replacement by tomorrow.
translated_text_en: I ordered a premium smartphone, but the box I received today was completely empty. This is a very serious issue and feels like a theft. I want a full refund or a replacement by tomorrow.
reply: We are extremely sorry to hear this. We have raised an investigation with our logistics partner and will resolve this within 24 hours.

complaint_text: Mera UPI payment fail ho gaya par account se 2000 rupaye cut gaye. App me status pending dikha raha hai aur shopkeeper bol raha hai paise nahi mile. Please jaldi solve kijiye, ye paise bahut zaroori the.
translated_text_en: My UPI payment failed but 2000 rupees were deducted from my account. The app shows pending status and the shopkeeper says he didn't receive it. Please solve quickly, this money was very important.
reply: Please do not worry. If the amount is deducted, it will be automatically refunded to your bank account within 48 hours.

complaint_text: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the 4th floor. He kept shouting on the phone and eventually marked the order as 'Customer not available'. This is pathetic service.
translated_text_en: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the 4th floor. He kept shouting on the phone and eventually marked the order as 'Customer not available'. This is pathetic service.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the executive's behavior. We have raised a formal complaint against the rider and rescheduled your delivery.

complaint_text: साड़ी का रंग फोटो से बिलकुल अलग है और कपडे की क्वालिटी बहुत ही घटिया है। मुझे यह प्रोडक्ट वापस करना है पर आपका ऐप 'Return' बटन नहीं दिखा रहा है। मुझे तुरंत मेरे पैसे वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: The color of the saree is completely different from the photo and the fabric quality is very poor. I want to return this product but your app is not showing the 'Return' button. I want my money back immediately.
reply: We regret the inconvenience. The return option is now enabled for your order. Our agent will pick up the product within 48 hours.

complaint_text: Maine laptop mangwaya tha par screen par bada sa scratch hai. Packaging bhi fati hui thi jab delivery boy ne diya. Itna mehenga saman aise kaise bhej sakte ho aap log?
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop but there is a big scratch on the screen. The packaging was also torn when the delivery boy gave it. How can you guys send such expensive items like this?
reply: We are sorry for the damaged product. We have arranged for a technician visit to verify the damage, followed by an immediate replacement.

complaint_text: My food order from 'The Spice Hub' is delayed by over 90 minutes. The rider has been at the same location for the last 40 minutes and is not picking up my calls. I want a full refund as the food will be cold now.
translated_text_en: My food order from 'The Spice Hub' is delayed by over 90 minutes. The rider has been at the same location for the last 40 minutes and is not picking up my calls. I want a full refund as the food will be cold now.
reply: We apologize for the delay. We have cancelled your order due to the delay and a full refund of 890 INR has been processed.

complaint_text: मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से दो बार पैसे कट गए एक ही ट्रांजेक्शन के लिए। मैंने १००० रुपये का ग्रोसरी आर्डर किया था पर मैसेज दो बार आया। कृपया फालतू पैसे वापस करें।
translated_text_en: Money was deducted twice from my bank account for the same transaction. I ordered groceries worth 1000 rupees but received the message twice. Please refund the extra money.
reply: We have identified the duplicate transaction. The second deduction of 1000 INR will be credited back to your source account within 5 days.

complaint_text: Customer care pe call lag hi nahi raha hai, hamesha busy aata hai. My AC repair request is pending since last Monday. Itni garmi hai, please kisi technician ko jaldi bhejiye.
translated_text_en: Calls to customer care are not connecting, it is always busy. My AC repair request is pending since last Monday. It is so hot, please send a technician quickly.
reply: We apologize for the wait. We have prioritized your request and a technician will visit your location today before 6 PM.

complaint_text: The shoes I received are size 8, but I clearly ordered size 10. Now the app says the item is 'Non-returnable'. This is a mistake from your end, why should I suffer? Please fix this.
translated_text_en: The shoes I received are size 8, but I clearly ordered size 10. Now the app says the item is 'Non-returnable'. This is a mistake from your end, why should I suffer? Please fix this.
reply: We apologize for the sizing error. As an exception, we have approved the return for this non-returnable item. Pick-up is scheduled for tomorrow.

complaint_text: आपके बैंक के कर्मचारी बहुत ही बदतमीज हैं। मैंने केवाईसी के लिए तीन बार चक्कर काटे पर कोई काम नहीं कर रहा। मुझे इसकी शिकायत बड़े अधिकारियों से करनी पड़ेगी।
translated_text_en: Your bank employees are very rude. I visited thrice for KYC but no one is doing the work. I will have to complain about this to senior officials.
reply: We deeply regret your experience at our branch. We have forwarded your complaint to the regional manager for immediate action.

complaint_text: Payment gateway par transaction stuck ho gaya hai. Paisa cut gaya par order confirm nahi hua. Amazon se sasta mil raha tha fir bhi yahan se liya, bahut badi galti ki maine.
translated_text_en: Transaction is stuck on the payment gateway. Money was deducted but order was not confirmed. It was cheaper on Amazon but I still bought from here, I made a big mistake.
reply: We understand your frustration. The transaction failed at the gateway; your money is safe and will be refunded automatically within 3 days.

complaint_text: I received a damaged washing machine today. There is a huge dent on the side panel and the drum makes a weird noise. I want a replacement immediately, not a repair.
translated_text_en: I received a damaged washing machine today. There is a huge dent on the side panel and the drum makes a weird noise. I want a replacement immediately, not a repair.
reply: We apologize for the damaged unit. We have registered a replacement request. The new unit will be delivered and the old one picked up simultaneously.

complaint_text: मेरा वॉलेट अकाउंट बिना किसी कारण के ब्लॉक कर दिया गया है। उसमें ५००० रुपये पड़े हैं जो मैं इस्तेमाल नहीं कर पा रहा हूँ। कृपया इसे जल्दी अनब्लॉक करें।
translated_text_en: My wallet account has been blocked without any reason. There are 5000 rupees in it which I am unable to use. Please unblock it quickly.
reply: Your account was flagged for security reasons. Please upload your ID proof via the link sent to your email to unblock the wallet.

complaint_text: Hyderabad delivery hub me mera parcel 4 din se rakha hai par move nahi ho raha. Ye mera anniversary gift tha jo ab waste ho gaya delay ki wajah se. Very disappointing.
translated_text_en: My parcel has been at the Hyderabad delivery hub for 4 days but is not moving. This was my anniversary gift which is now wasted due to the delay. Very disappointing.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the delay in transit. We have expedited your shipment and it will be delivered by tomorrow morning.

complaint_text: I was charged for a subscription I never authorized. I noticed 1499 INR deducted from my credit card this morning. I want an immediate refund and cancellation of this service.
translated_text_en: I was charged for a subscription I never authorized. I noticed 1499 INR deducted from my credit card this morning. I want an immediate refund and cancellation of this service.
reply: We have cancelled the unauthorized subscription. A refund of 1499 INR has been processed and will reflect in your statement in 5-7 days.

complaint_text: The packaging of the glassware I ordered was very poor. Three out of six glasses arrived broken. You should use better bubble wrap for fragile items. This is common sense.
translated_text_en: The packaging of the glassware I ordered was very poor. Three out of six glasses arrived broken. You should use better bubble wrap for fragile items. This is common sense.
reply: We apologize for the breakage. We are sending a new set of glasses with improved packaging at no extra cost to you.

complaint_text: App me login nahi ho raha, baar baar error aa raha hai. OTP bhi mobile pe nahi aa raha jabki network full hai. Dusre apps sahi chal rahe hain, bas isi me dikkat hai.
translated_text_en: Not able to login to the app, getting error repeatedly. OTP is also not coming to mobile even though network is full. Other apps are working fine, problem is only with this one.
reply: We are sorry for the technical glitch. Please clear your app cache or update to the latest version. The OTP service is now restored.

complaint_text: I ordered fresh vegetables but received rotten tomatoes and wilted spinach. This is the third time this month your quality team has failed. I am deleting this app for good.
translated_text_en: I ordered fresh vegetables but received rotten tomatoes and wilted spinach. This is the third time this month your quality team has failed. I am deleting this app for good.
reply: We are deeply sorry for the poor quality of produce. We have refunded the amount for the vegetables and added a 100 INR voucher to your account.

complaint_text: पैसे कट गए पर टिकट बुक नहीं हुई। अब मुझे यात्रा के लिए ज्यादा पैसे खर्च करने पड़ेंगे क्योंकि दाम बढ़ गए हैं। इसकी भरपाई कौन करेगा?
translated_text_en: Money was deducted but the ticket was not booked. Now I will have to spend more money for travel because prices have increased. Who will compensate for this?
reply: We regret the booking failure. While we have refunded the full amount, we are also providing a discount coupon to cover the price difference.

complaint_text: I ordered a premium noise-canceling headphone two days ago, but the box I received today was completely empty. This is sheer negligence by your delivery partner and I feel cheated by such a big brand. I need an immediate refund or a replacement sent today without any further delay.
translated_text_en: I ordered a premium noise-canceling headphone two days ago, but the box I received today was completely empty. This is sheer negligence by your delivery partner and I feel cheated by such a big brand. I need an immediate refund or a replacement sent today without any further delay.
reply: We are deeply sorry for this experience. We have initiated an investigation with our logistics partner and will provide a resolution within 24 hours.

complaint_text: मैंने कल शाम को अपनी बहन को यूपीआई के जरिए 5000 रुपये भेजे थे लेकिन उसके खाते में पैसे अभी तक नहीं पहुंचे. मेरे बैंक से पैसे कट गए हैं और ऐप पर ट्रांजैक्शन सक्सेसफुल दिखा रहा है. कृपया इसे जल्द से जल्द ठीक करें क्योंकि उसे इन पैसों की अस्पताल में बहुत सख्त जरुरत है.
translated_text_en: I sent 5000 rupees to my sister via UPI yesterday evening but the money hasn't reached her account yet. Money has been deducted from my bank and the transaction shows successful on the app. Please fix this as soon as possible as she urgently needs this money in the hospital.
reply: हमने आपका ट्रांजैक्शन ट्रैक कर लिया है. बैंक सर्वर में समस्या के कारण देरी हुई है, आपका पैसा 3 कार्य दिवसों के भीतर वापस आ जाएगा.

complaint_text: Bhai 2 ghante ho gaye order kiye huye aur abhi tak food deliver nahi hua hai. Delivery boy mera phone nahi utha raha aur customer support bhi hamesha busy hi bata raha hai. Aise ghatiya service doge toh log tumhara app delete kar denge, please refund my money now.
translated_text_en: Brother, it has been 2 hours since I ordered and the food hasn't been delivered yet. The delivery boy is not picking up my phone and customer support is always showing busy. If you provide such poor service, people will delete your app, please refund my money now.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Aapka order cancel kar diya gaya hai aur poora refund initiate ho gaya hai jo 5-7 din mein dikhega.

complaint_text: The ATM machine at the T. Nagar branch did not dispense any cash but I received a text message saying 10,000 INR was withdrawn. I waited for 20 minutes near the machine but nothing happened and no one is helping at the branch. This is my rent money and I am extremely stressed right now.
translated_text_en: The ATM machine at the T. Nagar branch did not dispense any cash but I received a text message saying 10,000 INR was withdrawn. I waited for 20 minutes near the machine but nothing happened and no one is helping at the branch. This is my rent money and I am extremely stressed right now.
reply: We apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is auditing the ATM cash logs and the amount will be reversed to your account within 48 hours.

complaint_text: मैंने पिछले हफ्ते अपना मोबाइल रिचार्ज किया था लेकिन अभी तक डेटा पैक एक्टिवेट नहीं हुआ है. कस्टमर केयर को कॉल करने पर वो बस इंतज़ार करने को कह रहे हैं. मेरा सारा काम रुका हुआ है और मुझे ऑफिस की मीटिंग्स ज्वाइन करनी हैं.
translated_text_en: I recharged my mobile last week but the data pack hasn't been activated yet. When I call customer care, they just tell me to wait. All my work is stalled and I have to join office meetings.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है. आपका डेटा पैक मैन्युअल रूप से एक्टिवेट कर दिया गया है और हमने आपको हर्जाने के तौर पर 2GB एक्स्ट्रा डेटा दिया है.

complaint_text: Grocery delivery mein 4 items missing hain aur bill poora charge kiya gaya hai. Milk aur bread toh bilkul fresh nahi lag rahe, lagta hai purana stock bhej diya. Please baki ke items bhej do ya fir utne paise wallet mein credit kar do jaldi.
translated_text_en: 4 items are missing in the grocery delivery and the full bill has been charged. Milk and bread don't look fresh at all, looks like old stock was sent. Please send the remaining items or credit that much money to the wallet quickly.
reply: Humein dukh hai. Missing items ka refund aapke wallet mein daal diya gaya hai aur fresh milk bhej diya gaya hai.

complaint_text: My flight from Hyderabad to Delhi was canceled at the last minute without any prior notification to passengers. I have been waiting at the airport for five hours and your ground staff is being extremely rude. I demand a full refund and compensation for the mental agony caused.
translated_text_en: My flight from Hyderabad to Delhi was canceled at the last minute without any prior notification to passengers. I have been waiting at the airport for five hours and your ground staff is being extremely rude. I demand a full refund and compensation for the mental agony caused.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the cancellation due to technical reasons. A full refund has been processed and a voucher for your next travel has been sent to your email.

complaint_text: इस महीने का बिजली का बिल पिछले महीने से तीन गुना ज्यादा आया है जबकि हम घर पर थे ही नहीं. मीटर की रीडिंग चेक करने के लिए कोई भी नहीं आ रहा है और हेल्पलाइन नंबर हमेशा बंद रहता है. यह सरासर लूट है और हम इसे नहीं भरेंगे जब तक सुधार नहीं होता.
translated_text_en: This month's electricity bill is three times higher than last month even though we weren't even home. No one is coming to check the meter reading and the helpline number is always off. This is sheer robbery and we won't pay until it's corrected.
reply: शिकायत दर्ज कर ली गई है. एक इंस्पेक्टर अगले 48 घंटों में आपके मीटर की जांच करेगा और यदि रीडिंग गलत पाई गई तो बिल संशोधित किया जाएगा.

complaint_text: Maine ek kurta order kiya tha size XL mein but mujhe Small size bhej diya gaya hai. Iski quality bhi photo jaisi nahi hai, kapda bahut patla aur bekar lag raha hai. I want to return this product immediately, please pick-up arrange karo.
translated_text_en: I ordered a kurta in size XL but a Small size has been sent to me. Its quality is also not like the photo, the cloth looks very thin and bad. I want to return this product immediately, please arrange a pick-up.
reply: Humein khed hai. Return pick-up kal ke liye schedule kar diya gaya hai. Jaise hi product milta hai, hum refund process kar denge.

complaint_text: Since the heavy rains started yesterday, my broadband connection has been completely dead in the Salt Lake area. I am a software engineer working from home and I am losing my billable hours because of this outage. Your support team keeps giving automated replies without fixing the line.
translated_text_en: Since the heavy rains started yesterday, my broadband connection has been completely dead in the Salt Lake area. I am a software engineer working from home and I am losing my billable hours because of this outage. Your support team keeps giving automated replies without fixing the line.
reply: We understand the urgency. Our field engineers are working on a major fiber cut in your area and service will be restored by 6 PM today.

complaint_text: मैंने पर्सनल लोन के लिए अप्लाई किया था और सारे डॉक्यूमेंट्स भी जमा कर दिए हैं. फिर भी बैंक की तरफ से कोई अपडेट नहीं मिल रहा है और मैनेजर कॉल भी नहीं उठा रहा. मुझे अर्जेंट पैसों की जरुरत है वरना मेरा बिजनेस डूब जाएगा.
translated_text_en: I had applied for a personal loan and submitted all documents. Still, there is no update from the bank's side and the manager is not picking up calls. I need the money urgently otherwise my business will fail.
reply: आपकी फाइल अभी वेरिफिकेशन स्टेज पर है. हमने इसे प्रायोरिटी पर डाल दिया है और कल शाम तक आपको फाइनल स्टेटस मिल जाएगा.

complaint_text: Mere credit card se 20,000 ki transaction hui hai jo maine nahi ki. Mujhe lag raha hai mera card hack ho gaya hai ya info leak hui hai. Please card ko block karo aur is payment ko dispute mein daalo urgently.
translated_text_en: A transaction of 20,000 has happened from my credit card which I did not do. I feel my card has been hacked or info leaked. Please block the card and put this payment in dispute urgently.
reply: Card has been blocked immediately. We have registered a fraud claim and you will not be liable for this amount pending investigation.

complaint_text: I purchased a refrigerator last month and it has already stopped cooling. I have called the service center five times, but no technician has visited my home yet. This is a very expensive appliance and I am worried all my food will get spoiled today.
translated_text_en: I purchased a refrigerator last month and it has already stopped cooling. I have called the service center five times, but no technician has visited my home yet. This is a very expensive appliance and I am worried all my food will get spoiled today.
reply: We regret the delay in service. A senior technician has been assigned and will reach your location before 2 PM today.

complaint_text: गैस एजेंसी वाले पिछले चार दिनों से सिलेंडर डिलीवरी के लिए टाल-मटोल कर रहे हैं. बुकिंग स्टेटस में डिलीवर्ड दिखा रहा है जबकि हमें कुछ नहीं मिला. घर में खाना बनाने के लिए गैस खत्म हो चुकी है और हम बहुत परेशान हैं.
translated_text_en: The gas agency people have been procrastinating on cylinder delivery for the last four days. The booking status shows delivered while we received nothing. We have run out of gas for cooking at home and we are very troubled.
reply: एजेंसी से बात हो गई है, वे तकनीकी गलती थी. सिलेंडर आज शाम तक आपके घर पहुँच जाएगा.

complaint_text: Order toh time pe aaya par khana bilkul thanda aur bacha kucha lag raha tha. Pizza ki topping bikhri hui thi aur box poora oil se bhara tha. Please apne delivery partners ko bolo ki dhyan se handling karein, ye khane layak nahi hai.
translated_text_en: The order came on time but the food was totally cold and looked like leftovers. The pizza topping was scattered and the box was full of oil. Please tell your delivery partners to handle with care, this is not edible.
reply: Aapke kharab anubhav ke liye maafi. Humne poora refund initiate kar diya hai aur restaurant ko warning bhej di hai.

complaint_text: The driver of the cab I booked today was extremely unprofessional and was driving very rashly. He was constantly talking on the phone and refused to turn on the AC despite the scorching heat. I felt very unsafe during the entire journey and will not use your app again.
translated_text_en: The driver of the cab I booked today was extremely unprofessional and was driving very rashly. He was constantly talking on the phone and refused to turn on the AC despite the scorching heat. I felt very unsafe during the entire journey and will not use your app again.
reply: We take safety very seriously. The driver has been suspended pending an inquiry and we are issuing a full refund for your trip.

complaint_text: मेरा पार्सल वाराणसी पोस्ट ऑफिस में तीन दिन से अटका हुआ है. ट्रैकिंग दिखा रही है कि आउट फॉर डिलीवरी है लेकिन कोई घर नहीं आया. इसमें मेरी दवाइयां हैं जो मुझे रोज लेनी होती हैं, कृपया इसे जल्द डिलीवर करवाएं.
translated_text_en: My parcel has been stuck at the Varanasi post office for three days. Tracking shows it's out for delivery but no one came home. It contains my medicines which I have to take daily, please get it delivered soon.
reply: क्षमा करें, आपके क्षेत्र में स्टाफ की कमी के कारण देरी हुई. हमने आपकी दवाइयों को प्राथमिकता दी है और वे आज दोपहर तक वितरित हो जाएंगी.

complaint_text: Maine online medicines mangwayi thi par expired stock bhej diya gaya hai. Box ke upar ki date mitti hui hai par andar strip pe expired likha hai. Agar koi bimar banda ye kha leta toh kaun zimmedar hota? Boht hi careless ho tum log.
translated_text_en: I ordered medicines online but expired stock has been sent. The date on top of the box is erased but the strip inside says expired. If a sick person had eaten this, who would be responsible? You guys are very careless.
reply: Hum is gambhir chuk ke liye maafi maangte hain. Please wo dawai consume na karein, hum fresh batch bhej rahe hain aur investigation shuru kar di hai.

complaint_text: I suspect that the brand-name shoes I bought from your platform during the sale are counterfeit. The stitching is uneven and the logo looks different from the original ones I saw in the store. This is a clear case of fraud and I want my money back immediately.
translated_text_en: I suspect that the brand-name shoes I bought from your platform during the sale are counterfeit. The stitching is uneven and the logo looks different from the original ones I saw in the store. This is a clear case of fraud and I want my money back immediately.
reply: We guarantee 100% authenticity. Please share photos of the product; we will verify with the brand and if found faulty, a full refund will be issued.

complaint_text: The interest rate mentioned in my home loan agreement is different from what was promised during the meeting. I feel like I was misled by your sales executive just to reach their monthly targets. I need a written clarification on why this discrepancy exists before I sign the final papers.
translated_text_en: The interest rate mentioned in my home loan agreement is different from what was promised during the meeting. I feel like I was misled by your sales executive just to reach their monthly targets. I need a written clarification on why this discrepancy exists before I sign the final papers.
reply: There might be a misunderstanding regarding the floating rate. Our relationship manager will visit you tomorrow to clarify the terms in detail.

complaint_text: The smartphone I purchased on Monday has a dead pixel in the center of the screen. I am very disappointed as this was a gift for my father's birthday. I want a replacement before this weekend starts. This is unacceptable for a brand like yours.
translated_text_en: Same
reply: We are sorry to hear this. We have scheduled a pickup and replacement for tomorrow.

complaint_text: मैंने खाने का आर्डर दिया था जो २ घंटे बाद भी नहीं पहुँचा है। रेस्टोरेंट वाले फ़ोन नहीं उठा रहे और आपका डिलीवरी पार्टनर लोकेशन पर नहीं है। मुझे भूख लगी है और मेरा पैसा भी कट गया है। कृपया तुरंत मेरा आर्डर कैंसिल करें और रिफंड दें।
translated_text_en: I ordered food which has not arrived even after 2 hours. The restaurant is not picking up the phone and your delivery partner is not at the location. I am hungry and my money has been deducted. Please cancel my order and refund immediately.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफ़ी चाहते हैं। आपका रिफंड प्रोसेस कर दिया गया है और 24 घंटे में मिल जायेगा।

complaint_text: Bhai mera UPI payment fail ho gaya par bank se 5000 rupaye kat gaye hain. App me status pending dikha raha hai aur shopkeeper bol raha hai use paise nahi mile. Jaldi check karo mera paisa kahan hai aur refund kab tak aayega. Bahut bada scam lag raha hai ye.
translated_text_en: Brother my UPI payment failed but 5000 rupees were deducted from the bank. The app shows pending status and the shopkeeper says he didn't get the money. Check quickly where my money is and when the refund will come. This feels like a big scam.
reply: Please don't worry. If the amount is deducted, it will be refunded within 3-5 working days.

complaint_text: I ordered a size M dress but received an XL instead. The quality of the fabric is also very poor compared to the pictures shown on the website. I want to return this item immediately and I expect a full refund. Your size charts are very misleading.
translated_text_en: Same
reply: We apologize for the error. A return agent will be assigned to your address within 48 hours.

complaint_text: मेरा वाशिंग मशीन ३ दिन से खराब पड़ा है और कोई भी टेक्नीशियन नहीं आया। कस्टमर केयर वाले सिर्फ आश्वासन दे रहे हैं पर काम कुछ नहीं हो रहा। गर्मी में कपड़े धोने में बहुत दिक्कत हो रही है। क्या आप लोग अपनी सर्विस सुधारेंगे या मैं कंज्यूमर कोर्ट जाऊं?
translated_text_en: My washing machine has been broken for 3 days and no technician has arrived. Customer care is only giving assurances but nothing is happening. It is very difficult to wash clothes in this heat. Will you improve your service or should I go to consumer court?
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। हमने आपके एरिया के सीनियर टेक्नीशियन को यह केस असाइन कर दिया है।

complaint_text: Mera cashback offer apply nahi hua jabki maine saari conditions follow ki thin. Customer support bol raha hai ki offer expire ho gaya par app par abhi bhi dikha raha hai. Ye toh seedha seedha customers ko ullu banana hua. Mujhe mera ₹500 cashback wapas chahiye.
translated_text_en: My cashback offer was not applied even though I followed all conditions. Customer support says the offer expired but it's still showing on the app. This is clearly fooling customers. I want my ₹500 cashback back.
reply: We regret the confusion. We are checking the offer eligibility and will update you shortly.

complaint_text: My credit card was charged twice for the same flight booking on your portal. One transaction is successful and the other is showing as failed but the amount is not reversed. I need this rectified as it is a large sum of money. Please share the transaction reference for the reversal.
translated_text_en: Same
reply: We have identified the double charge. The refund for the second transaction has been initiated.

complaint_text: मेरे अकाउंट से बिना किसी ओटीपी के पैसे कट गए हैं। मैंने कोई ट्रांजेक्शन नहीं किया फिर भी मेसेज आया कि १५०० रुपये कट गए। कृपया मेरा कार्ड तुरंत ब्लॉक करें और जांच करें कि ये कैसे हुआ। मुझे डर है कि मेरा अकाउंट हैक हो गया है।
translated_text_en: Money was deducted from my account without any OTP. I did not make any transaction yet I received a message that 1500 rupees were deducted. Please block my card immediately and investigate how this happened. I fear my account is hacked.
reply: हमने आपका कार्ड ब्लॉक कर दिया है। हमारी फ्रॉड टीम इस मामले की जांच कर रही है।

complaint_text: Delivery boy ka behavior bahut hi rude tha aaj subah. Usne mere gate par parcel fenk diya aur batameezi se baat ki jab maine use sign karne ko kaha. Aise logon ko aap kaam par kaise rakhte hain? I am very unhappy with this kind of service in my society.
translated_text_en: The delivery boy's behavior was very rude this morning. He threw the parcel at my gate and spoke rudely when I asked him to sign. How do you employ such people? I am very unhappy with this kind of service in my society.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the driver's behavior. We are taking strict action against the agency.

complaint_text: I have been trying to cancel my premium subscription for the last two days but the button is not working. Every time I click cancel, the app crashes or shows a generic error. I do not want to be billed for the next month. Fix this bug immediately and confirm my cancellation.
translated_text_en: Same
reply: We are sorry for the technical issue. Your subscription has been manually cancelled from our end.
