complaint_text: आर्डर किये हुए १० दिन हो गए हैं और ट्रैकिंग अभी भी दिल्ली ही दिखा रहा है। मुझे ये सामान अपनी बहन की शादी के लिए चाहिए था जो कल है। अब इसका कोई फायदा नहीं है अगर ये समय पर नहीं आता। कृपया आर्डर कैंसिल कर के मेरा पूरा पैसा वापस दें।
translated_text_en: It has been 10 days since I ordered and the tracking still shows Delhi. I needed this item for my sister's wedding which is tomorrow. Now it's of no use if it doesn't arrive on time. Please cancel the order and return my full money.
reply: शादी के अवसर के लिए हमें खेद है। आपका आर्डर कैंसिल कर दिया गया है और रिफंड भेज दिया गया है।

complaint_text: Maine laptop bag order kiya tha par box me sirf ek purani book nikli. Ye toh fraud hai, lagta hai raste me kisi ne badal diya. Maine unboxing video bhi banayi hai proof ke liye. Mujhe mera sahi product chahiye ya phir paise wapas do jaldi.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop bag but only an old book came in the box. This is fraud, looks like someone swapped it on the way. I have made an unboxing video for proof. I want my correct product or give my money back quickly.
reply: This is serious. Please share the unboxing video; we will investigate and resolve this today.

complaint_text: The air conditioner I bought last month has started making a very loud noise and the cooling is not effective. I registered a complaint a week ago but no one has come to inspect it. It is extremely hot and I am unable to sleep. Please send a technician today.
translated_text_en: Same
reply: We apologize for the delay. A technician has been dispatched and will reach you in 2 hours.

complaint_text: रिफंड स्टेटस 'सक्सेसफुल' दिखा रहा है लेकिन बैंक स्टेटमेंट में कोई पैसा नहीं आया। मैंने ५ दिन इंतज़ार किया जैसा आपने कहा था। अब आप लोग कह रहे हैं कि बैंक से बात करो। ये आपकी जिम्मेदारी है कि मेरा पैसा मुझे मिले।
translated_text_en: Refund status shows 'successful' but no money has arrived in the bank statement. I waited for 5 days as you said. Now you guys are saying talk to the bank. It is your responsibility that I get my money.
reply: बैंक को ट्रांजेक्शन प्रोसेस करने में समय लग सकता है। यहाँ आपका 'RRN' नंबर है जिससे आप बैंक से पता कर सकते हैं।

complaint_text: App update ke baad se login hi nahi ho raha hai. 'Something went wrong' wala error aa raha hai baar baar. Maine app reinstall bhi kiya par koi fayda nahi hua. Mere wallet me paise hain jo main use nahi kar paa raha hoon, please help.
translated_text_en: Since the app update, I am unable to login. 'Something went wrong' error is coming repeatedly. I even reinstalled the app but no luck. I have money in my wallet which I am unable to use, please help.
reply: We are aware of this bug in the new version. Please try logging in via our website for now.

complaint_text: I received a message saying my order was delivered but I have not received anything. I was at home all day and no one rang the bell or called me. Please check who signed for the delivery as it might have been delivered to the wrong address.
translated_text_en: Same
reply: We are checking with the delivery partner. We will verify the GPS coordinates of the delivery.

complaint_text: क्या आपके पास कोई कस्टमर सपोर्ट एजेंट है जो हिंदी समझता हो? मैंने तीन बार फ़ोन किया और हर बार मुझे अंग्रेजी में बात करने को कहा गया। ये बहुत अपमानजनक है। मुझे अपनी इन्शुरन्स पालिसी के बारे में कुछ पूछना है पर कोई मदद नहीं मिल रही।
translated_text_en: Do you have any customer support agent who understands Hindi? I called three times and every time I was asked to speak in English. This is very insulting. I need to ask something about my insurance policy but I'm not getting any help.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारा एक हिंदी भाषी एजेंट आपको अगले ५ मिनट में कॉल करेगा।

complaint_text: Mera parcel 'Out for Delivery' dikha raha tha subah se aur ab 'Delivery Attempted' likh kar aa gaya. Main ghar pe hi tha, koi nahi aaya aur na hi kisi ne call kiya. Ye delivery wale jhooth kyun bolte hain? Dobara delivery kab hogi?
translated_text_en: My parcel was showing 'Out for Delivery' since morning and now it says 'Delivery Attempted'. I was at home, nobody came and nobody called. Why do these delivery people lie? When will the redelivery happen?
reply: We apologize for this. We have instructed the hub to ensure delivery by 10 AM tomorrow.

complaint_text: I am trying to change my registered mobile number but the OTP is being sent to my old number which is no longer active. I have uploaded my Aadhaar for verification as requested but still no response from your side. How am I supposed to access my account?
translated_text_en: Same
reply: We have verified your documents. Your new mobile number will be updated within 24 hours.

complaint_text: The refrigerator delivered today has multiple dents on the side panel and the door handle is loose. It looks like a refurbished unit rather than a brand new one. I am not accepting this product. Please arrange for a pickup and send a fresh unit immediately.
translated_text_en: Same
reply: We are extremely sorry. A fresh unit is being dispatched and the damaged one will be picked up simultaneously.

complaint_text: I ordered a Samsung M34 from your app yesterday but received a soap bar instead. This is absolute fraud and I am going to report this to the consumer court. Please initiate a refund immediately as I need the money for my studies.
translated_text_en: I ordered a Samsung M34 from your app yesterday but received a soap bar instead. This is absolute fraud and I am going to report this to the consumer court. Please initiate a refund immediately as I need the money for my studies.
reply: We apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is investigating the warehouse logs.

complaint_text: मेरा बैंक अकाउंट से 5000 रुपये कट गए हैं लेकिन बिजली का बिल अभी भी पेंडिंग दिखा रहा है। यह बहुत ही गलत बात है कि पैसे कटने के बाद भी अपडेट नहीं हुआ। कृपया जल्द से जल्द चेक करें वरना मुझे पेनल्टी भरनी पड़ेगी।
translated_text_en: Rs 5000 have been deducted from my bank account but the electricity bill is still showing as pending. It is very wrong that it hasn't updated even after the deduction. Please check as soon as possible or I will have to pay a penalty.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका भुगतान 24 घंटों में अपडेट हो जाएगा।

complaint_text: Maine Swiggy se khana mangwaya tha par delivery boy ne call hi nahi kiya aur order cancelled dikha raha hai. Refund ka koi option nahi mil raha app pe. Ye toh loot machi hai, mera 800 rupaye wapas karo.
translated_text_en: I ordered food from Swiggy but the delivery boy didn't even call and it's showing as order cancelled. I'm not finding any refund option on the app. This is loot, return my 800 rupees.
reply: Apologies for the delivery issue. We are processing your refund.

complaint_text: My UPI transaction of 12000 INR to my landlord failed, but the amount was debited from my HDFC account. The app says transaction successful but he has not received it yet. This is very urgent as today is the last date for rent.
translated_text_en: My UPI transaction of 12000 INR to my landlord failed, but the amount was debited from my HDFC account. The app says transaction successful but he has not received it yet. This is very urgent as today is the last date for rent.
reply: Transactions can take 3-5 days to settle. Please check with the beneficiary bank.

complaint_text: पिछले तीन दिनों से मेरा इंटरनेट काम नहीं कर रहा है और कस्टमर केयर वाले कोई जवाब नहीं दे रहे। वर्क फ्रॉम होम की वजह से मेरा बहुत नुकसान हो रहा है। अगर आज ठीक नहीं हुआ तो मैं कनेक्शन कटवा दूंगा।
translated_text_en: My internet has not been working for the last three days and customer care is not giving any response. I am suffering a lot because of work from home. If it's not fixed today, I will disconnect the connection.
reply: हमें दुख है। आपकी शिकायत दर्ज कर ली गई है और तकनीशियन जल्द ही आएंगे।

complaint_text: Zomato se jo biryani mangwayi thi wo bilkul thandi aur basi thi. Maine complain ki par bot sirf same replies de raha hai. Meri family ne wo khana fek diya, please full refund process kijiye.
translated_text_en: The biryani I ordered from Zomato was completely cold and stale. I complained but the bot is giving the same replies. My family threw the food away, please process a full refund.
reply: Ham maafi chahte hain. Refund request process kar di gayi hai.

complaint_text: The flight SG-123 from Chennai to Kolkata was cancelled at the last minute without prior notice. I had a medical emergency and now I am stuck at the airport. I demand a full refund and compensation for the mental agony.
translated_text_en: The flight SG-123 from Chennai to Kolkata was cancelled at the last minute without prior notice. I had a medical emergency and now I am stuck at the airport. I demand a full refund and compensation for the mental agony.
reply: We deeply regret the flight cancellation. A full refund has been initiated.

complaint_text: मैंने अमेज़न से एक साड़ी मंगवाई थी पर उसका रंग और फैब्रिक वैसा नहीं है जैसा फोटो में था। रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट बार बार रिजेक्ट हो रही है। मुझे मेरा पैसा वापस चाहिए या फिर एक्सचेंज करवा दो।
translated_text_en: I ordered a saree from Amazon but its color and fabric are not like what was in the photo. The return request is being rejected repeatedly. I want my money back or get it exchanged.
reply: क्षमा करें। आपकी रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट को फिर से चेक किया जा रहा है।

complaint_text: Reliance Digital se washing machine li thi, delivery ke time box fata hua tha. Delivery wale bole ki andar sab sahi hai par jab khola toh machine pe bada dent tha. Please isko replace karo jaldi.
translated_text_en: I bought a washing machine from Reliance Digital, the box was torn at the time of delivery. Delivery guys said everything is fine inside but when opened there was a big dent on the machine. Please replace it quickly.
reply: Hamare delivery partner se check karke replacement schedule karenge.

complaint_text: I am receiving constant promotional calls from your insurance department even after registering for DND. It is extremely annoying to get disturbed during office hours. Take my number off your list immediately or I will take legal action.
translated_text_en: I am receiving constant promotional calls from your insurance department even after registering for DND. It is extremely annoying to get disturbed during office hours. Take my number off your list immediately or I will take legal action.
reply: We apologize for the calls. Your number has been added to our internal DND list.

complaint_text: गैस बुकिंग किए हुए 5 दिन हो गए पर अभी तक सिलिंडर नहीं आया। एजेंसी वाले फोन नहीं उठा रहे हैं। घर में खाना बनाने की बहुत दिक्कत हो रही है। कृपया स्टेटस अपडेट करें।
translated_text_en: It's been 5 days since the gas booking but the cylinder hasn't arrived yet. Agency people are not picking up the phone. There is a lot of trouble cooking at home. Please update the status.
reply: देरी के लिए खेद है। आपकी गैस एजेंसी को निर्देश भेज दिया गया है।

complaint_text: My Uber driver was very rude and drove rashly near the highway. He refused to turn on the AC even after multiple requests in this heat. I felt unsafe during the whole journey and will never use this app again.
translated_text_en: My Uber driver was very rude and drove rashly near the highway. He refused to turn on the AC even after multiple requests in this heat. I felt unsafe during the whole journey and will never use this app again.
reply: Safety is our priority. We are taking action against the driver partner.

complaint_text: I tried to withdraw 2000 from an SBI ATM in Indore but the machine showed a timeout. However, the money was deducted from my account. I have the transaction slip and I need this resolved within 24 hours.
translated_text_en: I tried to withdraw 2000 from an SBI ATM in Indore but the machine showed a timeout. However, the money was deducted from my account. I have the transaction slip and I need this resolved within 24 hours.
reply: Transaction reversals usually take 7 days. We have logged your complaint.

complaint_text: मैंने पॉलिसीबाजार से हेल्थ इंश्योरेंस लिया था पर क्लेम के समय हॉस्पिटल बोल रहा है कि ये मान्य नहीं है। मुझे इमरजेंसी में अपनी जेब से पैसे देने पड़े। आपकी सर्विस बहुत ही बेकार है।
translated_text_en: I took health insurance from PolicyBazaar but at the time of claim, the hospital is saying it's not valid. I had to pay from my pocket in an emergency. Your service is very pathetic.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफ़ी। कृपया क्लेम के दस्तावेज हमारे ईमेल पर भेजें।

complaint_text: Flipkart se laptop order kiya tha par screen cracked nikli. Jab maine replacement manga toh customer care keh raha hai ki physical damage policy me nahi hai. Ye mera fault thodi hai, box hi damage tha.
translated_text_en: Ordered a laptop from Flipkart but the screen was cracked. When I asked for replacement, customer care is saying physical damage is not in policy. This isn't my fault, the box itself was damaged.
reply: Khed hai, hum technician bhej kar physical inspection karwayenge.

complaint_text: The internet speed on my fiber connection is barely 2Mbps whereas I pay for 100Mbps. I have complained five times this month but the issue persists. This is a total waste of my subscription fee and I want a refund for this month.
translated_text_en: The internet speed on my fiber connection is barely 2Mbps whereas I pay for 100Mbps. I have complained five times this month but the issue persists. This is a total waste of my subscription fee and I want a refund for this month.
reply: We are sorry. A line check is being performed on your connection right now.

complaint_text: ट्रेन की टिकट कैंसिल की थी एक हफ्ते पहले पर अभी तक पैसा वापस नहीं आया। आईआरसीटीसी की साइट पर रिफंड प्रोसेस्ड दिखा रहा है। मेरे बैंक से बात की तो वो बोल रहे हैं कि आपकी तरफ से कोई पैसा नहीं आया।
translated_text_en: Cancelled the train ticket a week ago but the money hasn't come back yet. IRCTC site is showing refund processed. Spoke to my bank and they are saying no money has come from your side.
reply: रिफंड प्रक्रिया में कभी-कभी समय लगता है। कृपया अपने बैंक से फिर संपर्क करें।

complaint_text: Airtel ka bill double aa gaya is baar pata nahi kyun. Maine koi extra pack nahi liya aur na hi roaming pe tha. Customer care pe call wait time 20 minute hai, please rectify kijiye jaldi.
translated_text_en: Airtel bill came double this time, don't know why. I didn't take any extra pack nor was I on roaming. Call wait time on customer care is 20 minutes, please rectify quickly.
reply: Ham bill details check karke apko 24 ghante me update denge.

complaint_text: I ordered groceries from Blinkit and half the items were missing from the bag. The delivery partner said he delivered what was given at the store. I need those items immediately or a refund for the missing ones.
translated_text_en: I ordered groceries from Blinkit and half the items were missing from the bag. The delivery partner said he delivered what was given at the store. I need those items immediately or a refund for the missing ones.
reply: We are checking with the store manager. Refund for missing items is processed.

complaint_text: The AC I bought from Croma stopped working within two weeks. The service center technician came but said parts are not available. It is peak summer and I am unable to sleep. Please replace the unit immediately.
translated_text_en: The AC I bought from Croma stopped working within two weeks. The service center technician came but said parts are not available. It is peak summer and I am unable to sleep. Please replace the unit immediately.
reply: We regret the delay. We are expediting the part procurement or unit replacement.

complaint_text: I ordered a laptop from your site three days ago and it still shows as 'Processing' in the app. This is completely unacceptable because I need it for my new job starting this Monday. Please expedite the delivery or I will have to cancel and go elsewhere immediately.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop from your site three days ago and it still shows as 'Processing' in the app. This is completely unacceptable because I need it for my new job starting this Monday. Please expedite the delivery or I will have to cancel and go elsewhere immediately.
reply: We apologize for the delay. We are looking into your shipment status and will expedite it.

complaint_text: मेरा पार्सल आज मिला पर इसमें गलत सामान है। मैंने एक ब्रांडेड शर्ट मंगवाई थी लेकिन बॉक्स में एक फटी हुई पुरानी टी-शर्ट निकली। यह बहुत ही शर्मनाक बात है, कृपया मेरा पैसा तुरंत वापस करें।
translated_text_en: I received my parcel today but it contains the wrong item. I ordered a branded shirt but found a torn old t-shirt in the box. This is very shameful, please refund my money immediately.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। हम आपका रिटर्न और रिफंड प्रोसेस शुरू कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Mera UPI payment fail ho gaya par bank account se paise cut gaye hain. Shopkeeper keh raha hai ki usse paise nahi mile aur mera order bhi confirm nahi hua. Please check kariye mera refund kab tak wapas aayega?
translated_text_en: My UPI payment failed but money was deducted from my bank account. The shopkeeper says he didn't receive the money and my order isn't confirmed. Please check when my refund will come back.
reply: Your refund will be automatically credited to your bank within 3-5 business days.

complaint_text: The application keeps crashing every time I try to add an item to my shopping cart. I have cleared my cache and even reinstalled the app but the issue persists. This is making it impossible for me to shop during your festive sale.
translated_text_en: The application keeps crashing every time I try to add an item to my shopping cart. I have cleared my cache and even reinstalled the app but the issue persists. This is making it impossible for me to shop during your festive sale.
reply: Our technical team is working on a fix for the app crash. Please try using the website.

complaint_text: मुझे रिफंड अभी तक नहीं मिला है जबकि आइटम 5 दिन पहले आपके कूरियर ने वापस ले लिया था। कस्टमर केयर से कल बात की तो उन्होंने बोला कि 24 घंटे में आ जाएगा। अब तक कुछ नहीं हुआ, मुझे मेरे पैसे चाहिए।
translated_text_en: I haven't received the refund even though the item was picked up by your courier 5 days ago. I spoke to customer care yesterday and they said it would arrive in 24 hours. Nothing has happened yet, I want my money.
reply: हमें खेद है, हम आपके रिफंड की स्थिति की जांच कर रहे हैं और जल्द ही अपडेट देंगे।

complaint_text: Delivery boy ka behavior bahut rude tha aaj subah. Usne mere gate par parcel phenk diya aur call par badtameezi se baat ki. Main aapki service se bilkul khush nahi hoon, ye kaisa staff rakha hai?
translated_text_en: The delivery boy's behavior was very rude this morning. He threw the parcel at my gate and spoke rudely on the call. I am not happy at all with your service, what kind of staff is this?
reply: We are sorry for this experience. We are taking strict action against the delivery partner.

complaint_text: I received the dinner set today and half of the plates are shattered into pieces. The packaging was extremely poor for such a fragile item. I want a replacement sent immediately with better protection.
translated_text_en: I received the dinner set today and half of the plates are shattered into pieces. The packaging was extremely poor for such a fragile item. I want a replacement sent immediately with better protection.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the damage. A free replacement has been scheduled for you.

complaint_text: मेरा अकाउंट बिना किसी वजह के लॉक कर दिया गया है। मेरे वॉलेट में 2000 रुपये थे जिनका मैं इस्तेमाल नहीं कर पा रहा हूँ। कृपया इसे जल्दी खोलें क्योंकि मुझे बिजली का बिल भरना है।
translated_text_en: My account has been locked without any reason. I had 2000 rupees in my wallet which I am unable to use. Please unlock it quickly as I have to pay my electricity bill.
reply: सुरक्षा कारणों से अकाउंट लॉक हुआ है। कृपया अपना केवाईसी दस्तावेज अपलोड करें।

complaint_text: Promo code 'SAVE50' apply nahi ho raha hai checkout page par. Likha aa raha hai ki code valid hai par discount zero dikha raha hai. Mera time waste ho raha hai, please fix kijiye fast.
translated_text_en: The promo code 'SAVE50' is not applying on the checkout page. It says the code is valid but the discount shows as zero. My time is being wasted, please fix this fast.
reply: The promo code is valid only for specific categories. Please check the terms and conditions.

complaint_text: I have been trying to cancel my premium subscription for two weeks but the button is not working. You have charged me for another month even after my multiple emails. I demand a full refund for this unauthorized charge.
translated_text_en: I have been trying to cancel my premium subscription for two weeks but the button is not working. You have charged me for another month even after my multiple emails. I demand a full refund for this unauthorized charge.
reply: We have cancelled your subscription and initiated a refund for the last month's charge.

complaint_text: केवाईसी (KYC) वेरिफिकेशन के लिए मैंने सारे डाक्यूमेंट्स अपलोड कर दिए हैं फिर भी स्टेटस पेंडिंग ही दिखा रहा है। 10 दिन हो गए हैं और मेरा पैसा फंसा हुआ है। आप लोग काम क्यों नहीं कर रहे?
translated_text_en: I have uploaded all documents for KYC verification yet the status is still showing as pending. It has been 10 days and my money is stuck. Why are you guys not working?
reply: दस्तावेजों की जांच में समय लग रहा है। हम इसे अगले 48 घंटों में पूरा करने की कोशिश करेंगे।

complaint_text: Order number ORD2231 mein jo mobile mila hai wo refurbished lag raha hai. Box ki seal pehle se tooti hui thi aur phone par scratches hain. Maine naya phone pay kiya tha, ye dhokhadhadi hai!
translated_text_en: The mobile received in order ORD2231 looks refurbished. The box seal was already broken and there are scratches on the phone. I paid for a new phone, this is fraud!
reply: This is concerning. We are initiating a pickup and will send a brand-new unit.

complaint_text: I made a payment for my broadband bill via your app and the amount was deducted twice. Only one transaction is showing in my history but my bank statement shows two debits. I need the extra amount back.
translated_text_en: I made a payment for my broadband bill via your app and the amount was deducted twice. Only one transaction is showing in my history but my bank statement shows two debits. I need the extra amount back.
reply: We have detected the double payment and the extra amount will be refunded within 48 hours.

complaint_text: मेरी दवाइयाँ कल दोपहर तक आनी थीं पर अभी तक कूरियर वाले का कोई पता नहीं है। यह बहुत ज़रूरी मेडिसिन है और देरी की वजह से पेशेंट की तबियत बिगड़ सकती है। कृपया जल्दी भेजें।
translated_text_en: My medicines were supposed to arrive by yesterday afternoon but there is no sign of the courier. These are very essential medicines and the patient's health might worsen due to the delay. Please send quickly.
reply: असुविधा के लिए क्षमा करें। हम कूरियर पार्टनर से संपर्क कर रहे हैं और डिलीवरी जल्द सुनिश्चित करेंगे।

complaint_text: Maine combo pack order kiya tha par box mein sirf ek hi item nikla. Baaki ke 2 items missing hain. Har baar aapke saath yahi problem hoti hai, main thak gaya hoon complain karke.
translated_text_en: I ordered a combo pack but only one item was in the box. The other 2 items are missing. This same problem happens every time with you, I am tired of complaining.
reply: We apologize for the missing items. We are shipping the remaining products today.

complaint_text: The size 9 shoes I ordered are way too small, it feels like a size 7. The size chart on your website is completely misleading and wrong. I want an exchange for a larger size or a refund.
translated_text_en: The size 9 shoes I ordered are way too small, it feels like a size 7. The size chart on your website is completely misleading and wrong. I want an exchange for a larger size or a refund.
reply: We are sorry the fit wasn't right. You can initiate an exchange through the 'Orders' section.

complaint_text: गैस बुकिंग के लिए पैसे कट गए लेकिन एजेंसी कह रही है कि उनके पास कोई बुकिंग नहीं आई है। मेरा पैसा वापस करो या बुकिंग कन्फर्म करवाओ। मुझे बहुत परेशानी हो रही है।
translated_text_en: Money was deducted for gas booking but the agency says they haven't received any booking. Either return my money or confirm the booking. I am facing a lot of trouble.
reply: बुकिंग में देरी के लिए खेद है। आपका ट्रांजेक्शन अपडेट कर दिया गया है और एजेंसी को सूचित कर दिया गया है।

complaint_text: Refund status check karne ka koi option nahi mil raha app mein. 3 din ho gaye item return kiye hue but status wahi purana 'Out for pickup' dikha raha hai. System update kijiye apna.
translated_text_en: I can't find any option to check refund status in the app. It's been 3 days since the item was returned but the status still shows 'Out for pickup'. Update your system.
reply: The status update is slightly delayed. Your refund is already being processed.

complaint_text: I ordered food from a restaurant 5km away and it took 90 minutes to arrive. The food was stone cold and the packaging was leaking everywhere. I want a full refund for this mess.
translated_text_en: I ordered food from a restaurant 5km away and it took 90 minutes to arrive. The food was stone cold and the packaging was leaking everywhere. I want a full refund for this mess.
reply: We apologize for the cold food. A full refund has been credited to your wallet.

complaint_text: I noticed an unauthorized transaction of 5000 INR from my account today. I have not shared my OTP with anyone. Please block my card immediately and help me recover my funds.
translated_text_en: I noticed an unauthorized transaction of 5000 INR from my account today. I have not shared my OTP with anyone. Please block my card immediately and help me recover my funds.
reply: We have blocked your card immediately. Our fraud team will contact you for further investigation.

complaint_text: I ordered a smartphone last week and it was supposed to be delivered by yesterday. Now the tracking shows it is stuck in the warehouse. I need this urgently for my daughter's birthday.
translated_text_en: I ordered a smartphone last week and it was supposed to be delivered by yesterday. Now the tracking shows it is stuck in the warehouse. I need this urgently for my daughter's birthday.
reply: We apologize for the delay. We are escalating this to our logistics partner immediately.

complaint_text: मैंने कल अपना फोन रिचार्ज किया था लेकिन अभी तक टॉकटाइम नहीं मिला है। मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से 499 रुपये कट चुके हैं। कृपया इसे जल्द से जल्द ठीक करें क्योंकि मुझे ज़रूरी कॉल करनी है।
translated_text_en: I recharged my phone yesterday but haven't received the talktime yet. 499 rupees have been deducted from my bank account. Please fix this as soon as possible because I need to make urgent calls.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका रिफंड 24 घंटों के भीतर प्रोसेस कर दिया जाएगा।

complaint_text: Mera refund abhi tak nahi aaya hai 10 din ho gaye. Customer care ko call kiya toh wo bol rahe hain wait karo. Itna time kyun lag raha hai please check kijiye.
translated_text_en: My refund has not arrived yet, it has been 10 days. When I called customer care they said wait. Why is it taking so much time please check.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Aapka refund process ho chuka hai, 2-3 din mein bank mein dikhega.

complaint_text: The product I received is completely different from what I saw on the website. The quality is very poor and the size is also wrong. I want to return this immediately and get a full refund.
translated_text_en: The product I received is completely different from what I saw on the website. The quality is very poor and the size is also wrong. I want to return this immediately and get a full refund.
reply: We are sorry to hear that. A return request has been initiated and a pickup will be scheduled soon.

complaint_text: मेरे ऑर्डर की स्थिति 'डिलीवर्ड' दिखा रही है लेकिन मुझे कोई पैकेट नहीं मिला है। डिलीवरी बॉय का नंबर भी नहीं लग रहा है। यह बहुत ही गलत बात है, मेरे पैसे वापस करो।
translated_text_en: My order status is showing 'delivered' but I haven't received any packet. The delivery boy's number is not reachable. This is very wrong, return my money.
reply: हम इसकी जांच कर रहे हैं। चिंता न करें, अगर पैकेट नहीं मिला तो हम पूरा रिफंड देंगे।

complaint_text: UPI transaction fail ho gaya lekin paise cut gaye hain. Shopkeeper keh raha hai usse paise nahi mile. Please mera paisa wapas kijiye bahut dikkat ho rahi hai.
translated_text_en: The UPI transaction failed but the money has been deducted. The shopkeeper says he didn't receive the money. Please return my money, I am facing a lot of trouble.
reply: Transaction details check kar rahe hain. 3-5 working days mein refund aa jayega.

complaint_text: I have been trying to reach your support team for the last three days but no one is responding. My washing machine has stopped working within two weeks of purchase. This is very frustrating service.
translated_text_en: I have been trying to reach your support team for the last three days but no one is responding. My washing machine has stopped working within two weeks of purchase. This is very frustrating service.
reply: We sincerely apologize. An engineer has been assigned and will visit your location tomorrow.

complaint_text: पैकेट की पैकिंग बहुत खराब थी और अंदर का सामान टूटा हुआ निकला। मैंने इसे गिफ्ट के लिए मंगाया था और अब समय निकल गया है। मुझे एक्सचेंज नहीं रिफंड चाहिए।
translated_text_en: The packaging was very poor and the item inside was broken. I ordered it as a gift and now the time has passed. I want a refund, not an exchange.
reply: क्षमा करें, टूटे हुए उत्पाद के लिए हम रिफंड की प्रक्रिया शुरू कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Order cancel kiya tha 5 din pehle par status abhi bhi 'Cancellation in progress' dikha raha hai. Bank mein paise kab tak aayenge? Thoda jaldi process karo yaar.
translated_text_en: Cancelled the order 5 days ago but the status is still showing 'Cancellation in progress'. By when will the money come in the bank? Please process it a bit fast.
reply: Technical error ki wajah se delay hua hai. Hum ise priority par solve kar rahe hain.

complaint_text: Your delivery executive was very rude to my mother during the delivery. He refused to come upstairs and was shouting on the phone. This behavior is unacceptable from your staff.
translated_text_en: Your delivery executive was very rude to my mother during the delivery. He refused to come upstairs and was shouting on the phone. This behavior is unacceptable from your staff.
reply: We are extremely sorry for this experience. We are taking strict action against the delivery partner.

complaint_text: I applied a promo code during checkout but the discount was not applied to the final amount. I have already paid the full price via credit card. Please adjust the difference as cashback.
translated_text_en: I applied a promo code during checkout but the discount was not applied to the final amount. I have already paid the full price via credit card. Please adjust the difference as cashback.
reply: We have verified the promo code and the difference amount will be credited to your wallet.

complaint_text: मुझे गलत साइज़ के जूते भेज दिए गए हैं। मैंने 9 नंबर मंगाया था और आपने 7 नंबर भेज दिया। रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट डाल रहा हूँ तो एरर आ रहा है।
translated_text_en: I have been sent the wrong size shoes. I ordered size 9 and you sent size 7. I am getting an error while placing a return request.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफ़ी। हमने आपके लिए रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट मैन्युअली दर्ज कर ली है।

complaint_text: Mera account login nahi ho raha hai OTP hi nahi aa raha phone pe. Char baar try kar liya par koi message nahi aaya. Please check karo kya issue hai app mein.
translated_text_en: I am unable to login to my account as I'm not receiving the OTP on my phone. Tried four times but no message arrived. Please check what the issue is in the app.
reply: Network issue ho sakta hai. Humne technical team ko inform kar diya hai.

complaint_text: The food delivered was cold and the containers were leaking. The quality was not at all like what I usually get from this restaurant. I want a refund for this specific item.
translated_text_en: The food delivered was cold and the containers were leaking. The quality was not at all like what I usually get from this restaurant. I want a refund for this specific item.
reply: We apologize for the poor food quality. A partial refund for the item has been initiated.

complaint_text: मेरी बिलिंग में गड़बड़ है। दो बार चार्ज काट लिया गया है एक ही ऑर्डर के लिए। कृपया फालतू पैसे वापस करें और स्टेटमेंट चेक करें।
translated_text_en: There is a mistake in my billing. I have been charged twice for the same order. Please return the extra money and check the statement.
reply: हम आपके ट्रांजेक्शन की जांच कर रहे हैं। अतिरिक्त राशि 48 घंटों में वापस कर दी जाएगी।

complaint_text: Courier boy ghar ke bahar se hi chala gaya aur likh diya 'customer not available'. Main pura din ghar pe tha aur koi call bhi nahi aaya. Ye cheating hai.
translated_text_en: The courier boy left from outside the house and wrote 'customer not available'. I was home all day and didn't even get a call. This is cheating.
reply: Inconvenience ke liye sorry. Hum aaj hi re-attempt karwa rahe hain.

complaint_text: The laptop battery is draining very fast and it gets heated up within 30 minutes of usage. I bought this only 2 days ago. I want a replacement for this defective piece.
translated_text_en: The laptop battery is draining very fast and it gets heated up within 30 minutes of usage. I bought this only 2 days ago. I want a replacement for this defective piece.
reply: We regret the inconvenience. We have scheduled a technician visit for inspection before replacement.

complaint_text: मैंने ग्रोसरी मंगाई थी और उसमें से दो किलो चीनी गायब है। डिलीवरी के समय मैंने ध्यान नहीं दिया लेकिन अब चेक किया तो पैकेट कम हैं। कृपया मेरी चीनी भेजिए या पैसे वापस दीजिए।
translated_text_en: I ordered groceries and two kilos of sugar are missing from it. I didn't notice at the time of delivery but now that I've checked, the packets are fewer. Please send my sugar or refund the money.
reply: मिसिंग आइटम्स के लिए हमें खेद है। चीनी की कीमत आपके वॉलेट में वापस कर दी गई है।

complaint_text: App baar baar crash ho rahi hai jab main payment karne ki koshish karta hoon. Update bhi kar liya par problem wahi hai. Isse mera time waste ho raha hai.
translated_text_en: The app crashes repeatedly whenever I try to make a payment. I have updated it too but the problem remains. This is wasting my time.
reply: Hum is bug par kaam kar rahe hain. Tab tak aap website se checkout kar sakte hain.

complaint_text: My subscription was auto-renewed without any prior notification. I wanted to cancel it last month but forgot, and now I am charged 2000 rupees. Please cancel it and refund the amount.
translated_text_en: My subscription was auto-renewed without any prior notification. I wanted to cancel it last month but forgot, and now I am charged 2000 rupees. Please cancel it and refund the amount.
reply: As per our policy, we have cancelled the subscription and processed a one-time refund.

complaint_text: I received a completely different product than what I ordered on your app. I ordered a pair of noise-cancelling headphones but received a cheap wired one instead. This is unacceptable and I want a full refund immediately. My sister's birthday is tomorrow and this was her gift.
translated_text_en: I received a completely different product than what I ordered on your app. I ordered a pair of noise-cancelling headphones but received a cheap wired one instead. This is unacceptable and I want a full refund immediately. My sister's birthday is tomorrow and this was her gift.
reply: We are sorry for the mix-up. A pickup has been scheduled for the wrong item and your refund will be processed upon inspection.

complaint_text: मैंने एक स्मार्ट वॉच ऑर्डर की थी जो कल मुझे मिली लेकिन वो चालू ही नहीं हो रही है। चार्ज करने पर भी डिस्प्ले में कुछ नहीं आ रहा है। मुझे ये डिफेक्टिव पीस वापस करना है और पैसे वापस चाहिए। आप लोग ग्राहकों को पुराना सामान क्यों बेच रहे हैं?
translated_text_en: I ordered a smart watch which I received yesterday but it is not even turning on. Even after charging, nothing is appearing on the display. I want to return this defective piece and want my money back. Why are you people selling old items to customers?
reply: असुविधा के लिए क्षमा करें। हम आपका रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट तुरंत स्वीकार कर रहे हैं और नया पीस भेज रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Bhai mera UPI payment fail ho gaya par bank account se 1500 rupaye cut gaye hain. Shopkeeper keh raha hai ki usko paise nahi mile aur mujhe bahut embarrassment face karni padi line mein. Please check karo mera paisa kahan atka hua hai jaldi refund karo. Itna ghatiya experience pehli baar hua hai.
translated_text_en: Brother, my UPI payment failed but 1500 rupees have been deducted from my bank account. The shopkeeper says he has not received the money and I had to face a lot of embarrassment in the line. Please check where my money is stuck and refund quickly. Such a bad experience for the first time.
reply: Please wait for 48 hours; if not settled, the amount will be reversed automatically to your bank account.

complaint_text: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor despite my leg injury. He threatened to cancel the order if I did not come down to the gate immediately. This kind of service is not expected from a brand like yours and I am highly disappointed.
translated_text_en: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor despite my leg injury. He threatened to cancel the order if I did not come down to the gate immediately. This kind of service is not expected from a brand like yours and I am highly disappointed.
reply: We have noted your feedback and will take strict action against the agent involved. A senior manager will contact you.

complaint_text: मेरे रिफंड का क्या हुआ? १० दिन हो गए हैं और अभी तक बैंक खाते में पैसे नहीं आए। आप लोग हर बार यही कहते हैं कि ४८ घंटे में आ जाएगा। अब मेरा सब्र खत्म हो रहा है, मुझे मेरे पैसे वापस चाहिए वरना मैं कंज्यूमर फोरम जाऊंगी।
translated_text_en: What happened to my refund? It has been 10 days and the money has not reached the bank account yet. You guys say every time that it will come in 48 hours. Now my patience is running out, I want my money back or I will go to consumer forum.
reply: हम आपके ट्रांजेक्शन की जांच कर रहे हैं। तकनीकी समस्या के कारण देरी हुई, अगले 24 घंटों में पैसे आपके खाते में होंगे।

complaint_text: Mera package 'Delivered' dikha raha hai par mujhe mila hi nahi. Security wale uncle bol rahe hain koi nahi aaya aaj subah se. Delivery boy ka number switch off aa raha hai, please jaldi help karo mera order kahan hai. Paisa pehle hi pay kar diya tha maine.
translated_text_en: My package is showing 'Delivered' but I haven't received it at all. The security uncle says no one has come since this morning. The delivery boy's number is switched off, please help quickly, where is my order? I had already paid the money.
reply: We are investigating the geo-location of the delivery. If the rider has made a mistake, we will send a fresh replacement immediately.

complaint_text: I tried to apply the 'FIRST50' coupon code on my first order but it keeps saying invalid. I am a new user and this is misleading advertising to attract customers. If the code does not work, I will cancel my cart and move to another app.
translated_text_en: I tried to apply the 'FIRST50' coupon code on my first order but it keeps saying invalid. I am a new user and this is misleading advertising to attract customers. If the code does not work, I will cancel my cart and move to another app.
reply: We apologize for the technical glitch. We have credited equivalent points to your wallet to match the discount.

complaint_text: सब्जियां बिल्कुल ताजी नहीं थीं, टमाटर तो आधे सड़े हुए निकले और पालक पूरी पीली थी। क्या आप इसी तरह की क्वालिटी देते हैं ग्राहकों को? मैं अब कभी आपके ऐप से ग्रॉसरी नहीं मंगवाऊंगा और सबको बताऊंगा कि यहाँ से कुछ न खरीदें।
translated_text_en: The vegetables were not fresh at all, half the tomatoes were rotten and the spinach was completely yellow. Is this the quality you provide to customers? I will never order groceries from your app again and will tell everyone not to buy from here.
reply: हमें खेद है कि आपको खराब उत्पाद मिले। हमने सड़े हुए सामान का पूरा रिफंड आपके वॉलेट में क्रेडिट कर दिया है।

complaint_text: App bar-bar crash ho rahi hai jab bhi main checkout karne ki koshish karta hoon. Do baar try kiya aur dono baar phone hang ho gaya payment page pe. Update karne ke baad bhi wahi problem hai please isko fix karo warna log use karna chhod denge.
translated_text_en: The app is crashing repeatedly whenever I try to checkout. Tried twice and both times the phone hung on the payment page. Same problem even after updating, please fix it otherwise people will stop using it.
reply: We are sorry for the technical bug. Our team is working on a fix; meanwhile, please try clearing your app cache.

complaint_text: My credit card was charged twice for the same transaction today. The first attempt showed a gateway error but the money was deducted anyway, and then the second one was successful. I need the first deduction of 5600 rupees back in my account immediately.
translated_text_en: My credit card was charged twice for the same transaction today. The first attempt showed a gateway error but the money was deducted anyway, and then the second one was successful. I need the first deduction of 5600 rupees back in my account immediately.
reply: The duplicate charge has been identified and will be automatically reversed by your bank within 5-7 working days.

complaint_text: मेरे घर का पता सही होने के बावजूद डिलीवरी वाला बोल रहा है कि एड्रेस नहीं मिल रहा। पिछले तीन दिनों से वो यही बहाना बना रहा है और मेरा सामान वापस भेज दिया। कृपया किसी और को भेजें जो मैप देख सके और काम चोरी न करे।
translated_text_en: Despite my home address being correct, the delivery person is saying the address cannot be found. He has been making this excuse for the last three days and sent my items back. Please send someone else who can read a map and not avoid work.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफी चाहते हैं। हम आपका ऑर्डर फिर से डिस्पैच कर रहे हैं और एक अनुभवी पार्टनर को नियुक्त कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Mera subscription apne aap renew ho gaya bina kisi notification ke. Maine auto-pay enable nahi kiya tha, toh 1499 rupaye kaise kat gaye? Mujhe mera paisa wapas chahiye kyunki mujhe ye service use nahi karni hai ab. Ye toh chori hai.
translated_text_en: My subscription got renewed automatically without any notification. I had not enabled auto-pay, so how was 1499 rupees deducted? I want my money back because I don't want to use this service anymore. This is like theft.
reply: We have cancelled the subscription as requested. The refund has been initiated and will reflect in your bank shortly.

complaint_text: The packaging of the liquid detergent was very poor and it leaked all over the other items in the box. Half of the bottle is empty and my expensive clothes in the same parcel are ruined. Please compensate me for this entire loss or I will take legal action.
translated_text_en: The packaging of the liquid detergent was very poor and it leaked all over the other items in the box. Half of the bottle is empty and my expensive clothes in the same parcel are ruined. Please compensate me for this entire loss or I will take legal action.
reply: We are deeply sorry for the leakage. A full replacement for all affected items is being shipped today at no extra cost.

complaint_text: कल रात को एक ट्रांजेक्शन किया था जो अभी तक पेंडिंग है और खाते से पैसे कट चुके हैं। कस्टमर केयर नंबर पर कॉल नहीं लग रहा है। क्या मेरा पैसा डूब गया? मुझे तुरंत जवाब चाहिए वरना मैं पुलिस में साइबर सेल की शिकायत करूँगा।
translated_text_en: Did a transaction last night which is still pending and money has been deducted from the account. Customer care number is not reachable. Is my money lost? I want an immediate answer or I will file a complaint with the police cyber cell.
reply: तकनीकी खराबी के कारण सर्वर धीमा है। आपका पैसा सुरक्षित है और शाम तक या तो ट्रांजेक्शन सफल होगा या रिफंड आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: Maine size XL order kiya tha par mujhe Small size bhej diya aap logo ne. Exchange ke liye apply kiya toh dikha raha hai ki mere area mein service nahi hai. Ab main iska kya karoon? Mera paisa waste ho gaya aur mujhe party mein ye pehenna tha.
translated_text_en: I ordered size XL but you guys sent me Small size. When I applied for exchange, it showed that the service is not available in my area. Now what should I do with this? My money is wasted and I wanted to wear this to a party.
reply: We apologize for the error. We are arranging a special manual pickup for your exchange request from your location.

complaint_text: I am trying to deactivate my account for the last three days but there is no option in the settings. This is a clear violation of user privacy and data laws. Delete my data and account immediately or I will report you to the authorities.
translated_text_en: I am trying to deactivate my account for the last three days but there is no option in the settings. This is a clear violation of user privacy and data laws. Delete my data and account immediately or I will report you to the authorities.
reply: We value your privacy. To deactivate your account, please verify your identity via the secure link sent to your registered email.

complaint_text: The laptop I bought has a significant battery drain issue since day one. It barely lasts an hour on a full charge while the website promised eight hours. This is not what was promised and I feel cheated after spending 55000 rupees. I want a replacement.
translated_text_en: The laptop I bought has a significant battery drain issue since day one. It barely lasts an hour on a full charge while the website promised eight hours. This is not what was promised and I feel cheated after spending 55000 rupees. I want a replacement.
reply: Our technician will visit your home for a diagnostic check within 48 hours to confirm the fault for replacement.

complaint_text: जींस का रंग पहली धुलाई में ही पूरा निकल गया और कपड़े की क्वालिटी भी खराब लग रही है। ये कोई ब्रांडेड प्रोडक्ट तो नहीं लग रहा, आपने मुझे नकली माल बेचा है। मुझे अपने पूरे पैसे वापस चाहिए, मैं ये कूड़ा नहीं रखूँगा।
translated_text_en: The color of the jeans completely faded in the first wash and the fabric quality also looks poor. This does not look like a branded product, you sold me a fake item. I want my full money back, I will not keep this junk.
reply: हमे खेद है। कृपया प्रोडक्ट की फोटो हमारे ऐप पर अपलोड करें, हम जांच के बाद रिफंड की प्रक्रिया तुरंत शुरू करेंगे।

complaint_text: Maine ek gift card kharida tha par uska code mere dost ko nahi mila email pe. Mere account se payment ho gayi hai aur invoice bhi aa gaya hai par code kahan hai? Dost ko gift bhejna tha par meri beizzati ho gayi. Please jaldi code bhejo.
translated_text_en: I bought a gift card but my friend did not receive the code on email. Payment is done from my account and invoice has also arrived, but where is the code? I had to send a gift to a friend but I got embarrassed. Please send the code quickly.
reply: We apologize for the delivery failure. The gift card code has been re-sent to the recipient and a copy is in your inbox.

complaint_text: I ordered essential medicines for my elderly parents and it was supposed to be 24-hour delivery. It has been 48 hours and the medicines are still not here, which is extremely dangerous. This is a matter of health and safety, please deliver it now.
translated_text_en: I ordered essential medicines for my elderly parents and it was supposed to be 24-hour delivery. It has been 48 hours and the medicines are still not here, which is extremely dangerous. This is a matter of health and safety, please deliver it now.
reply: We prioritize medical orders above all. A special rider has been dispatched and will reach your location within 30 minutes.

complaint_text: The delivery executive was very rude and refused to deliver the package to my doorstep in Colaba. He asked me to come down to the main gate even though I mentioned I have a leg injury. This is unacceptable behavior from a premium service provider. Please look into this matter and ensure a redelivery today.
translated_text_en: The delivery executive was very rude and refused to deliver the package to my doorstep in Colaba. He asked me to come down to the main gate even though I mentioned I have a leg injury. This is unacceptable behavior from a premium service provider. Please look into this matter and ensure a redelivery today.
reply: We apologize for the experience. We are re-assigning a different rider for your delivery today.

complaint_text: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy M34 but received a pack of detergent soaps instead. This is absolute fraud and I am shocked that such a big platform can do this. I have already uploaded the unboxing video as proof on your portal. I want my full refund or a replacement by tomorrow morning without fail.
translated_text_en: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy M34 but received a pack of detergent soaps instead. This is absolute fraud and I am shocked that such a big platform can do this. I have already uploaded the unboxing video as proof on your portal. I want my full refund or a replacement by tomorrow morning without fail.
reply: We are extremely sorry for this mix-up. Our investigation team is looking into the warehouse logs and will resolve this in 24 hours.

complaint_text: कल रात मैंने UPI से 2000 रुपये ट्रांसफर किए थे पर ट्रांजेक्शन फेल हो गई। मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से पैसे कट गए हैं लेकिन दुकानदार को नहीं मिले। दिल्ली के रोहिणी इलाके में नेटवर्क भी ठीक था फिर भी ऐसा हुआ। कृपया मेरा पैसा वापस दिलाएं क्योंकि मुझे बहुत जरूरत है।
translated_text_en: Last night I transferred 2000 rupees via UPI but the transaction failed. The money was deducted from my bank account but the shopkeeper didn't receive it. The network was fine in Rohini, Delhi, yet this happened. Please get my money back as I need it urgently.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका रिफंड 3-5 कार्य दिवसों में आपके खाते में आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: Mera refund abhi tak initiate nahi hua hai jabki maine item 4 din pehle return kar diya tha. Sector 62 ke courier boy ne bola tha ki 24 hours mein paisa aa jayega. Please check karke batao ki status kya hai. I am really disappointed with this delay.
translated_text_en: My refund hasn't been initiated yet even though I returned the item 4 days ago. The courier boy from Sector 62 said the money would arrive in 24 hours. Please check and tell me what the status is. I am really disappointed with this delay.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Aapka refund process ho chuka hai aur 2 din mein bank account mein reflect karega.

complaint_text: The air conditioner I purchased last week is making a loud grinding noise and is not cooling at all. I have called the service center in Gachibowli multiple times but no technician has visited yet. It is extremely hot and I have small children at home. This is a very poor after-sales experience for such a costly brand.
translated_text_en: The air conditioner I purchased last week is making a loud grinding noise and is not cooling at all. I have called the service center in Gachibowli multiple times but no technician has visited yet. It is extremely hot and I have small children at home. This is a very poor after-sales experience for such a costly brand.
reply: We regret the delay. An emergency technician has been assigned and will reach your location within 4 hours.

complaint_text: मैंने हजरतगंज स्टोर से एक नया कुर्ता मंगाया था लेकिन उसका रंग पूरी तरह से अलग है। वेबसाइट पर फोटो में यह गहरा लाल दिख रहा था पर मुझे पीला मिला है। मैं लखनऊ से बाहर जा रही हूँ और मुझे कल तक रिफंड चाहिए। आपकी रिटर्न पॉलिसी बहुत ही खराब है।
translated_text_en: I ordered a new kurta from the Hazratganj store but the color is completely different. In the website photo it looked dark red but I received yellow. I am going out of Lucknow and I need a refund by tomorrow. Your return policy is very bad.
reply: असुविधा के लिए हमें खेद है। हमने आपका रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट स्वीकार कर लिया है और कल सुबह पिकअप हो जाएगा।

complaint_text: App pe dikha raha hai ki delivery ho gayi par mujhe koi call nahi aaya. Security guard ke paas bhi koi parcel nahi hai. Kisine mera parcel chura liya hai ya delivery boy ne jhooth bola hai. Please isko check karo varna main police complain karunga.
translated_text_en: The app shows that delivery is done but I didn't get any call. There is no parcel with the security guard either. Someone has stolen my parcel or the delivery boy lied. Please check this or I will file a police complaint.
reply: Hum iski jaanch kar rahe hain. Delivery boy se baat karke hum aapko 1 ghante mein update dete hain.

complaint_text: I am unable to login to my banking app since this morning. It keeps showing a technical error even though I am using the correct credentials. I need to make an urgent payment for my daughter's school fees in T. Nagar. The customer care line is also busy for the last 30 minutes.
translated_text_en: I am unable to login to my banking app since this morning. It keeps showing a technical error even though I am using the correct credentials. I need to make an urgent payment for my daughter's school fees in T. Nagar. The customer care line is also busy for the last 30 minutes.
reply: We apologize for the technical glitch. Our servers are undergoing maintenance and will be back online shortly.

complaint_text: The broadband connection in my office at Prahlad Nagar has been down since yesterday. My entire team is unable to work and we are losing productivity. I have raised multiple tickets but they are closed without resolution. This is highly unprofessional for a corporate plan.
translated_text_en: The broadband connection in my office at Prahlad Nagar has been down since yesterday. My entire team is unable to work and we are losing productivity. I have raised multiple tickets but they are closed without resolution. This is highly unprofessional for a corporate plan.
reply: We are sorry for the downtime. A field engineer is on the way to fix the fiber cut in your area.

complaint_text: मेरे ई-वॉलेट से 500 रुपये अचानक गायब हो गए हैं। मैंने कोई ट्रांजेक्शन नहीं किया और न ही किसी को OTP दिया। पटना के फ्रेजर रोड वाले बैंक ब्रांच में गया तो उन्होंने बोला कि कस्टमर केयर पर बात करो। यह बहुत ही असुरक्षित महसूस हो रहा है।
translated_text_en: 500 rupees suddenly disappeared from my e-wallet. I didn't do any transaction nor did I give OTP to anyone. When I went to the Fraser Road bank branch in Patna, they told me to talk to customer care. This feels very insecure.
reply: आपके अकाउंट को सुरक्षा के लिए ब्लॉक कर दिया गया है। हमारी फ्रॉड टीम इसकी जांच कर रही है।

complaint_text: Kyc verification ke liye document upload kiye the 10 din ho gaye par abhi tak pending hai. Sector 17 wale office mein call kiya toh woh keh rahe hain online check karo. Bina kyc ke main apna account use nahi kar paa raha hoon. Please fast track kar do isko.
translated_text_en: I uploaded documents for KYC verification 10 days ago but it is still pending. When I called the Sector 17 office, they said check online. I cannot use my account without KYC. Please fast track this.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Aapka KYC verify ho gaya hai, ab aap apna account use kar sakte hain.

complaint_text: I received a damaged laptop today from your Salt Lake warehouse. The screen is cracked and the box was also torn from one side. I had paid the full amount online and now I am stuck with a broken machine. I need an immediate replacement or a full refund including the shipping charges.
translated_text_en: I received a damaged laptop today from your Salt Lake warehouse. The screen is cracked and the box was also torn from one side. I had paid the full amount online and now I am stuck with a broken machine. I need an immediate replacement or a full refund including the shipping charges.
reply: We are sorry for the damaged product. We have initiated a replacement and the new unit will be shipped today.

complaint_text: मैंने पिछले हफ्ते एक साड़ी आर्डर की थी जो कि अभी तक बनारस नहीं पहुंची है। ट्रैकिंग में दिखा रहा है कि पार्सल खो गया है। अगर आपके पास स्टॉक नहीं है तो पैसे वापस कर दीजिये। मुझे एक शादी में इसे पहनना था पर अब बहुत देर हो चुकी है।
translated_text_en: I ordered a saree last week which hasn't reached Varanasi yet. Tracking shows that the parcel is lost. If you don't have stock, please refund the money. I had to wear it to a wedding but it's too late now.
reply: असुविधा के लिए क्षमा करें। पार्सल खो जाने के कारण हमने आपका पूरा रिफंड प्रोसेस कर दिया है।

complaint_text: Zomato se khana mangwaya tha par packet khula hua tha. Jaipur ke Vaishali Nagar wale restaurant ne bahut hi ganda khana pack kiya hai. Delivery boy bhi sun nahi raha tha. I want my money back or a fresh order delivered for free.
translated_text_en: Ordered food from Zomato but the packet was open. The restaurant in Vaishali Nagar, Jaipur has packed very bad food. Even the delivery boy wasn't listening. I want my money back or a fresh order delivered for free.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Humne aapke Zomato wallet mein full refund credit kar diya hai.

complaint_text: Your app keeps crashing every time I try to add a new address for delivery. I am trying to order medicines for my parents in DLF Phase 3. This is a critical issue and needs to be fixed immediately. I have updated the app but the problem persists.
translated_text_en: Your app keeps crashing every time I try to add a new address for delivery. I am trying to order medicines for my parents in DLF Phase 3. This is a critical issue and needs to be fixed immediately. I have updated the app but the problem persists.
reply: We apologize for the technical bug. Please try clearing the app cache or use our website for now.

complaint_text: मेरी गैस सब्सिडी पिछले तीन महीनों से बैंक खाते में नहीं आई है। भोपाल की एजेंसी में कोई जवाब नहीं दे रहा है। क्या मेरा आधार लिंक नहीं है? कृपया इसकी जांच करें और बकाया पैसा दिलवाएं।
translated_text_en: My gas subsidy hasn't come into my bank account for the last three months. No one in the Bhopal agency is giving an answer. Is my Aadhaar not linked? Please check this and get the pending money cleared.
reply: आपकी शिकायत दर्ज कर ली गई है। कृपया सुनिश्चित करें कि आपका बैंक खाता आधार से जुड़ा हुआ है।

complaint_text: Indore ke Vijay Nagar area mein network bilkul nahi aa raha hai. Call baar baar drop ho rahi hai aur 5G toh dur ki baat hai, 4G bhi nahi chal raha. Main work from home kar raha hoon aur bahut problem ho rahi hai. Solve it fast.
translated_text_en: There is no network at all in the Vijay Nagar area of Indore. Calls are dropping repeatedly and let alone 5G, even 4G is not working. I am working from home and facing a lot of problems. Solve it fast.
reply: Inconvenience is regretted. A tower maintenance is ongoing in your area and will be fixed by 8 PM.

complaint_text: I booked a flight from Surat to Delhi for tomorrow but the airline cancelled it without providing any alternative. I have an important business meeting and I cannot afford to miss it. Your customer service agent told me to wait for 7 days for a refund which is ridiculous.
translated_text_en: I booked a flight from Surat to Delhi for tomorrow but the airline cancelled it without providing any alternative. I have an important business meeting and I cannot afford to miss it. Your customer service agent told me to wait for 7 days for a refund which is ridiculous.
reply: We understand the urgency. We are trying to book you on the next available flight at no extra cost.

complaint_text: मैंने आगरा के एक मॉल से वाशिंग मशीन खरीदी थी जिसमें दो दिन बाद ही पानी लीक होने लगा। मैकेनिक आया पर उसने बोला कि पार्ट्स नहीं हैं। मुझे नई मशीन चाहिए या फिर मेरे पैसे वापस करो। यह बहुत ही घटिया क्वालिटी का प्रोडक्ट है।
translated_text_en: I bought a washing machine from a mall in Agra which started leaking water after just two days. The mechanic came but said there are no parts. I want a new machine or my money back. This is a very poor quality product.
reply: हमे खेद है। आपकी मशीन को बदलकर नई मशीन 48 घंटों के भीतर आपके घर पहुंचा दी जाएगी।

complaint_text: Paisa kat gaya par bill payment failed dikha raha hai. Nagpur electricity board ko paise nahi mile par mere bank se cut gaye. Yeh dusri baar ho raha hai is mahine. Please mera balance update karo jaldi.
translated_text_en: Money was deducted but bill payment shows failed. Nagpur electricity board didn't get the money but it's deducted from my bank. This is happening for the second time this month. Please update my balance quickly.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Aapka payment verify ho gaya hai aur bill 24 ghante mein update ho jayega.

complaint_text: I ordered a laptop last week but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking says it is in Pune for 4 days. Please fix this immediately as I need it for work.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop last week but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking says it is in Pune for 4 days. Please fix this immediately as I need it for work.
reply: We apologize for the delay. We are escalating this with the logistics team to expedite delivery.

complaint_text: My refund for the returned dress is not processed yet. It has been 10 days since the pickup. This is unacceptable behavior from a big company.
translated_text_en: My refund for the returned dress is not processed yet. It has been 10 days since the pickup. This is unacceptable behavior from a big company.
reply: We are sorry for the delay. Your refund has been initiated and will reflect in 3-5 business days.

complaint_text: I tried to pay at a local shop using UPI but the amount was debited twice. The app shows one successful and one pending transaction. I want my 500 rupees back right now.
translated_text_en: I tried to pay at a local shop using UPI but the amount was debited twice. The app shows one successful and one pending transaction. I want my 500 rupees back right now.
reply: The duplicate amount will be automatically reversed to your bank account within 48 hours.

complaint_text: The microwave I received today has a huge dent on the side. The packaging was also torn when the delivery boy gave it. I want a replacement or a full refund.
translated_text_en: The microwave I received today has a huge dent on the side. The packaging was also torn when the delivery boy gave it. I want a replacement or a full refund.
reply: We regret the damage. A replacement order has been created and pickup for the old unit is scheduled.

complaint_text: I ordered a pair of Nike shoes but received some local brand instead. This looks like a fraud by the seller. Please investigate this seller and refund my money.
translated_text_en: I ordered a pair of Nike shoes but received some local brand instead. This looks like a fraud by the seller. Please investigate this seller and refund my money.
reply: We apologize for the mix-up. We have initiated a return and are investigating the seller.

complaint_text: I am unable to login to my account even after resetting the password. It keeps saying System Error. I have many loyalty points which I cannot use now.
translated_text_en: I am unable to login to my account even after resetting the password. It keeps saying System Error. I have many loyalty points which I cannot use now.
reply: Our technical team is fixing the login bug. Please try again after clearing your app cache.

complaint_text: The food delivery was 2 hours late and the pizza was completely cold. The delivery executive was also very rude when I asked for the reason. I want a full voucher for this mess.
translated_text_en: The food delivery was 2 hours late and the pizza was completely cold. The delivery executive was also very rude when I asked for the reason. I want a full voucher for this mess.
reply: We are sorry for the poor experience. A voucher of 200 INR has been added to your wallet.

complaint_text: You charged me for the premium subscription without my consent. I had cancelled the auto-renewal last month itself. Reverse the transaction of 999 INR immediately.
translated_text_en: You charged me for the premium subscription without my consent. I had cancelled the auto-renewal last month itself. Reverse the transaction of 999 INR immediately.
reply: We have processed the refund for the unauthorized charge. It will reflect in your bank soon.

complaint_text: मैंने कल एक मोबाइल फ़ोन मंगवाया था लेकिन उसका डिब्बा खाली निकला। डिलीवरी बॉय ने जबरदस्ती साइन करवा लिए। मुझे मेरे पैसे वापस चाहिए वरना मैं पुलिस कंप्लेंट करूँगा।
translated_text_en: I ordered a mobile phone yesterday but the box was empty. The delivery boy forced me to sign. I want my money back or I will file a police complaint.
reply: हमें इस घटना के लिए खेद है। हम मामले की जांच कर रहे हैं और 24 घंटे में आपको अपडेट करेंगे।

complaint_text: मेरी साड़ी की डिलीवरी आज होनी थी पर अभी तक कोई नहीं आया। कस्टमर केयर का नंबर भी नहीं लग रहा है। बहुत ही खराब सर्विस है आप लोगों की।
translated_text_en: My saree delivery was supposed to be today but no one has come yet. The customer care number is also not connecting. Very poor service.
reply: असुविधा के लिए क्षमा करें। आपका ऑर्डर डिलीवरी के लिए बाहर है और आज शाम तक पहुँच जाएगा।

complaint_text: UPI ट्रांजैक्शन फेल हो गया पर बैंक से पैसे कट गए। दुकानदार कह रहा है उसे पैसे नहीं मिले। कृपया जल्दी जांच करें और पैसे वापस भेजें।
translated_text_en: The UPI transaction failed but money was deducted from the bank. The shopkeeper says he didn't receive it. Please check quickly and return the money.
reply: चिंता न करें
column13: तकनीकी खराबी के कारण ऐसा हुआ है। पैसे 3 दिनों में आपके बैंक खाते में वापस आ जाएंगे।

complaint_text: मैंने एक मिक्सर ग्राइंडर आर्डर किया था जो टूटा हुआ निकला। वापसी के लिए रिक्वेस्ट डाली है पर कोई लेने नहीं आ रहा। मैं बहुत परेशान हूँ।
translated_text_en: I ordered a mixer grinder which turned out to be broken. I requested a return but no one is coming to pick it up. I am very troubled.
reply: असुविधा के लिए हमें खेद है। हमने पिकअप को फिर से शेड्यूल कर दिया है

complaint_text: आपका एप बार-बार क्रैश हो रहा है जब मैं पेमेंट करने की कोशिश करता हूँ। इसकी वजह से मेरी सेल वाली डील निकल गयी। बहुत ही बेकार अनुभव रहा।
translated_text_en: Your app is crashing repeatedly when I try to make a payment. Because of this, I missed my sale deal. It was a very bad experience.
reply: हम क्षमा चाहते हैं। कृपया एप को अपडेट करें
column13: नए वर्शन में यह समस्या ठीक कर दी गई है।

complaint_text: गलत साइज का जूता भेज दिया है आप लोगों ने। मैंने 8 नंबर मंगाया था और आपने 6 नंबर भेज दिया। इसे तुरंत बदल कर दीजिये।
translated_text_en: You people have sent the wrong shoe size. I ordered size 8 and you sent size 6. Change it immediately.
reply: हम साइज में हुई गलती के लिए माफी चाहते हैं। एक्सचेंज की प्रक्रिया शुरू कर दी गई है।

complaint_text: Mera order abhi tak ship nahi hua hai, why so much delay? Customer care ko call kiya toh wo bol rahe hain wait karo. I am very frustrated with this service.
translated_text_en: My order has not been shipped yet, why so much delay? When I called customer care they told me to wait. I am very frustrated with this service.
reply: We apologize for the delay. Your order will be shipped within the next 12 hours.

complaint_text: Payment cut gaya par order confirm nahi hua, kya mazaak hai? Please mera paisa wapas karo ya order update karo fast. This is very unprofessional.
translated_text_en: Payment was deducted but order was not confirmed, what is this joke? Please return my money or update the order fast. This is very unprofessional.
reply: We have confirmed your payment manually. Your order is now being processed for shipping.

complaint_text: Delivery partner ne mera call pick nahi kiya aur status Customer unavailable dal diya. Main ghar par hi tha poora din. Ye jhooth kyu bol rahe hain?
translated_text_en: The delivery partner did not pick up my call and set the status as Customer unavailable. I was at home all day. Why are they lying?
reply: We are sorry for the false status update. We have instructed the partner to deliver it tomorrow morning.

complaint_text: Wrong item deliver ho gaya hai, maine blue dress mangayi thi black mil gayi. Exchange request create nahi ho rahi app pe. Help me quickly.
translated_text_en: The wrong item has been delivered, I ordered a blue dress but got a black one. I can't create an exchange request on the app. Help me quickly.
reply: We have manually created an exchange request for you. Our agent will pick it up soon.

complaint_text: Bank se message aaya ki transaction successful hai par aapke app pe pending dikha raha hai. Mera paisa phas gaya hai beech mein. Jaldi resolve kariye.
translated_text_en: I got a message from the bank that the transaction was successful but it shows pending on your app. My money is stuck in between. Resolve quickly.
reply: Please share the UTR number of the transaction so we can verify and confirm your order.

complaint_text: Quality bahut kharab hai product ki, jaisa photo mein tha waisa bilkul nahi hai. I want to return this immediately and get my money back. Waste of time.
translated_text_en: The product quality is very bad, it is not at all like it was in the photo. I want to return this immediately and get my money back. Waste of time.
reply: We are sorry the product did not meet your expectations. You can initiate a return via the My Orders section.

complaint_text: I received my order yesterday but the internal seal of the protein powder was already broken. This is a health supplement and I cannot consume it if it is tampered with. I have been trying to reach your support for two hours but the line is constantly busy. Please arrange a pickup and refund my money immediately.
translated_text_en: I received my order yesterday but the internal seal of the protein powder was already broken. This is a health supplement and I cannot consume it if it is tampered with. I have been trying to reach your support for two hours but the line is constantly busy. Please arrange a pickup and refund my money immediately.
reply: We sincerely apologize for this experience; a return pickup has been scheduled for tomorrow.

complaint_text: My flight from Mumbai to Delhi was cancelled at the last minute and no alternative was provided by your staff at the airport. I had an important business meeting which I missed because of this gross negligence. I want a full refund of my ticket plus compensation for the mental agony caused. This is completely unacceptable behavior from a premium airline.
translated_text_en: My flight from Mumbai to Delhi was cancelled at the last minute and no alternative was provided by your staff at the airport. I had an important business meeting which I missed because of this gross negligence. I want a full refund of my ticket plus compensation for the mental agony caused. This is completely unacceptable behavior from a premium airline.
reply: We regret the cancellation due to technical reasons; your full refund is being processed.

complaint_text: I ordered a pair of Nike shoes during the Diwali sale but I received a cheap generic brand instead. The box was clearly tampered with and the delivery person insisted I pay the COD amount before opening. I feel cheated and I want my money back right now. This is the third time I am facing such issues with your platform.
translated_text_en: I ordered a pair of Nike shoes during the Diwali sale but I received a cheap generic brand instead. The box was clearly tampered with and the delivery person insisted I pay the COD amount before opening. I feel cheated and I want my money back right now. This is the third time I am facing such issues with your platform.
reply: We are investigating the seller and the courier partner; your refund will be credited in 48 hours.

complaint_text: The broadband connection at my residence in T-Nagar has been down for the last 48 hours. I am working from home and this is causing a significant loss in my productivity. Your technician promised to visit yesterday morning but no one showed up. If this is not fixed by today evening I will be forced to terminate my subscription.
translated_text_en: The broadband connection at my residence in T-Nagar has been down for the last 48 hours. I am working from home and this is causing a significant loss in my productivity. Your technician promised to visit yesterday morning but no one showed up. If this is not fixed by today evening I will be forced to terminate my subscription.
reply: Technical team is on-site at the local hub; service will be restored by 5 PM today.

complaint_text: I attempted to withdraw 5000 rupees from the ATM near Hinjewadi Phase 3 but the machine did not dispense cash while my account was debited. I have the receipt showing a failed transaction but the bank app shows a successful withdrawal. This is my monthly rent money and I need it urgently. Please reverse this transaction as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: I attempted to withdraw 5000 rupees from the ATM near Hinjewadi Phase 3 but the machine did not dispense cash while my account was debited. I have the receipt showing a failed transaction but the bank app shows a successful withdrawal. This is my monthly rent money and I need it urgently. Please reverse this transaction as soon as possible.
reply: Transaction reversal has been initiated and will reflect in your account within 3-5 working days.

complaint_text: The washing machine I purchased two weeks ago has started making a very loud noise and water is leaking from the bottom. I have raised multiple tickets but your service center says the parts are not in stock. Why do you sell products if you cannot provide after-sales support? I am extremely disappointed with this purchase.
translated_text_en: The washing machine I purchased two weeks ago has started making a very loud noise and water is leaking from the bottom. I have raised multiple tickets but your service center says the parts are not in stock. Why do you sell products if you cannot provide after-sales support? I am extremely disappointed with this purchase.
reply: We have escalated this to the regional manager; parts are being shipped via air-courier today.

complaint_text: I have been charged twice for my monthly OTT subscription this month. I checked my bank statement and both transactions of 499 were successful. I only wanted one month of service and now I am stuck with a double charge. Please refund the extra amount to my original payment method.
translated_text_en: I have been charged twice for my monthly OTT subscription this month. I checked my bank statement and both transactions of 499 were successful. I only wanted one month of service and now I am stuck with a double charge. Please refund the extra amount to my original payment method.
reply: Duplicate charge detected; the refund for the second transaction has been processed.

complaint_text: The delivery boy was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor despite the elevator being functional. He shouted at my elderly mother and left the package at the gate. This kind of behavior is unacceptable and I want strict action taken against him. We pay for doorstep delivery for a reason.
translated_text_en: The delivery boy was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor despite the elevator being functional. He shouted at my elderly mother and left the package at the gate. This kind of behavior is unacceptable and I want strict action taken against him. We pay for doorstep delivery for a reason.
reply: We are sorry for this behavior; we have issued a warning to the agent and flagged his profile.

complaint_text: मैंने कल रात खाने का आर्डर दिया था लेकिन डिलीवरी बॉय ने खाना कहीं और पहुंचा दिया। ऐप पर आर्डर डिलीवर्ड दिखा रहा है पर मुझे कुछ नहीं मिला। कस्टमर सपोर्ट ने मेरा फोन उठाना बंद कर दिया है। मुझे अपने 600 रुपये वापस चाहिए क्योंकि मैंने खाना खाया ही नहीं।
translated_text_en: I ordered food last night but the delivery boy delivered it somewhere else. The app shows delivered but I received nothing. Customer support has stopped picking up my calls. I want my 600 rupees back because I didn't eat the food.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफ़ी चाहते हैं; आपके रिफंड की प्रक्रिया शुरू कर दी गई है।

complaint_text: मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से 2000 रुपये कट गए हैं जबकि मैंने कोई ट्रांजैक्शन नहीं किया। सुबह मुझे एक मैसेज आया कि पैसा कट गया है लेकिन मेरा कार्ड मेरे पास ही है। कृपया मेरा कार्ड तुरंत ब्लॉक करें और फ्रॉड की रिपोर्ट दर्ज करें। मुझे बहुत डर लग रहा है कि और पैसे न कट जाएं।
translated_text_en: 2000 rupees were deducted from my bank account even though I didn't make any transaction. I got a message in the morning but my card is with me. Please block my card immediately and file a fraud report. I am very scared that more money might be deducted.
reply: आपका कार्ड ब्लॉक कर दिया गया है और फ्रॉड विंग मामले की जांच कर रही है।

complaint_text: मैंने अमेज़न से एक साड़ी मंगवाई थी जिसका रंग फोटो से बिलकुल अलग है। वेबसाइट पर वो लाल दिख रही थी लेकिन असल में वो भूरी है। मुझे इसे बदलना है लेकिन ऐप पर एक्सचेंज का ऑप्शन नहीं आ रहा। कृपया मेरी मदद करें और इसे जल्दी बदलवाएं।
translated_text_en: I ordered a saree from Amazon but the color is completely different from the photo. It looked red on the website but it is actually brown. I want to exchange it but the option isn't showing in the app. Please help me and get it exchanged quickly.
reply: हमे खेद है; हमने मैन्युअली आपके लिए एक्सचेंज रिक्वेस्ट बना दी है।

complaint_text: मेरा गैस सिलेंडर बुक किए हुए 5 दिन हो गए हैं पर अभी तक डिलीवरी नहीं हुई। हर बार एजेंसी वाले बोलते हैं कि गाड़ी खराब है या आदमी नहीं है। घर में खाना बनाने के लिए गैस खत्म हो गई है। पटना में इतनी खराब सर्विस की उम्मीद नहीं थी।
translated_text_en: It has been 5 days since I booked my gas cylinder but it hasn't been delivered yet. Every time the agency says the vehicle is broken or there's no man. We've run out of gas for cooking at home. Didn't expect such bad service in Patna.
reply: देरी के लिए क्षमा करें; आपका सिलेंडर आज दोपहर तक डिलीवर हो जाएगा।

complaint_text: इंदौर के आपके शोरूम से मैंने एक एयर प्यूरीफायर लिया था जो एक हफ्ते में ही खराब हो गया। जब मैं वहां गया तो मैनेजर ने बात करने से मना कर दिया और कहा कि कंपनी को ईमेल करो। यह बहुत ही बुरा व्यवहार है। मुझे नया पीस चाहिए या पैसे वापस।
translated_text_en: I bought an air purifier from your Indore showroom which stopped working within a week. When I went there, the manager refused to talk and told me to email the company. This is very bad behavior. I want a new piece or a refund.
reply: हम शोरूम टीम से बात कर रहे हैं; आप कल जाकर अपना प्रोडक्ट बदल सकते हैं।

complaint_text: मेरे पास कल एक मैसेज आया कि आपका रिवॉर्ड पॉइंट एक्सपायर होने वाला है और लिंक पर क्लिक करते ही मेरे वॉलेट से पैसे कट गए। मैंने कोई ओटीपी नहीं दिया फिर भी 1500 रुपये कैसे कट गए? यह कैसी सुरक्षा है आपकी ऐप की? मुझे मेरे पैसे वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: I got a message yesterday saying my reward points are about to expire and as soon as I clicked the link, money was deducted from my wallet. I didn't provide any OTP, then how was 1500 deducted? What kind of security is this for your app? I want my money back.
reply: यह एक फिशिंग हमला लगता है; हम इसकी जांच कर रहे हैं और पुलिस को सूचित कर दिया है।

complaint_text: Mera Zomato order 1 hour late hai aur food pura thanda ho gaya hai. Driver call pick nahi kar raha aur chat support sirf automated replies de raha hai. Itna delivery charge lete ho toh service toh sahi do kam se kam. I want full refund for this cold food.
translated_text_en: My Zomato order is 1 hour late and the food has become completely cold. The driver is not picking up calls and chat support is only giving automated replies. If you charge so much for delivery, at least provide proper service. I want full refund for this cold food.
