reply: We are sorry; a full refund has been credited to your Zomato wallet.

complaint_text: Maine Myntra se M size ki t-shirt mangayi thi par mujhe XL bhej di gayi hai. Return request bar bar cancel ho rahi hai saying quality check failed, jabki maine pehna bhi nahi hai. This is very unfair and I am stuck with a product I can't use. Please solve this asap.
translated_text_en: I ordered an M size t-shirt from Myntra but I was sent an XL. The return request is getting cancelled repeatedly saying quality check failed, even though I haven't even worn it. This is very unfair and I am stuck with a product I can't use. Please solve this asap.
reply: Apologies for the error; we have approved your return manually from our end.

complaint_text: Paytm wallet me 500 add kiye the bank account se debit ho gaye par wallet balance update nahi hua. 2 din se transaction pending dikha raha hai Noida ki network problem bhi nahi hai. Customer care ko mail kiya par koi response nahi aaya abhi tak. Paisa kahan gaya mera?
translated_text_en: Added 500 to Paytm wallet, it got debited from bank but wallet balance didn't update. Transaction is showing pending for 2 days, and there's no network problem in Noida. Mailed customer care but no response yet. Where is my money?
reply: Technical error detected; the amount will be credited to your wallet in 24 hours.

complaint_text: Uber driver ne ride cancel kar di par mujhse 50 rupees cancellation fee charge ki gayi hai. Maine 10 minute wait kiya aur driver ne phone switch off kar diya tha. Why should I pay for his mistake? Please refund the amount and check the driver's history.
translated_text_en: The Uber driver cancelled the ride but I was charged a 50 rupee cancellation fee. I waited for 10 minutes and the driver had switched off his phone. Why should I pay for his mistake? Please refund the amount and check the driver's history.
reply: The cancellation fee has been waived and refunded to your account.

complaint_text: Delivery boy ne building ke gate pe package fek diya aur sign khud hi kar liya. Jab maine box check kiya toh andar ki glass bottles tuti hui thi. Surat ki garmi me itna gussa kyun dikha raha hai delivery wala? I need replacement and action against the agent.
translated_text_en: The delivery boy threw the package at the building gate and signed it himself. When I checked the box, the glass bottles inside were broken. Why is the delivery person showing so much anger in the Surat heat? I need replacement and action against the agent.
reply: Replacement has been shipped; the delivery partner has been penalized for the incident.

complaint_text: Combo pack me 3 items hone chahiye the par box me sirf 2 hi nikle. Oil bottle missing hai aur box ki tape pehle se khuli hui thi. Nagpur warehouse se packing me galti hui hai shayad. Please mera missing item bhej do ya utne paise refund karo.
translated_text_en: There should have been 3 items in the combo pack but only 2 were in the box. The oil bottle is missing and the box tape was already open. Maybe there was a mistake in packing at the Nagpur warehouse. Please send my missing item or refund that much money.
reply: We are sorry for the missing item; we are shipping the oil bottle separately today.

complaint_text: I ordered a laptop last week but received a unit with a shattered screen. I have been trying to reach your helpline for three days but the calls keep getting disconnected. This is very frustrating as I spent 65,000 rupees on this device. Please initiate a refund or replacement immediately.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop last week but received a unit with a shattered screen. I have been trying to reach your helpline for three days but the calls keep getting disconnected. This is very frustrating as I spent 65,000 rupees on this device. Please initiate a refund or replacement immediately.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the damage. Our team will pick up the item within 24 hours.

complaint_text: मेरा यूपीआई पेमेंट फेल हो गया पर बैंक से 500 रुपये कट गए। मैंने दिल्ली मेट्रो कार्ड रिचार्ज करने की कोशिश की थी। अभी तक न तो रिचार्ज हुआ है और न ही पैसा वापस आया। कृपया मेरी मदद करें और पैसा रिफंड करें।
translated_text_en: My UPI payment failed but 500 rupees were deducted from my bank. I was trying to recharge my Delhi Metro card. Neither has it been recharged nor has the money come back. Please help me and refund the money.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका पैसा 3-5 कार्य दिवसों में आपके बैंक खाते में वापस आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: Mera order abhi tak deliver nahi hua hai jabki app pe 'Delivered' dikha raha hai. Maine koi OTP share nahi kiya aur na hi koi call aaya delivery boy ka. Bangalore traffic ka bahana mat dena please. Paisa refund karo ya order bhejo.
translated_text_en: My order hasn't been delivered yet even though the app shows 'Delivered'. I didn't share any OTP nor did I get a call from the delivery boy. Please don't give the excuse of Bangalore traffic. Refund the money or send the order.
reply: We are investigating this with the logistics partner. Please wait for 2 hours for an update.

complaint_text: I am very disappointed with the quality of the groceries delivered today. The milk packets were leaking and the vegetables were not fresh at all. I have been a loyal customer for two years but this is unacceptable. I want a full refund for the spoiled items.
translated_text_en: I am very disappointed with the quality of the groceries delivered today. The milk packets were leaking and the vegetables were not fresh at all. I have been a loyal customer for two years but this is unacceptable. I want a full refund for the spoiled items.
reply: We regret the poor quality of items. A refund for the milk and vegetables has been initiated.

complaint_text: मेरा बैंक अकाउंट बिना किसी जानकारी के ब्लॉक कर दिया गया है। मैं अपनी दुकान का भुगतान नहीं कर पा रहा हूँ। पटना की ब्रांच में गया तो उन्होंने बोला कि हेड ऑफिस से बात करो। यह बहुत ही गलत तरीका है ग्राहक को परेशान करने का।
translated_text_en: My bank account has been blocked without any information. I am unable to make payments for my shop. I went to the Patna branch and they told me to talk to the head office. This is a very wrong way to harass a customer.
reply: हमें दुख है कि आपको परेशानी हुई। आपके खाते की केवाईसी पेंडिंग है, कृपया दस्तावेज जमा करें।

complaint_text: The discount coupon code NEW2024 is not working on my checkout page. I have tried several times but it says 'invalid code' even though I am a new user. Please fix this issue so I can complete my purchase. It is very annoying to waste so much time.
translated_text_en: The discount coupon code NEW2024 is not working on my checkout page. I have tried several times but it says 'invalid code' even though I am a new user. Please fix this issue so I can complete my purchase. It is very annoying to waste so much time.
reply: We checked the code and it is now active. Please try applying it again at checkout.

complaint_text: My credit card was charged twice for the same transaction at a restaurant. I only swiped once but I received two SMS alerts for 2400 rupees each. This is a serious technical glitch in your system. I need the duplicate amount reversed as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: My credit card was charged twice for the same transaction at a restaurant. I only swiped once but I received two SMS alerts for 2400 rupees each. This is a serious technical glitch in your system. I need the duplicate amount reversed as soon as possible.
reply: We have identified the double charge. The duplicate amount of 2400 will be credited back in 48 hours.

complaint_text: मैंने लखनऊ से एक कुर्ता मंगवाया था पर पार्सल में सिर्फ एक खाली डिब्बा निकला। टेप भी खुला हुआ था जब मुझे मिला। डिलीवरी वाले ने जबरदस्ती पैकेट थमा दिया और चला गया। कृपया मेरा पैसा वापस दें वरना मैं पुलिस में शिकायत करूँगा।
translated_text_en: I ordered a kurta from Lucknow but the parcel contained only an empty box. The tape was also open when I received it. The delivery man forced the packet on me and left. Please return my money or I will complain to the police.
reply: यह सुनकर हमें बहुत दुख हुआ। हम इस मामले की जांच कर रहे हैं और जल्द ही आपको अपडेट देंगे।

complaint_text: App bar-bar crash ho rahi hai jab main payment gateway pe jata hoon. Kolkata mein internet fast hai phir bhi load nahi ho raha page. Teen baar koshish ki par 'Error 505' dikha raha hai. Shopping experience bilkul bekar hai aapka.
translated_text_en: The app is crashing repeatedly when I go to the payment gateway. Even though the internet in Kolkata is fast, the page isn't loading. I tried thrice but it shows 'Error 505'. Your shopping experience is totally useless.
reply: We apologize for the technical glitch. Please update your app to the latest version to fix this.

complaint_text: The delivery agent was extremely rude and refused to come up to the 4th floor. He kept shouting on the phone and told me to come down or he would cancel the order. This is very poor service for a prime customer. I expect better behavior from your staff.
translated_text_en: The delivery agent was extremely rude and refused to come up to the 4th floor. He kept shouting on the phone and told me to come down or he would cancel the order. This is very poor service for a prime customer. I expect better behavior from your staff.
reply: We are sorry for the agent's behavior. We have raised a formal warning against him.

complaint_text: मैंने गलत पता डाल दिया था और अब मैं उसे बदल नहीं पा रहा हूँ। ऑर्डर जयपुर की जगह जोधपुर जा रहा है। कस्टमर केयर वाले कह रहे हैं कि अब कुछ नहीं हो सकता। सामान महंगा है, कृपया एड्रेस अपडेट करवा दें।
translated_text_en: I had entered the wrong address and now I am unable to change it. The order is going to Jodhpur instead of Jaipur. Customer care is saying nothing can be done now. The item is expensive, please get the address updated.
reply: हम आपकी समस्या समझते हैं। हमने डिलीवरी टीम को सूचित कर दिया है कि वे आपसे संपर्क करें।

complaint_text: Mera ₹500 ka cashback abhi tak wallet mein nahi aaya hai. Indore ke ek local store pe scan and pay kiya tha 'cashback guaranteed' offer dekh kar. Transaction successful tha par fayda kuch nahi hua. Refund ya cashback jaldi bhejo.
translated_text_en: My ₹500 cashback has not arrived in the wallet yet. I scanned and paid at a local store in Indore seeing the 'cashback guaranteed' offer. The transaction was successful but there was no benefit. Send the refund or cashback quickly.
reply: Cashback can take up to 24 hours to reflect. Please check your wallet after some time.

complaint_text: I received a pair of shoes but they are clearly a first copy and not original. I paid for the brand name and got a fake product from your seller in Chandigarh. This is cheating and I will take legal action if not resolved today. I want my money back.
translated_text_en: I received a pair of shoes but they are clearly a first copy and not original. I paid for the brand name and got a fake product from your seller in Chandigarh. This is cheating and I will take legal action if not resolved today. I want my money back.
reply: We take counterfeit claims very seriously. Please share photos of the product for an immediate refund.

complaint_text: मेरे खाते से दो बार पैसे कट गए एक ही बिजली बिल के लिए। भोपाल स्मार्ट सिटी पोर्टल पर पेमेंट किया था। एक ट्रांजेक्शन पेंडिंग दिखा रहा है और दूसरा सक्सेसफुल। मुझे मेरा एक्स्ट्रा पैसा वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: Money was deducted twice from my account for the same electricity bill. I paid on the Bhopal Smart City portal. One transaction is showing pending and the other successful. I want my extra money back.
reply: अतिरिक्त भुगतान की पहचान कर ली गई है। 7 दिनों के भीतर पैसा आपके बैंक में वापस आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: Delivery boy ne mera parcel gate pe chhod diya bina bataye. Surat mein baarish ho rahi thi aur pura box geela ho gaya. Andar ki electronics item shayad kharab ho gayi hai. Ye kis tarah ki irresponsible delivery hai?
translated_text_en: The delivery boy left my parcel at the gate without informing. It was raining in Surat and the whole box got wet. The electronics item inside might be damaged. What kind of irresponsible delivery is this?
reply: We apologize for the negligence. If the item is not working, we will replace it immediately.

complaint_text: I have been trying to cancel my premium subscription for two months but the 'Cancel' button is greyed out. You are charging my card 999 rupees every month without my consent. This is a very dark pattern and I want an immediate cancellation and refund for last month.
translated_text_en: I have been trying to cancel my premium subscription for two months but the 'Cancel' button is greyed out. You are charging my card 999 rupees every month without my consent. This is a very dark pattern and I want an immediate cancellation and refund for last month.
reply: We have cancelled your subscription and initiated a refund for the last billing cycle.

complaint_text: कल रात मैंने वाराणसी से अपने भाई को पैसे भेजे थे पर ट्रांजेक्शन अटक गया। मेरे अकाउंट से पैसे डेबिट हो गए पर उसके पास नहीं पहुंचे। इमरजेंसी थी और आपका सिस्टम फेल हो गया। कृपया जल्दी पैसे पहुँचाओ।
translated_text_en: Last night I sent money to my brother from Varanasi but the transaction got stuck. Money was debited from my account but didn't reach him. It was an emergency and your system failed. Please deliver the money quickly.
reply: हमें आपकी परेशानी का अंदाजा है। ट्रांजेक्शन बैंक सर्वर की वजह से अटका है, 24 घंटे में क्लियर हो जाएगा।

complaint_text: Return pickup ke liye Ludhiana mein koi nahi aaya 3 din se. Main ghar pe wait karta reh gaya aur har baar message aata hai 'Attempt failed'. Courier partner ko bolo ki call karke aaye, aise hi message mat bheje.
translated_text_en: No one came for return pickup in Ludhiana for 3 days. I kept waiting at home and every time I got a message 'Attempt failed'. Tell the courier partner to call and come, don't just send messages.
reply: We have rescheduled the pickup and asked the agent to call you before arriving.

complaint_text: There is an unauthorized transaction of 5000 INR on my account from Guwahati. I have not shared my OTP or card details with anyone. Please block my card immediately and help me raise a dispute. I am very worried about my money.
translated_text_en: There is an unauthorized transaction of 5000 INR on my account from Guwahati. I have not shared my OTP or card details with anyone. Please block my card immediately and help me raise a dispute. I am very worried about my money.
reply: Your card has been blocked. Our fraud team is investigating the transaction.

complaint_text: Ranchi mein mera net banking login nahi ho raha hai. OTP phone pe aa hi nahi raha kitni bhi baar 'Resend' daba lo. Mujhe urgent payment karni hai, ye problem kab tak thik hogi? Support team bahut slow hai.
translated_text_en: My net banking is not logging in in Ranchi. The OTP is not coming to the phone no matter how many times I press 'Resend'. I have to make an urgent payment, when will this problem be fixed? Support team is very slow.
reply: The OTP service is currently down in your region. Please try using the mobile app login.

complaint_text: I ordered a laptop last week but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking says it is in Pune for 3 days. This is urgent as I need it for my exams. Please help.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop last week but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking says it is in Pune for 3 days. This is urgent as I need it for my exams. Please help.
reply: We apologize for the delay. Our team is looking into the logistics hub status.

complaint_text: The shoes I received are of the wrong size and color. I requested a replacement three days ago but no one has come for the pickup. This is very unprofessional behavior from your side.
translated_text_en: The shoes I received are of the wrong size and color. I requested a replacement three days ago but no one has come for the pickup. This is very unprofessional behavior from your side.
reply: We have rescheduled your pickup for tomorrow morning. Sorry for the trouble.

complaint_text: मेरा पार्सल अभी तक नहीं मिला है जबकि मैसेज आया था कि डिलीवर हो गया। मैंने पूरे मोहल्ले में पता किया पर किसी के पास नहीं है। मेरे पैसे वापस करो या सामान भेजो।
translated_text_en: I haven't received my parcel yet even though I got a message saying it was delivered. I checked the whole neighborhood but no one has it. Return my money or send the item.
reply: हम इसकी जांच कर रहे हैं। कृपया 24 घंटे का समय दें।

complaint_text: Mera UPI payment fail ho gaya par bank account se 5000 rupaye kat gaye. App mein status Pending dikha raha hai 2 din se. Please jaldi refund process karein urgent hai.
translated_text_en: My UPI payment failed but 5000 rupees were deducted from my bank account. The app status shows Pending for 2 days. Please process the refund quickly, it's urgent.
reply: Don't worry, if the payment failed, the amount will be credited back within 5-7 days.

complaint_text: I am extremely disappointed with the customer service executive I spoke to earlier. He was very rude and disconnected the call while I was explaining my problem. I want to raise a formal complaint against him.
translated_text_en: I am extremely disappointed with the customer service executive I spoke to earlier. He was very rude and disconnected the call while I was explaining my problem. I want to raise a formal complaint against him.
reply: We sincerely apologize for this experience. We are investigating the call logs.

complaint_text: कैशबैक का वादा किया गया था पर वॉलेट में कुछ नहीं आया। मैंने 2000 की शॉपिंग की थी ऑफर कोड लगाकर। ये सरासर धोखा है ग्राहकों के साथ।
translated_text_en: Cashback was promised but nothing came into the wallet. I did shopping of 2000 using the offer code. This is a complete fraud with customers.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। हम आपके वॉलेट की जांच कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Delivery boy ka behavior bahut battameez tha. Usne gate pe khade hokar chillaya aur bola ki niche aakar parcel lo. Mera ghar 4th floor pe hai aur lift kaam nahi kar rahi thi.
translated_text_en: The delivery boy's behavior was very rude. He stood at the gate and shouted, asking me to come down to take the parcel. My house is on the 4th floor and the lift wasn't working.
reply: We are sorry for the rider's behavior. We will take strict action.

complaint_text: The refrigerator I bought yesterday is making a very loud noise. It seems the compressor is faulty right out of the box. Please send a technician immediately to fix this.
translated_text_en: The refrigerator I bought yesterday is making a very loud noise. It seems the compressor is faulty right out of the box. Please send a technician immediately to fix this.
reply: A technician has been assigned to visit your location tomorrow by 11 AM.

complaint_text: मैंने जो साड़ी मंगवाई थी उसका रंग एकदम अलग है। फोटो में डार्क रेड दिख रही थी पर मुझे पिंक मिली है। मुझे ये बदलनी है या फिर पैसे वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: The saree I ordered has a completely different color. It looked dark red in the photo but I received pink. I want to exchange this or get a refund.
reply: आप ऐप के माध्यम से रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट डाल सकते हैं। हम मदद करेंगे।

complaint_text: Order cancel kar diya tha maine par refund abhi tak bank account mein nahi aaya. 10 din ho gaye hain aur customer care bol raha hai wait karo. Kitna wait karu bhai?
translated_text_en: I canceled the order but the refund hasn't hit my bank account yet. It's been 10 days and customer care keeps saying wait. How much should I wait, brother?
reply: We have processed it from our end. Please check with your bank for the ARN number.

complaint_text: Your app keeps crashing every time I try to add my credit card details. I have tried clearing the cache and reinstalling but the issue persists. This is preventing me from making a purchase.
translated_text_en: Your app keeps crashing every time I try to add my credit card details. I have tried clearing the cache and reinstalling but the issue persists. This is preventing me from making a purchase.
reply: Please share your device model and OS version so our tech team can assist.

complaint_text: मेरे बैंक से दो बार पैसे कट गए एक ही ट्रांजैक्शन के लिए। पहले सर्वर डाउन दिखाया फिर दोबारा पेमेंट की तो दोनों बार कट गए। कृपया एक पेमेंट वापस करें।
translated_text_en: Money was deducted twice from my bank for the same transaction. First it showed server down then when I paid again, it deducted both times. Please return one payment.
reply: अतिरिक्त भुगतान 3-5 कार्य दिवसों में आपके खाते में वापस आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: Mera subscription auto-renew ho gaya bina meri permission ke. Mujhe ye service nahi chahiye thi aur ab paise cut gaye hain. Please meri membership cancel karke refund dijiye.
translated_text_en: My subscription auto-renewed without my permission. I didn't want this service and now money is deducted. Please cancel my membership and give a refund.
reply: Your subscription has been cancelled and a refund has been initiated.

complaint_text: I received the dining table today but one of the legs is cracked. The packaging was also torn from the side. I am very upset as this was a gift for my parents.
translated_text_en: I received the dining table today but one of the legs is cracked. The packaging was also torn from the side. I am very upset as this was a gift for my parents.
reply: We are sorry for the damage. A replacement unit is being dispatched today.

complaint_text: पिकअप बॉय घर आया ही नहीं और ऐप में लिख दिया कि कस्टमर घर पे नहीं था। मैं पूरा दिन इंतज़ार कर रहा था। ये बहुत गलत बात है।
translated_text_en: The pickup boy didn't come home and wrote in the app that the customer wasn't home. I was waiting all day. This is very wrong.
reply: हम आपकी शिकायत दर्ज कर रहे हैं और कल पिकअप सुनिश्चित करेंगे।

complaint_text: Discount coupon apply nahi ho raha payment page pe. Screen pe dikh raha hai valid hai par click karne pe Invalid bol raha hai. Please check karke fix karo.
translated_text_en: The discount coupon is not applying on the payment page. It shows valid on screen but says Invalid when clicked. Please check and fix it.
reply: There might be a minimum cart value required. Please check the T&C.

complaint_text: I ordered fresh groceries but the tomatoes and spinach are completely rotten. I cannot use this for cooking. I want a refund for the damaged items immediately.
translated_text_en: I ordered fresh groceries but the tomatoes and spinach are completely rotten. I cannot use this for cooking. I want a refund for the damaged items immediately.
reply: We've processed a refund for the spoiled vegetables to your wallet.

complaint_text: मेरे ऑर्डर की डिलीवरी डेट बार-बार बढ़ाई जा रही है। पहले 10 तारीख बोला था, फिर 12 और अब 15 दिखा रहा है। अगर समय पर नहीं दे सकते तो बता दो।
translated_text_en: The delivery date of my order is being extended repeatedly. First they said the 10th, then 12th, and now it shows 15th. If you can't deliver on time, let me know.
reply: त्योहारों के कारण देरी हो रही है। हम जल्द से जल्द पहुंचाने की कोशिश करेंगे।

complaint_text: Size issue ki wajah se maine shirt return ki thi 5 din pehle. Abhi tak refund wallet mein show nahi kar raha. Customer support phone nahi utha raha hai.
translated_text_en: I returned the shirt 5 days ago due to a size issue. The refund is not showing in the wallet yet. Customer support is not picking up the phone.
reply: Refund usually takes 7 days for wallet credits. Please wait 2 more days.

complaint_text: My KYC documents have been pending for verification for over a week. Because of this, my wallet is restricted and I cannot pay my electricity bill. Please escalate this.
translated_text_en: My KYC documents have been pending for verification for over a week. Because of this, my wallet is restricted and I cannot pay my electricity bill. Please escalate this.
reply: Your documents are under review. We will notify you once verified.

complaint_text: I have been waiting for my laptop for three days now. The tracking shows it is at the Bangalore hub but no delivery attempt has been made. I need this for my office work urgently. Please resolve this immediately.
translated_text_en: I have been waiting for my laptop for three days now. The tracking shows it is at the Bangalore hub but no delivery attempt has been made. I need this for my office work urgently. Please resolve this immediately.
reply: We apologize for the delay. Our team is expediting the delivery.

complaint_text: मैंने कल शाम को ३००० रुपये का यूपीआई ट्रांजैक्शन किया था। पैसे मेरे अकाउंट से कट गए हैं लेकिन मर्चेंट को अभी तक नहीं मिले। बैंक बोल रहा है कि ट्रांजैक्शन सफल रहा। कृपया मेरे पैसे वापस दिलवाएं।
translated_text_en: I did a UPI transaction of 3000 rupees yesterday evening. Money has been deducted from my account but the merchant hasn't received it yet. Bank says transaction was successful. Please help me get my money back.
reply: हम इसकी जांच कर रहे हैं। आपके पैसे ३-५ कार्यदिवसों में वापस मिल जाएंगे।

complaint_text: Bhai, maine blue shirt order ki thi par tum logo ne red bhej di. Delivery boy ne package drop kiya aur chala gaya, maine check bhi nahi kiya. Ab return request system mein error dikha raha hai. Mera paisa waste ho raha hai.
translated_text_en: Brother, I ordered a blue shirt but you guys sent a red one. The delivery boy dropped the package and left, I couldn't even check. Now the return request is showing an error in the system. My money is being wasted.
reply: Sorry for the wrong item. We have manually created a return request for you.

complaint_text: The refund for my cancelled order has not been credited yet. It has been over 10 days since the cancellation was processed. Your support agent told me it would take 48 hours. This is unacceptable service.
translated_text_en: The refund for my cancelled order has not been credited yet. It has been over 10 days since the cancellation was processed. Your support agent told me it would take 48 hours. This is unacceptable service.
reply: We have checked with our banking partner. The refund is initiated and will reflect soon.

complaint_text: मेरा पार्सल आज मिला और डिब्बा पूरी तरह से फटा हुआ था। अंदर जो कांच का सामान था वो सब टूट चुका है। मुझे समझ नहीं आ रहा कि इतनी लापरवाही कैसे हो सकती है। मुझे तुरंत रिप्लेसमेंट चाहिए।
translated_text_en: Received my parcel today and the box was completely torn. The glass items inside are all broken. I don't understand how there can be such negligence. I need a replacement immediately.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। कृपया टूटे हुए सामान की फोटो भेजें, हम नया भेज देंगे।

complaint_text: Mera payment stuck ho gaya hai Flipkart checkout pe. Amount deduct ho gaya bank se but order confirm nahi hua. Customer care utha nahi rahe hain subah se. Please koi meri help karega ya nahi?
translated_text_en: My payment is stuck at Flipkart checkout. Amount was deducted from the bank but the order wasn't confirmed. Customer care is not picking up since morning. Will someone help me or not?
reply: We see your payment. Order is now confirmed and shipping soon.

complaint_text: My account has been blocked for no reason. I have several active orders and I cannot track them now. I tried resetting the password but it says 'Contact Administrator'. This is very frustrating as I have paid in advance.
translated_text_en: My account has been blocked for no reason. I have several active orders and I cannot track them now. I tried resetting the password but it says 'Contact Administrator'. This is very frustrating as I have paid in advance.
reply: Your account was flagged for security reasons. Please verify your identity via email link.

complaint_text: डिलीवरी बॉय का व्यवहार बहुत ही खराब था। उसने मुझसे एक्स्ट्रा पैसे मांगे और जब मैंने मना किया तो चिल्लाने लगा। आपके पास ऐसे बदतमीज लोग काम कैसे कर रहे हैं? मुझे इसकी शिकायत दर्ज करानी है।
translated_text_en: The delivery boy's behavior was very bad. He asked for extra money from me and when I refused, he started shouting. How are such rude people working for you? I want to register a complaint.
reply: हम इस घटना के लिए क्षमा चाहते हैं। संबंधित डिलीवरी पार्टनर के खिलाफ कड़ी कार्रवाई की जाएगी।

complaint_text: Yeh product ki quality bilkul ghatiya hai. Photo mein kuch aur dikhaya tha aur aaya kuch aur hi sasta material. Maine socha tha ki branded hoga par yeh toh local lag raha hai. I want a full refund.
translated_text_en: The quality of this product is absolutely pathetic. Something else was shown in the photo and some cheap material arrived. I thought it would be branded but this looks local. I want a full refund.
reply: We regret that the quality didn't meet your expectations. Return pickup is scheduled.

complaint_text: I was charged twice for my monthly subscription. The first payment failed on the app but the money was taken from my wallet. Then I paid again and that also got deducted. Please refund the extra amount.
translated_text_en: I was charged twice for my monthly subscription. The first payment failed on the app but the money was taken from my wallet. Then I paid again and that also got deducted. Please refund the extra amount.
reply: Dual payment detected. The extra amount of 999 will be credited to your wallet.

complaint_text: मैंने ५ दिन पहले ऑर्डर कैंसिल किया था लेकिन पैसे अभी तक वापस नहीं आए। मुझे पैसों की बहुत जरूरत है। हर बार पूछने पर आप लोग सिर्फ इंतज़ार करने को बोलते हो। यह सही नहीं है।
translated_text_en: I cancelled the order 5 days ago but the money hasn't come back yet. I need the money very urgently. Every time I ask, you guys just tell me to wait. This is not right.
reply: कृपया धैर्य रखें। रिफंड प्रक्रिया में है और आपके बैंक खाते में कल तक आ जाना चाहिए।

complaint_text: Order out for delivery dikha raha hai kal se but koi aaya nahi. Delivery guy ka phone switch off aa raha hai. Agar aaj nahi aaya toh mujhe order nahi chahiye. Please mera order cancel kar do.
translated_text_en: Order is showing out for delivery since yesterday but no one came. Delivery guy's phone is switched off. If it doesn't come today, I don't want the order. Please cancel my order.
reply: The delivery was delayed due to local weather. It will reach you by 2 PM today.

complaint_text: The shoes I received are of size 10 but I clearly ordered size 8. This is the second time this is happening with my account. Please double-check the items before shipping them out. I am tired of returning things.
translated_text_en: The shoes I received are of size 10 but I clearly ordered size 8. This is the second time this is happening with my account. Please double-check the items before shipping them out. I am tired of returning things.
reply: We are sorry for the size mismatch. A replacement with size 8 is being shipped today.

complaint_text: ऐप लॉगिन करने में बहुत दिक्कत आ रही है। ओटीपी मोबाइल पर आ ही नहीं रहा है। मैंने कई बार कोशिश की पर हर बार 'Try again' लिखा आता है। मुझे अपना बिल जमा करना है, कृपया मदद करें।
translated_text_en: Having a lot of trouble logging into the app. OTP is not coming on mobile at all. I tried many times but every time it says 'Try again'. I have to pay my bill, please help.
reply: हमारी तकनीकी टीम इस पर काम कर रही है। कृपया १५ मिनट बाद पुनः प्रयास करें।

complaint_text: Maine promo code 'SAVE50' use kiya tha but discount apply nahi hua. Payment page par final price kam nahi hui fir bhi maine pay kar diya. Please balance amount mere credit balance mein daal do.
translated_text_en: I used the promo code 'SAVE50' but the discount wasn't applied. The final price didn't decrease on the payment page still I paid. Please add the balance amount to my credit balance.
reply: The promo code was valid for orders above 2000. However, we've added 100 points as a gesture.

complaint_text: My package was marked as delivered today at 4 PM, but I haven't received anything. I was at home all day and no one rang the bell. The delivery person's number provided is invalid. Please find my parcel.
translated_text_en: My package was marked as delivered today at 4 PM, but I haven't received anything. I was at home all day and no one rang the bell. The delivery person's number provided is invalid. Please find my parcel.
reply: We are investigating the location of your package. It seems it was delivered to a neighbor.

complaint_text: आपका ऐप बहुत ज्यादा हैंग हो रहा है। जैसे ही मैं पेमेंट स्क्रीन पर जाता हूँ, ऐप बंद हो जाता है। मैंने ऐप अपडेट भी कर लिया है फिर भी वही समस्या है। बहुत ही बेकार अनुभव है।
translated_text_en: Your app is hanging a lot. As soon as I go to the payment screen, the app closes. I have updated the app still same problem. Very bad experience.
reply: कृपया अपना कैश (cache) क्लियर करें और फोन रीस्टार्ट करें। इससे समस्या ठीक हो जाएगी।

complaint_text: Pichle do din se main customer care ko call kar raha hoon but wait time 20 minute dikha raha hai. Mera cashback credit nahi hua hai transaction ke baad. Itna wait koi kaise karega service ke liye?
translated_text_en: For the last two days I've been calling customer care but wait time shows 20 minutes. My cashback wasn't credited after the transaction. How can anyone wait so long for service?
reply: We are experiencing high call volume. Your cashback of 50 will be credited within 2 hours.

complaint_text: The microwave I purchased last month has stopped working suddenly. It is still under warranty but your service center in Guwahati is saying they don't have parts. I need an engineer to visit and fix it.
translated_text_en: The microwave I purchased last month has stopped working suddenly. It is still under warranty but your service center in Guwahati is saying they don't have parts. I need an engineer to visit and fix it.
reply: A technician has been assigned and will visit your location with the required parts tomorrow.

complaint_text: I requested a pickup for my return item two days ago. The courier person keeps rescheduling the pickup saying 'Customer not available' while I am waiting here all day. This is blatant lying.
translated_text_en: I requested a pickup for my return item two days ago. The courier person keeps rescheduling the pickup saying 'Customer not available' while I am waiting here all day. This is blatant lying.
reply: We sincerely apologize. We have escalated this to the courier partner for an immediate pickup.

complaint_text: My order for the Samsung M34 has not been delivered yet even though it shows delivered on the app. I have been waiting at home all day and no one called. This is very frustrating and I want my refund immediately.
translated_text_en: My order for the Samsung M34 has not been delivered yet even though it shows delivered on the app. I have been waiting at home all day and no one called. This is very frustrating and I want my refund immediately.
reply: We apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is investigating the delivery status.

complaint_text: मैंने कल रात जोमेटो से खाना मंगवाया था लेकिन वो अभी तक नहीं आया। डिलीवरी बॉय का फोन भी नहीं लग रहा है। मेरे पैसे कट चुके हैं और मुझे बहुत भूख लगी है।
translated_text_en: I ordered food from Zomato last night but it hasn't arrived yet. The delivery boy's phone is also not reachable. My money has been deducted and I am very hungry.
reply: क्षमा करें, हम आपके ऑर्डर की स्थिति की जांच कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Bhai mera UPI payment fail ho gaya par bank se balance cut gaya hai. Shopkeeper bol raha hai usko paise nahi mile. Please jaldi refund kar do kyunki ye mera last 2000 rupaye tha.
translated_text_en: Brother, my UPI payment failed but the balance was deducted from the bank. The shopkeeper says he didn't receive the money. Please refund quickly because this was my last 2000 rupees.
reply: Don't worry, if the amount is deducted it will be refunded within 3-5 business days.

complaint_text: The air conditioner I bought last week is making a weird grinding noise. Your technician came once but didn't fix it properly. I spent a lot of money and I expect a better service than this.
translated_text_en: The air conditioner I bought last week is making a weird grinding noise. Your technician came once but didn't fix it properly. I spent a lot of money and I expect a better service than this.
reply: We are sending a senior technician to resolve the noise issue tomorrow.

complaint_text: सर मैंने अपने मोबाइल का रिचार्ज किया था ₹299 वाला। पैसे कट गए पर मैसेज आया कि रिचार्ज फेल हो गया। कृपया मेरे पैसे वापस करें या रिचार्ज सफल करें।
translated_text_en: Sir, I recharged my mobile for ₹299. Money was deducted but I got a message saying recharge failed. Please return my money or make the recharge successful.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है, आपका रिफंड प्रोसेस कर दिया गया है।

complaint_text: App baar baar crash ho rahi hai jab main checkout karne ki koshish karta hoon. Sab items cart se gayab ho jate hain login karne ke baad. Bahut gussa aa raha hai ye sab dekh kar.
translated_text_en: The app keeps crashing whenever I try to checkout. All items disappear from the cart after logging in. I am getting very angry seeing all this.
reply: Please update your app to the latest version or clear the cache.

complaint_text: I received a damaged pair of shoes today. The box was completely crushed and the left shoe has a visible scratch. I need a replacement or a full refund as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: I received a damaged pair of shoes today. The box was completely crushed and the left shoe has a visible scratch. I need a replacement or a full refund as soon as possible.
reply: We have initiated a replacement request. Our agent will pick up the damaged item.

complaint_text: मुझे गलत साइज का कुर्ता भेज दिया गया है। मैंने L साइज ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन मुझे S साइज मिला। अब ये मुझे फिट नहीं आ रहा है और मुझे कल एक शादी में पहनना था।
translated_text_en: I have been sent the wrong size kurta. I ordered size L but received size S. Now it doesn't fit me and I had to wear it to a wedding tomorrow.
reply: हमें खेद है, हम इसे कल तक बदलने की पूरी कोशिश करेंगे।

complaint_text: Customer care ko call kiya par koi utha hi nahi raha hai. 15 minute se hold pe rakha hua hai music baja ke. Isse accha to main offline shop se hi samaan le leta.
translated_text_en: I called customer care but no one is picking up. They have kept me on hold for 15 minutes playing music. It would have been better if I bought the items from an offline shop.
reply: Apologies for the wait time, we are experiencing high call volumes.

complaint_text: The flight I booked for Kolkata to Delhi was cancelled without any prior notice. I reached the airport and then found out about this. This is gross negligence and I want compensation for my travel to the airport.
translated_text_en: The flight I booked for Kolkata to Delhi was cancelled without any prior notice. I reached the airport and then found out about this. This is gross negligence and I want compensation for my travel to the airport.
reply: We deeply regret the inconvenience. A full refund and travel voucher have been issued.

complaint_text: मेरा बिजली का बिल इस महीने बहुत ज्यादा आया है। पिछली बार ₹800 था और इस बार ₹5000 आ गया। मीटर की रीडिंग गलत ली गई है, कृपया इसे ठीक करें।
translated_text_en: My electricity bill has come very high this month. Last time it was ₹800 and this time it is ₹5000. The meter reading was taken wrong, please fix it.
reply: हम मीटर की दोबारा जांच के लिए एक कर्मचारी को भेज रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Flipkart se mobile mangwaya tha par box khali nikla. Delivery boy se bola toh wo kehta hai uska kaam sirf deliver karna hai. Mere 20,000 dub gaye kya?
translated_text_en: I ordered a mobile from Flipkart but the box turned out to be empty. When I told the delivery boy, he says his job is only to deliver. Are my 20,000 rupees gone?
reply: Please share the unboxing video, we are investigating this with the logistics partner.

complaint_text: I ordered grocery through your express delivery 2 hours ago. It said 15 minutes delivery but the status is still stuck at 'Order Picked'. The milk will spoil in this heat, please hurry up.
translated_text_en: I ordered grocery through your express delivery 2 hours ago. It said 15 minutes delivery but the status is still stuck at 'Order Picked'. The milk will spoil in this heat, please hurry up.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the delay. Our rider is on the way.

complaint_text: मैंने एक महीने पहले रिफंड के लिए रिक्वेस्ट डाली थी। अभी तक पैसे बैंक में नहीं आए। आपके एजेंट हर बार बस यही कहते हैं कि 2 दिन रुकिए।
translated_text_en: I put in a refund request a month ago. The money hasn't reached the bank yet. Your agents keep saying wait for 2 days every time.
reply: हमें आपकी परेशानी समझ में आ रही है, हम इसे अकाउंट्स टीम के साथ एस्केलेट कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Credit card bill pay kiya tha but update nahi hua statement mein. Late fees lag jayegi agar aaj solve nahi hua toh. Screenshot attached hai payment ka.
translated_text_en: Paid credit card bill but it hasn't updated in the statement. Late fees will be applied if not solved today. Payment screenshot is attached.
reply: The payment is verified. It will reflect in your statement within 24 hours.

complaint_text: The internet connection has been unstable for the past three days. I am working from home and it is impossible to attend meetings. I need a technician to visit and check the fiber cable.
translated_text_en: The internet connection has been unstable for the past three days. I am working from home and it is impossible to attend meetings. I need a technician to visit and check the fiber cable.
reply: An engineer is scheduled to visit your location by 4 PM today.

complaint_text: आपके स्टोर से जो वाशिंग मशीन खरीदी थी वो चलते समय बहुत शोर कर रही है। इंस्टॉलेशन के समय तो सब ठीक था पर अब दिक्कत हो रही है। जल्दी किसी को भेजिए देखने के लिए।
translated_text_en: The washing machine I bought from your store makes a lot of noise while running. Everything was fine during installation but now there's a problem. Send someone quickly to look.
reply: हम कल सुबह के लिए एक सर्विस विज़िट बुक कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Zomato gold membership cancel karni hai par option nahi mil raha. Faltu mein har mahine paise kat rahe hain mere bank se. Please stop this immediately.
translated_text_en: I want to cancel Zomato gold membership but can't find the option. Money is getting deducted from my bank every month for no reason. Please stop this immediately.
reply: We have cancelled your subscription and initiated the refund for this month.

complaint_text: The package I received was meant for someone else named Rajesh from Mumbai. I have tried calling the number on the box but no answer. Please pick this up and give me my actual order.
translated_text_en: The package I received was meant for someone else named Rajesh from Mumbai. I have tried calling the number on the box but no answer. Please pick this up and give me my actual order.
reply: Thank you for letting us know. We will arrange a pickup and deliver your correct order.

complaint_text: I booked a hotel through your app but the hotel manager says they have no record of my booking. I am stranded here with my family at 11 PM. This is totally unacceptable behavior from a reputed company.
translated_text_en: I booked a hotel through your app but the hotel manager says they have no record of my booking. I am stranded here with my family at 11 PM. This is totally unacceptable behavior from a reputed company.
reply: We are coordinating with the hotel and booking an alternative room for you right now.

complaint_text: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy S23 from your app but received a box with a stone inside. This is absolute fraud and I demand an immediate refund. I have been your loyal customer for years but this is unacceptable.
translated_text_en: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy S23 from your app but received a box with a stone inside. This is absolute fraud and I demand an immediate refund. I have been your loyal customer for years but this is unacceptable.
reply: We are investigating this immediately. Our security team will contact you within 2 hours.

complaint_text: कल मैंने ₹500 का यूपीआई ट्रांजैक्शन किया था जो फेल हो गया पर मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से पैसे कट गए हैं। अब तक रिफंड नहीं आया और कस्टमर केयर भी फोन नहीं उठा रहा। बहुत ही खराब सर्विस है आपकी।
translated_text_en: Yesterday I did a UPI transaction of ₹500 which failed but money got deducted from my bank account. Refund hasn't come yet and customer care is not picking up. Very bad service.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका रिफंड 2-3 कार्य दिवसों में मिल जाएगा।

complaint_text: Maine ek kurta mangwaya tha par size bahut chhota hai. App par exchange option nahi dikh raha hai and delivery boy calls pick nahi kar raha. Please mera exchange process jaldi karwaiye.
translated_text_en: I ordered a kurta but the size is too small. Exchange option is not visible on the app and delivery boy is not picking up calls. Please process my exchange quickly.
reply: Apologies for the trouble. We have initiated the exchange manually from our end.

complaint_text: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor. He threatened to cancel my order if I didn't come down to the gate. I have a leg injury and cannot walk much.
translated_text_en: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor. He threatened to cancel my order if I didn't come down to the gate. I have a leg injury and cannot walk much.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the delivery partner's behavior. We are taking disciplinary action.

complaint_text: मेरी फ्रेश वेजिटेबल्स की डिलीवरी आज सुबह आई पर सब्जियां सड़ी हुई हैं। टमाटर बिल्कुल गले हुए हैं और पालक भी पीला है। क्या आप लोग क्वालिटी चेक नहीं करते भेजने से पहले?
translated_text_en: My fresh vegetables delivery arrived this morning but vegetables are rotten. Tomatoes are completely mushy and spinach is yellow. Don't you guys do quality checks before sending?
reply: क्षमा करें, हम तुरंत ताज़ी सब्जियां फिर से भेज रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Yaar mera internet bill pay kiya tha ₹799 ka par bill abhi bhi unpaid dikha raha hai. Bank se message aa gaya ki payment successful hai. Support team help karo please fast.
translated_text_en: Dude I paid my internet bill of ₹799 but it's still showing unpaid. Bank message says payment is successful. Support team please help fast.
reply: Sorry for the delay. It takes 24 hours to reflect on the portal, please wait.

complaint_text: I purchased a premium subscription yesterday but my account still shows as a free user. I have tried logging out and logging back in multiple times. This is very frustrating as I cannot access pro features.
translated_text_en: I purchased a premium subscription yesterday but my account still shows as a free user. I have tried logging out and logging back in multiple times. This is very frustrating as I cannot access pro features.
reply: We have manually activated your premium access. Please check now.

complaint_text: मैंने अपनी मां के लिए साड़ी मंगवाई थी जिसका रंग फोटो से बिल्कुल अलग है। फोटो में लाल था पर आया भूरा है। मुझे ये वापस करना है पर वेबसाइट पर एरर आ रहा है।
translated_text_en: I ordered a saree for my mother and the color is completely different from the photo. It was red in photo but brown arrived. I want to return it but there's an error on website.
reply: वेबसाइट की समस्या ठीक कर दी गई है। अब आप वापसी का अनुरोध कर सकते हैं।

complaint_text: Mera refund 10 din se pending hai jabki delivery boy ne item le liya tha. Har bar call karne pe bolte hain ki process ho raha hai. Kitna time lagega aur?
translated_text_en: My refund is pending for 10 days even though the delivery boy took the item. Every time I call they say it's processing. How much more time will it take?
reply: Humne aapka refund process kar diya hai, 24 ghante mein bank account check karein.

complaint_text: The AC I bought last week has started leaking water inside the room. I requested a service technician visit but nobody has showed up yet. The heat is unbearable and I need this fixed.
translated_text_en: The AC I bought last week has started leaking water inside the room. I requested a service technician visit but nobody has showed up yet. The heat is unbearable and I need this fixed.
reply: We have escalated your request. A technician will visit today by 5 PM.

complaint_text: My flight from Delhi to Mumbai was cancelled at the last minute and I haven't received any notification about the refund. I had to book another flight at double the price. This is totally unprofessional behavior.
translated_text_en: My flight from Delhi to Mumbai was cancelled at the last minute and I haven't received any notification about the refund. I had to book another flight at double the price. This is totally unprofessional behavior.
reply: We sincerely apologize. Full refund has been initiated to your original payment method.

complaint_text: मेरा खाना 2 घंटे लेट पहुँचा और वह बिल्कुल ठंडा था। रेस्टोरेंट वाले फोन नहीं उठा रहे थे। मुझे पूरा पैसा वापस चाहिए क्योंकि मैंने वो खाना फेंक दिया।
translated_text_en: My food reached 2 hours late and it was stone cold. The restaurant wasn't picking up calls. I want a full refund because I threw that food away.
reply: अत्यंत क्षमा प्रार्थी हैं। आपके वॉलेट में पूरा रिफंड क्रेडिट कर दिया गया है।

complaint_text: Laptop ka screen flicker kar raha hai box open karte hi. I think ye defective unit hai. Please replace karke naya piece bhejo jaldi, mujhe office ka kaam karna hai.
translated_text_en: Laptop screen is flickering as soon as I opened the box. I think this is a defective unit. Please replace and send a new piece quickly, I have office work to do.
reply: Sorry for the defective unit. Replacement request is created, pick-up is tomorrow.

complaint_text: I am trying to use the coupon code SAVE20 but it says invalid even though it is valid on my account. I have been trying for the last one hour. Please fix this bug immediately.
translated_text_en: I am trying to use the coupon code SAVE20 but it says invalid even though it is valid on my account. I have been trying for the last one hour. Please fix this bug immediately.
reply: The coupon was specific to certain items. We have shared a new universal code with you.

complaint_text: मेरे बैंक खाते से अनधिकृत लेनदेन हुआ है। मैंने कोई ओटीपी शेयर नहीं किया फिर भी ₹5000 कट गए। कृपया मेरा कार्ड तुरंत ब्लॉक करें और जांच शुरू करें।
translated_text_en: Unauthorized transaction happened from my bank account. I didn't share any OTP yet ₹5000 got deducted. Please block my card immediately and start investigation.
reply: आपका कार्ड ब्लॉक कर दिया गया है। फ्रॉड विंग मामले की जांच कर रही है।

complaint_text: Shoes ka sole pehli baar pehenne par hi nikal gaya. Maine ₹4000 kharch kiye branded shoes ke liye aur quality aisi hai? This is very disappointing, mujhe replacement chahiye.
translated_text_en: Shoes sole came off on the very first wear. I spent ₹4000 for branded shoes and quality is like this? This is very disappointing, I want a replacement.
reply: Quality issue noted. Humne replacement order place kar diya hai.

complaint_text: I ordered medicine for my father which was supposed to be delivered today. It's already 9 PM and the status still shows out for delivery. He needs these medicines urgently for his heart condition.
translated_text_en: I ordered medicine for my father which was supposed to be delivered today. It's already 9 PM and the status still shows out for delivery. He needs these medicines urgently for his heart condition.
reply: We are prioritizing this. Our special delivery partner will reach you within 30 minutes.

complaint_text: दीवाली के लिए कपड़े मंगवाए थे पर अभी तक नहीं मिले। ट्रैक करने पर दिखा रहा है कि एड्रेस नहीं मिला, जबकि मेरा एड्रेस बिल्कुल सही है। प्लीज जल्दी डिलीवर करवाएं।
translated_text_en: Ordered clothes for Diwali but haven't received them yet. Tracking shows address not found, even though my address is correct. Please get it delivered soon.
reply: आपका एड्रेस अपडेट कर दिया गया है। कल दोपहर तक डिलीवरी हो जाएगी।

complaint_text: Mera Zomato Pro membership auto-renew ho gaya bina kisi notification ke. Mujhe ye cancel karna hai aur refund chahiye because main use nahi karta ab. Please help me out.
translated_text_en: My Zomato Pro membership got auto-renewed without any notification. I want to cancel this and get a refund because I don't use it anymore. Please help me out.
reply: Subscription cancel ho gayi hai. Refund 5-7 days mein account mein aa jayega.

complaint_text: The customer support agent disconnected the call while I was explaining my problem. This is the third time this has happened today. I want to speak to a supervisor regarding my lost package.
translated_text_en: The customer support agent disconnected the call while I was explaining my problem. This is the third time this has happened today. I want to speak to a supervisor regarding my lost package.
reply: We apologize for the experience. A supervisor will call you back on your registered number.

complaint_text: I ordered a smartphone five days ago and it was supposed to be delivered yesterday. The tracking status shows Out for Delivery since morning but no one has called yet. This is very unprofessional as I need the phone for my work. Please resolve this immediately.
translated_text_en: I ordered a smartphone five days ago and it was supposed to be delivered yesterday. The tracking status shows Out for Delivery since morning but no one has called yet. This is very unprofessional as I need the phone for my work. Please resolve this immediately.
reply: We apologize for the delay; our team is checking with the local hub.

complaint_text: मैंने कल शाम को ३००० रुपये का यूपीआई ट्रांजैक्शन किया था जो फेल हो गया। मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से पैसे कट गए हैं लेकिन मर्चेंट को नहीं मिले। कृपया मेरे पैसे वापस करें क्योंकि यह मेरी मेहनत की कमाई है। मुझे बहुत डर लग रहा है कि पैसे डूब न जाएं।
translated_text_en: I made a UPI transaction of 3000 rupees yesterday evening which failed. Money has been deducted from my bank account but the merchant hasn't received it. Please return my money as it is my hard-earned money. I am very scared that the money might be lost.
reply: As per bank records the amount will be refunded within 3-5 working days.

complaint_text: Mera order return ho gaya tha par refund abhi tak nahi aaya. Customer care wale bol rahe hain ki 2 din mein aayega par 1 hafta ho gaya. Please check karke batao ki paisa kab tak milega. Main bohot pareshan hoon kyunki amount kafi bada hai.
translated_text_en: My order was returned but the refund hasn't arrived yet. Customer care said it will come in 2 days but it's been a week. Please check and tell me when I will get the money. I am very troubled because the amount is quite large.
reply: We are processing your refund; it should reflect in your account shortly.

complaint_text: I received the package today but it contains a completely different item than what I ordered. I bought a designer saree but received a pair of cheap jeans instead. This is unacceptable and looks like a scam. I want a replacement or a full refund now.
translated_text_en: I received the package today but it contains a completely different item than what I ordered. I bought a designer saree but received a pair of cheap jeans instead. This is unacceptable and looks like a scam. I want a replacement or a full refund now.
reply: We are sorry for the mix-up; please initiate a return and we will ship the correct item.

complaint_text: मेरा अकाउंट बिना किसी वजह के ब्लॉक कर दिया गया है। मुझे अपनी सैलरी निकालनी है लेकिन लॉगिन नहीं हो रहा। मैंने कस्टमर सपोर्ट को ईमेल भी किया था पर कोई जवाब नहीं मिला। यह बहुत ही गैर-जिम्मेदाराना व्यवहार है।
translated_text_en: My account has been blocked for no reason. I need to withdraw my salary but I can't login. I even emailed customer support but got no reply. This is very irresponsible behavior.
reply: Your account is under verification; please visit the nearest branch with ID proof.

complaint_text: Offer dikha raha tha 500 cashback milega order pe but mujhe sirf 50 mila. Maine screen recording bhi ki thi offer ki. Aise jhoot bolke customers ko bewakoof mat banaiye. Please baaki ke 450 credit kijiye turant.
translated_text_en: The offer showed 500 cashback on the order but I only got 50. I even did a screen recording of the offer. Don't fool customers by lying like this. Please credit the remaining 450 immediately.
reply: We are reviewing the offer terms and will credit the difference if applicable.

complaint_text: My annual subscription was automatically renewed even though I had cancelled the auto-pay option. I was charged 1200 rupees without any notification or OTP. I do not want this service anymore and I want my money back. This is predatory billing.
translated_text_en: My annual subscription was automatically renewed even though I had cancelled the auto-pay option. I was charged 1200 rupees without any notification or OTP. I do not want this service anymore and I want my money back. This is predatory billing.
reply: We have processed the cancellation and your refund will be credited in 7 days.

complaint_text: जो पार्सल आज मिला है उसका बॉक्स पूरा फटा हुआ था। अंदर जो कांच का सामान था वो भी टूट गया है। डिलीवरी बॉय ने जबरदस्ती पैकेट थमा दिया और रुकने को तैयार नहीं था। मुझे इसका हर्जाना चाहिए वरना मैं कंज्यूमर कोर्ट जाऊंगा।
translated_text_en: The parcel I received today had a completely torn box. The glassware inside is also broken. The delivery boy forced the packet on me and wasn't ready to wait. I want compensation or I will go to consumer court.
reply: We regret the damage; a pickup has been scheduled for the broken item.

complaint_text: Payment ke time app baar baar crash ho rahi hai. Do baar paise kat gaye par order confirm nahi dikha raha. Sabse ghatiya app experience hai ye. Please solve karo aur double payment refund karo jaldi se.
translated_text_en: The app is crashing repeatedly during payment. Money was deducted twice but the order isn't showing as confirmed. This is the worst app experience. Please solve this and refund the double payment quickly.
reply: Technical team is fixing the bug; the duplicate amount will be reversed automatically.

complaint_text: The delivery driver called me at 11:30 PM last night which is extremely inappropriate. I have small children and the loud ringing disturbed everyone. Is there no policy regarding delivery timings in your company? This is highly unprofessional.
translated_text_en: The delivery driver called me at 11:30 PM last night which is extremely inappropriate. I have small children and the loud ringing disturbed everyone. Is there no policy regarding delivery timings in your company? This is highly unprofessional.
reply: We apologize for the inconvenience; we have warned the delivery partner.

complaint_text: मैंने अपना केवाईसी डॉक्यूमेंट्स तीन बार अपलोड कर दिया है पर हर बार रिजेक्ट हो जाता है। सारे डॉक्यूमेंट्स एकदम सही हैं और साफ़ दिख रहे हैं। बिना केवाईसी के मैं वॉलेट इस्तेमाल नहीं कर पा रहा हूँ। कृपया इसे मैन्युअली चेक कीजिये।
translated_text_en: I have uploaded my KYC documents thrice but they get rejected every time. All documents are correct and clearly visible. Without KYC, I am unable to use the wallet. Please check it manually.
reply: Our team is reviewing your documents manually; please wait for 24 hours.

complaint_text: Promo code FIRST50 lagane par error aa raha hai ki not applicable. Jabki main pehli baar order kar raha hoon. Agar code work nahi karta toh advertise kyun karte ho? I am very disappointed with this service.
translated_text_en: When applying promo code FIRST50, it shows an error saying not applicable. Even though I am ordering for the first time. If the code doesn't work, why do you advertise it? I am very disappointed with this service.
reply: The promo code is valid only for specific categories; please check the T&C.

complaint_text: I paid my electricity bill through your portal but the status is still showing as unpaid on the official board website. Now I am being charged a late fee by the department. I need a confirmation receipt or a refund immediately to avoid disconnection.
translated_text_en: I paid my electricity bill through your portal but the status is still showing as unpaid on the official board website. Now I am being charged a late fee by the department. I need a confirmation receipt or a refund immediately to avoid disconnection.
reply: The payment is successful from our end; sharing the transaction ID for your reference.

complaint_text: मैंने १५ दिन पहले जूते वापस किये थे लेकिन रिफंड का कोई अता-पता नहीं है। ट्रैकिंग में दिखा रहा है कि आइटम आपके वेयरहाउस पहुँच गया है। इतना समय क्यों लग रहा है? मुझे पैसे की सख्त जरूरत है।
translated_text_en: I returned the shoes 15 days ago but there is no sign of the refund. Tracking shows the item has reached your warehouse. Why is it taking so much time? I am in dire need of the money.
reply: The quality check is pending at the warehouse; refund will be initiated post-approval.

complaint_text: Mera dinner order bina bataye cancel kar diya gaya. Main 1 ghante se wait kar raha tha aur ab restaurant band ho gaya hai. Ab main kya khaunga? This is very bad service from a reputed brand like yours.
translated_text_en: My dinner order was cancelled without informing me. I was waiting for 1 hour and now the restaurant is closed. What will I eat now? This is very bad service from a reputed brand like yours.
reply: We are sorry for the cancellation; a discount coupon has been added to your account.

complaint_text: I have been trying to reach your customer support for the last 3 hours but I am stuck in a loop with the automated bot. There is no option to speak to a human agent. This is the worst customer service I have ever encountered.
translated_text_en: I have been trying to reach your customer support for the last 3 hours but I am stuck in a loop with the automated bot. There is no option to speak to a human agent. This is the worst customer service I have ever encountered.
reply: We are experiencing high call volumes; an agent will contact you shortly.

complaint_text: I ordered a red kurta but you sent a blue one. Also the size is S instead of L. Why don't you guys check before sending the order? I want this exchanged as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: I ordered a red kurta but you sent a blue one. Also the size is S instead of L. Why don't you guys check before sending the order? I want this exchanged as soon as possible.
reply: Exchange request has been created; our agent will pick it up in 48 hours.

complaint_text: Delivery partner ka behavior bahut rude tha. Usne mujhe neeche bulaya parcel lene ke liye jabki mera ghar third floor par hai lift ke sath. He was shouting and misbehaving with my watchman also. Please take action against him.
translated_text_en: The delivery partner's behavior was very rude. He called me downstairs to pick up the parcel even though my house is on the third floor with a lift. He was shouting and misbehaving with my watchman also. Please take action against him.
reply: We have escalated this to the logistics team for strict action against the driver.

complaint_text: My bank transfer of 15000 INR to my sister's account is stuck for 48 hours. My account is debited but her bank says no funds received. I am very worried as she needs it for a medical emergency. Please expedite this.
translated_text_en: My bank transfer of 15000 INR to my sister's account is stuck for 48 hours. My account is debited but her bank says no funds received. I am very worried as she needs it for a medical emergency. Please expedite this.
reply: We have raised a priority ticket with the clearing bank; expect resolution in 24 hours.

complaint_text: गैस बुकिंग का पैसा कट गया पर रसीद नहीं मिली। एजेंसी वाले बोल रहे हैं कि पेमेंट नहीं आई। अब मुझे डबल पैसा देना पड़ रहा है वरना सिलेंडर नहीं मिलेगा। मेरे कटे हुए पैसे तुरंत वापस कीजिये।
translated_text_en: Gas booking money was deducted but no receipt was received. The agency is saying the payment didn't come. Now I have to pay double otherwise I won't get the cylinder. Return my deducted money immediately.
reply: The transaction failed at the bank gateway; refund will be processed automatically.

complaint_text: I ordered a smartphone last week but it still has not arrived. The tracking link is not working and customer support is not responding to my calls. I need this phone urgently for my daughter's classes.
translated_text_en: I ordered a smartphone last week but it still has not arrived. The tracking link is not working and customer support is not responding to my calls. I need this phone urgently for my daughter's classes.
reply: Dear customer, we regret the inconvenience. Our team is investigating your shipment status.

complaint_text: मेरा रिफंड अभी तक वापस नहीं आया है। मैंने 10 दिन पहले सामान वापस कर दिया था लेकिन बैंक अकाउंट में पैसे नहीं दिखे। आप लोग बस बहाने बना रहे हैं और मेरा पैसा फंसा हुआ है।
translated_text_en: My refund has not arrived yet. I returned the item 10 days ago but the money is not showing in my bank account. You guys are just making excuses and my money is stuck.
reply: नमस्ते, असुविधा के लिए खेद है। हम आपके रिफंड की स्थिति की जांच कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Maine 2000 rupaye ka UPI transaction kiya tha Bangalore store pe par payment fail ho gaya. Mere account se paise cut gaye lekin merchant ko nahi mile. Please mera paisa refund kijiye jaldi se.
translated_text_en: I did a UPI transaction of 2000 rupees at a Bangalore store but the payment failed. Money was deducted from my account but the merchant did not receive it. Please refund my money quickly.
reply: Dear customer, we are sorry for the failed transaction. The amount will be reversed within 3-5 business days.

complaint_text: The food delivered yesterday was completely cold and the packaging was torn. This is the third time I am facing this issue with your app in Hyderabad. I want a full refund for this pathetic experience.
translated_text_en: The food delivered yesterday was completely cold and the packaging was torn. This is the third time I am facing this issue with your app in Hyderabad. I want a full refund for this pathetic experience.
reply: We apologize for the food quality issue. A refund has been initiated to your wallet.

complaint_text: मेरे ऑर्डर में दो आइटम कम थे। डिलीवरी बॉय ने कहा कि ऑफिस से ही कम आए हैं। पुणे सेंटर वाले फोन भी नहीं उठा रहे बहुत ही खराब सर्विस है।
translated_text_en: Two items were missing from my order. The delivery boy said they were missing from the office itself. The Pune center is not even picking up calls, very bad service.
reply: असुविधा के लिए क्षमा करें। हम लापता वस्तुओं की जांच कर रहे हैं और आपसे संपर्क करेंगे।

complaint_text: Aapka delivery partner mere ghar tak nahi aaya aur status update kar diya ki address not found. Kolkata ki sari galliyan pata hain mujhe ye bas unki laziness hai. Action lijiye ispe turant.
translated_text_en: Your delivery partner did not come to my house and updated the status as address not found. I know all the streets of Kolkata, this is just their laziness. Take action immediately.
reply: We apologize for the delivery attempt failure. We have rescheduled your delivery for tomorrow.

complaint_text: My credit card was charged twice for the same transaction on your website. I have sent multiple emails but no resolution yet. This is a significant amount and I am very stressed about it.
translated_text_en: My credit card was charged twice for the same transaction on your website. I have sent multiple emails but no resolution yet. This is a significant amount and I am very stressed about it.
reply: Our apologies for the double charge. The duplicate amount is being processed for a refund.

complaint_text: लखनऊ के गोमती नगर इलाके में कल से नेटवर्क नहीं आ रहा है। मेरा सारा काम रुका हुआ है और बिल समय पर भरता हूँ। अगर जल्दी ठीक नहीं हुआ तो मैं सिम बदल लूँगा।
translated_text_en: There has been no network in the Gomti Nagar area of Lucknow since yesterday. All my work is stalled and I pay bills on time. If not fixed soon I will change my SIM.
reply: प्रिय ग्राहक, आपके क्षेत्र में तकनीकी सुधार चल रहा है। जल्द ही सेवा बहाल हो जाएगी।

complaint_text: Mera Amazon order Ahmedabad hub pe 4 din se ruka hua hai. Har baar customer care bolta hai ki aaj deliver hoga par nahi aata. Kya mazaak chal raha hai?
translated_text_en: My Amazon order has been stuck at the Ahmedabad hub for 4 days. Every time customer care says it will be delivered today but it does not come. What joke is going on?
reply: We regret the delay at the hub. We are expediting your delivery on priority.

complaint_text: The laptop I received has a cracked screen and the battery is not charging. I spent 60000 INR on this and this is what I get? I demand an immediate replacement or refund.
translated_text_en: The laptop I received has a cracked screen and the battery is not charging. I spent 60000 INR on this and this is what I get? I demand an immediate replacement or refund.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the damaged product. A replacement request has been created.

complaint_text: मैंने जयपुर से दिल्ली के लिए बस बुक की थी लेकिन बस समय पर नहीं आई। मुझे दूसरी बस में पैसे देकर जाना पड़ा। मेरे पैसे वापस करो वरना मैं कंज्यूमर कोर्ट जाऊँगा।
translated_text_en: I booked a bus from Jaipur to Delhi but the bus did not arrive on time. I had to pay for another bus to go. Return my money or I will go to consumer court.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफी चाहते हैं। कृपया अपनी टिकट विवरण साझा करें हम रिफंड प्रोसेस करेंगे।

complaint_text: Patna ke outlet pe staff ne mere saath bahut badtameezi se baat ki. Maine feedback dena chaha to unhone mana kar diya. Aise logon ko rakhte hi kyu ho aap log?
translated_text_en: The staff at the Patna outlet spoke to me very rudely. When I wanted to give feedback they refused. Why do you even hire such people?
reply: We take staff behavior seriously. We have escalated this to the regional manager.

complaint_text: The subscription I cancelled last month is still active and money was deducted again. This is unauthorized billing and highly unprofessional. Fix this immediately and refund the amount.
translated_text_en: The subscription I cancelled last month is still active and money was deducted again. This is unauthorized billing and highly unprofessional. Fix this immediately and refund the amount.
reply: We apologize for the billing error. Your subscription has been terminated and refund issued.

complaint_text: मेरे पास खराब सड़ी हुई सब्जियां भेजी गई हैं। इंदौर जैसे शहर में आप ऐसी क्वालिटी दे रहे हैं? शर्म आनी चाहिए आप लोगों को ग्राहकों को लूटते हुए।
translated_text_en: Rotten and spoiled vegetables have been sent to me. Are you providing such quality in a city like Indore? You should be ashamed of looting customers.
reply: खराब उत्पाद के लिए हमें खेद है। आपके वॉलेट में रिफंड क्रेडिट कर दिया गया है।

complaint_text: Chandigarh me mere ghar ke bahar wale tower me signal issue hai. Voice break hoti hai baar baar baat karte waqt. Internet speed bhi 2G jaisi aa rahi hai.
translated_text_en: There is a signal issue in the tower outside my house in Chandigarh. Voice breaks repeatedly while talking. Internet speed is also like 2G.
reply: Asuvidha ke liye khed hai. Hamare technicians tower check kar rahe hain.

complaint_text: I bought a washing machine during the sale but the installation team is not showing up. It is been five days and the machine is just sitting in my hallway. Extremely poor post-purchase service.
translated_text_en: I bought a washing machine during the sale but the installation team is not showing up. It is been five days and the machine is just sitting in my hallway. Extremely poor post-purchase service.
reply: We apologize for the delay. An installation technician will visit you within 24 hours.

complaint_text: मेरा बिजली का बिल इस महीने चार गुना ज्यादा आया है। कानपुर में इतनी बिजली की खपत कभी नहीं हुई। कृपया मीटर चेक करवाएं और बिल ठीक करें।
translated_text_en: My electricity bill has come four times higher this month. There has never been such electricity consumption in Kanpur. Please get the meter checked and fix the bill.
reply: हम आपके मीटर की जांच के लिए एक टीम भेज रहे हैं। कृपया धैर्य बनाए रखें।

complaint_text: Surat wale courier office me mera parcel pada hai par wo deliver nahi kar rahe. Jab call karo to phone busy aata hai hamesha. Kya mera saman chori ho gaya hai?
translated_text_en: My parcel is lying in the Surat courier office but they are not delivering it. When I call the phone is always busy. Has my item been stolen?
reply: We regret the lack of response from the hub. We are tracking your parcel now.

complaint_text: The shoes I ordered are the wrong size even though I checked the chart carefully. Now your app says non-returnable which is ridiculous for a sizing issue. I want an exchange.
translated_text_en: The shoes I ordered are the wrong size even though I checked the chart carefully. Now your app says non-returnable which is ridiculous for a sizing issue. I want an exchange.
reply: We understand the sizing concern. As an exception we have approved an exchange.

complaint_text: I visited the Varanasi store and the prices are much higher than online. The manager was extremely rude when I asked about price matching. This feels like a scam to local customers.
translated_text_en: I visited the Varanasi store and the prices are much higher than online. The manager was extremely rude when I asked about price matching. This feels like a scam to local customers.
reply: We apologize for the pricing discrepancy and staff behavior. We are looking into this.

complaint_text: I ordered a laptop from your app 5 days ago. The tracking says it is out for delivery since morning, but no one has called yet. This is very unprofessional behavior from your logistics partner.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop from your app 5 days ago. The tracking says it is out for delivery since morning, but no one has called yet. This is very unprofessional behavior from your logistics partner.
reply: We apologize for the delay; we have escalated this to our delivery partner to ensure delivery by tonight.

complaint_text: My UPI payment failed twice while booking movie tickets. The amount of 840 was deducted both times from my HDFC bank account. Please initiate the refund immediately as I need the money for other bookings.
translated_text_en: My UPI payment failed twice while booking movie tickets. The amount of 840 was deducted both times from my HDFC bank account. Please initiate the refund immediately as I need the money for other bookings.
reply: Refunds for failed UPI transactions are processed automatically within 5-7 business days.

complaint_text: I received a completely different product than what I ordered. I ordered a Sony headphones set but received some local brand. This is a scam and I want my money back right now.
translated_text_en: I received a completely different product than what I ordered. I ordered a Sony headphones set but received some local brand. This is a scam and I want my money back right now.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the mix-up. We have initiated a replacement and a quality check for your order.

complaint_text: The service technician promised to come at 10 AM for the AC repair. It is already 4 PM and no one has shown up or even called to inform about the delay. I have wasted my whole day waiting for you.
translated_text_en: The service technician promised to come at 10 AM for the AC repair. It is already 4 PM and no one has shown up or even called to inform about the delay. I have wasted my whole day waiting for you.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our technician is on the way and will reach you in 30 minutes.

complaint_text: You have charged me twice for my monthly subscription. I checked my credit card statement and there are two entries of 999 for the same month. Please rectify this error immediately.
translated_text_en: You have charged me twice for my monthly subscription. I checked my credit card statement and there are two entries of 999 for the same month. Please rectify this error immediately.
reply: We have identified the duplicate charge and have initiated a refund for the extra amount.

complaint_text: The package I received today was completely crushed and the item inside is broken. The delivery agent just dropped it at the gate and ran away. This is pathetic handling of fragile goods.
translated_text_en: The package I received today was completely crushed and the item inside is broken. The delivery agent just dropped it at the gate and ran away. This is pathetic handling of fragile goods.
reply: Please upload photos of the damaged package; we will arrange a free replacement immediately.

complaint_text: I ordered a grocery kit and half of the items are missing from the bag. I have been trying to reach the support executive for an hour but the line is busy. This is very disappointing.
translated_text_en: I ordered a grocery kit and half of the items are missing from the bag. I have been trying to reach the support executive for an hour but the line is busy. This is very disappointing.
reply: We apologize for the missing items. We are processing a refund for the items not delivered.

complaint_text: I am unable to login to my account even after resetting my password multiple times. Your system says my email is not registered but I have been a customer for 2 years. Please fix this bug.
translated_text_en: I am unable to login to my account even after resetting my password multiple times. Your system says my email is not registered but I have been a customer for 2 years. Please fix this bug.
reply: Our technical team is looking into your account linkage issue. Expect a resolution in 24 hours.

complaint_text: मैंने पिछले हफ्ते एक साड़ी मंगवाई थी जो आज मिली है लेकिन उसका रंग बिल्कुल अलग है। यह कपड़े की क्वालिटी भी बहुत खराब है और धागे निकल रहे हैं। कृपया इसे वापस ले लें और मेरे पैसे लौटा दें।
translated_text_en: I ordered a saree last week which I received today but the color is completely different. The quality of the fabric is also very poor and threads are coming out. Please take it back and return my money.
reply: क्षमा करें, हम आपका रिटर्न स्वीकार कर रहे हैं और 48 घंटों में पिकअप हो जाएगा।

complaint_text: बैंक अकाउंट से 5000 रुपये कट गए पर बिजली का बिल अभी भी पेंडिंग दिखा रहा है। कस्टमर केयर कॉल उठा नहीं रहा और मुझे डर है कि कहीं फाइन न लग जाए। कृपया जल्दी समाधान करें।
translated_text_en: 5000 rupees were deducted from the bank account but the electricity bill is still showing as pending. Customer care is not picking up and I fear I might get fined. Please resolve quickly.
reply: कृपया चिंता न करें, तकनीकी समस्या के कारण अपडेट में देरी हो रही है, आपका भुगतान सुरक्षित है।

complaint_text: मेरा पार्सल डिलीवर दिखा रहा है लेकिन मुझे कुछ नहीं मिला। गार्ड से भी पूछ लिया पर कोई पैकेट नहीं आया है। आप लोग धोखाधड़ी कर रहे हैं क्या?
translated_text_en: My parcel is showing as delivered but I haven't received anything. I even asked the guard but no packet has arrived. Are you guys committing fraud?
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है, हम डिलीवरी पार्टनर के साथ इसकी जांच कर रहे हैं और जल्द ही अपडेट देंगे।

complaint_text: रिफंड का वादा किया गया था 3 दिन पहले लेकिन अभी तक पैसे नहीं आए। हर बार वही ऑटोमेटेड मैसेज मिलता है। मुझे किसी असली इंसान से बात करनी है जो मदद कर सके।
translated_text_en: A refund was promised 3 days ago but the money hasn't arrived yet. Every time I get the same automated message. I want to talk to a real person who can help.
reply: देरी के लिए माफी चाहते हैं, आपका रिफंड प्रोसेस हो चुका है, कृपया अपने बैंक स्टेटमेंट की जांच करें।

complaint_text: आपके स्टोर के कर्मचारी का व्यवहार बहुत ही खराब था। जब मैंने प्रोडक्ट बदलने की बात की तो उन्होंने चिल्लाना शुरू कर दिया। क्या आप अपने स्टाफ को ट्रेनिंग नहीं देते?
translated_text_en: The behavior of your store employee was very bad. When I talked about exchanging the product, he started shouting. Don't you train your staff?
