reply: इस घटना के लिए हमें खेद है, हम संबंधित स्टोर मैनेजर के खिलाफ उचित कार्रवाई करेंगे।

complaint_text: मेरा सब्सक्रिप्शन अपने आप रिन्यू हो गया जबकि मैंने कैंसिल कर दिया था। बिना मेरी परमिशन के पैसे कैसे काट लिए? मुझे तुरंत अपना पैसा वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: My subscription renewed automatically even though I had cancelled it. How did you deduct money without my permission? I want my money back immediately.
reply: हम इस त्रुटि की जांच कर रहे हैं और आपके खाते में पैसे वापस भेजने की प्रक्रिया शुरू कर दी है।

complaint_text: Bhai mera order abhi tak ship kyu nahi hua? Teen din ho gaye hai aur status wahi purana dikha raha hai. Mujhe ye gift birthday ke liye chahiye tha jaldi bhejo.
translated_text_en: Brother, why hasn't my order shipped yet? It's been three days and the status shows the same old thing. I needed this gift for a birthday, please send it quickly.
reply: Appreciate your patience, your order is scheduled for dispatch today and will reach you by tomorrow.

complaint_text: App baar baar crash ho rahi hai jab main checkout karne ki koshish karta hoon. Mere wallet se paise bhi kat gaye par confirmation mail nahi aaya. Very bad experience.
translated_text_en: The app is crashing repeatedly when I try to checkout. Money was also deducted from my wallet but no confirmation mail came. Very bad experience.
reply: We are fixing the app bug. Your money is safe and the order has been confirmed manually now.

complaint_text: Kyc update karne ke liye document upload nahi ho raha hai. Maine 5 baar try kiya par har baar error aa jata hai. Help me quickly as my account is blocked.
translated_text_en: Document is not uploading for KYC update. I tried 5 times but every time an error occurs. Help me quickly as my account is blocked.
reply: Please try clearing your app cache or use our website to upload the documents for faster KYC.

complaint_text: Maine 2000 ki shopping ki thi par promised cashback nahi mila. Offer terms mein likha tha instant milega par 2 din ho gaye kuch nahi aaya.
translated_text_en: I did shopping worth 2000 but didn't get the promised cashback. Offer terms said it's instant but it's been 2 days and nothing arrived.
reply: The cashback will be credited within 48 hours of order delivery, please wait for the status update.

complaint_text: Order cancel karne ka option hi nahi aa raha app mein. Mujhe galti se wrong size order ho gaya aur ab main change nahi kar pa raha hoon. Help kar do please.
translated_text_en: The option to cancel the order is not showing in the app. I accidentally ordered the wrong size and now I can't change it. Help me please.
reply: We have manually cancelled the order for you. You can now place a new order with the correct size.

complaint_text: OTP nahi aa raha login ke liye. Network full hai phir bhi message nahi mil raha. Mobile recharge khatam ho gaya hai kya aapka? Majak bana rakha hai.
translated_text_en: OTP is not coming for login. Network is full yet I am not getting the message. Has your mobile recharge finished? This is a joke.
reply: We are experiencing a temporary glitch with our SMS gateway. Please try the 'Resend via WhatsApp' option.

complaint_text: I ordered a laptop from Mumbai last week, but the box arrived empty today. I am shocked by this fraud and need my money back immediately. Please investigate this as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop from Mumbai last week, but the box arrived empty today. I am shocked by this fraud and need my money back immediately. Please investigate this as soon as possible.
reply: We are investigating the empty box claim with the warehouse.

complaint_text: मैंने बिजली बिल भरा था पर पेमेंट फेल हो गया लेकिन बैंक से पैसे कट गए। दिल्ली में बहुत गर्मी है और बिना बिजली के रहना मुश्किल है। मेरा पैसा वापस करो तुरंत।
translated_text_en: I paid the electricity bill but the payment failed even though the money was deducted from the bank. It is very hot in Delhi and difficult to live without power. Refund my money immediately.
reply: Ham kshama chahte hain, refund 3-5 dinon mein mil jayega.

complaint_text: Mera shoe size galat aa gaya hai Bangalore me. Maine size 8 mangwaya tha par aapne size 10 bhej diya. Delivery boy call bhi nahi utha raha hai return ke liye.
translated_text_en: I received the wrong shoe size in Bangalore. I ordered size 8 but you sent size 10. The delivery boy is not even picking up calls for the return.
reply: Pickup has been scheduled for tomorrow.

complaint_text: The groceries delivered in Chennai today were rotten and smelling badly. I have been a loyal customer but this quality is unacceptable. I want a full refund for the spoiled vegetables.
translated_text_en: The groceries delivered in Chennai today were rotten and smelling badly. I have been a loyal customer but this quality is unacceptable. I want a full refund for the spoiled vegetables.
reply: Refund has been initiated for the perishable items.

complaint_text: जयपुर के स्टोर से जो साड़ी मंगवाई थी उसका रंग बिलकुल फीका है। फोटो में कुछ और था और असली में कुछ और निकला। मुझे यह वापस करनी है और पैसे चाहिए।
translated_text_en: The saree I ordered from the Jaipur store has a very faded color. It was something else in the photo and turned out differently in reality. I want to return this and get my money.
reply: Wapasi ki prakriya shuru kar di gayi hai.

complaint_text: Pune me delivery bahut late ho rahi hai. Medicine mangwayi thi dadi ke liye par 3 din se pending dikha raha hai. Emergency hai bhai jaldi bhej do.
translated_text_en: Delivery is very late in Pune. I ordered medicine for my grandmother but it has been showing pending for 3 days. It is an emergency, please send it quickly.
reply: Order is out for delivery now.

complaint_text: I am trying to use the UPI app for my restaurant bill in Hyderabad, but the transaction keeps failing. My bank balance has decreased but the merchant says payment not received. This is very embarrassing.
translated_text_en: I am trying to use the UPI app for my restaurant bill in Hyderabad, but the transaction keeps failing. My bank balance has decreased but the merchant says payment not received. This is very embarrassing.
reply: The amount will be reversed to your account within 48 hours.

complaint_text: लखनऊ में मेरे घर पर कूरियर वाला बदतमीजी कर रहा था। उसने बिना साइन लिए पार्सल फेक दिया और चला गया। ऐसे लोगो को काम पर क्यों रखते हो आप?
translated_text_en: The courier guy was behaving rudely at my house in Lucknow. He threw the parcel and left without taking a signature. Why do you hire such people?
reply: Hum kshama chahte hain, delivery partner ke khilaf action liya jayega.

complaint_text: Mera Kolkata wala flight ticket cancel ho gaya par refund nahi mila. Customer care pe call lag nahi raha hai aur chat bot useless hai. Mujhe mera 5000 wapas chahiye.
translated_text_en: My Kolkata flight ticket got canceled but I haven't received the refund. The call is not connecting to customer care and the chat bot is useless. I want my 5000 back.
reply: Refund is being processed manually.

complaint_text: The air conditioner I bought from your Ahmedabad outlet is not cooling at all. The installation engineer was also very unprofessional. I am sweating in this heat and you are not helping.
translated_text_en: The air conditioner I bought from your Ahmedabad outlet is not cooling at all. The installation engineer was also very unprofessional. I am sweating in this heat and you are not helping.
reply: A senior technician will visit your home tomorrow.

complaint_text: इंदौर में मेरा मोबाइल रिचार्ज अभी तक नहीं हुआ जबकि पैसे कट गए हैं। मैंने अपनी माँ के लिए रिचार्ज किया था ताकि बात हो सके। कृपया तुरंत सक्रिय करें।
translated_text_en: My mobile recharge in Indore has not happened yet even though the money was deducted. I recharged for my mother so we could talk. Please activate immediately.
reply: Recharge safal ho gaya hai, kripya check karein.

complaint_text: Chandigarh me mere order ka status 'delivered' dikha raha hai par mujhe kuch nahi mila. Security guard ke paas bhi nahi hai. Chor hai kya aapka delivery wala?
translated_text_en: The status of my order in Chandigarh shows 'delivered' but I haven't received anything. Even the security guard doesn't have it. Is your delivery guy a thief?
reply: We are checking the GPS location of the delivery boy.

complaint_text: I received a broken ceramic dinner set in Kochi today. The packaging was very poor and thin. I want a replacement or my money back immediately.
translated_text_en: I received a broken ceramic dinner set in Kochi today. The packaging was very poor and thin. I want a replacement or my money back immediately.
reply: Please upload photos of the damage for a replacement.

complaint_text: पटना में मुझे गलत सामान भेज दिया गया है। मैंने मिक्सर ग्राइंडर मंगवाया था पर डिब्बे में लोहे का प्रेस निकला। यह बहुत बड़ी लापरवाही है आपकी कंपनी की।
translated_text_en: The wrong item was sent to me in Patna. I ordered a mixer grinder but found an iron press in the box. This is a very big negligence on your company's part.
reply: Hum iski jaanch kar rahe hain, sahi product bhej diya jayega.

complaint_text: Nagpur ki dhoop me wait kar raha tha courier ka par usne call karke bola ki address nahi mil raha. Maine location share ki phir bhi nahi aaya. Very bad service.
translated_text_en: I was waiting for the courier in the Nagpur sun but he called and said he couldn't find the address. I shared the location yet he didn't come. Very bad service.
reply: Delivery will be re-attempted with a different agent.

complaint_text: My credit card was charged twice for the same transaction in Surat. I have already contacted my bank and they said the fault is at your end. Please rectify this error.
translated_text_en: My credit card was charged twice for the same transaction in Surat. I have already contacted my bank and they already said the fault is at your end. Please rectify this error.
reply: The duplicate transaction has been identified and reversed.

complaint_text: भोपाल में मेरे खाने का आर्डर २ घंटे से लेट है। जोमेटो वाले बोल रहे हैं की होटल से नहीं निकला। मेरा बच्चा भूखा है और आप लोग तमाशा कर रहे हो।
translated_text_en: My food order in Bhopal is 2 hours late. Zomato says it hasn't left the hotel. My child is hungry and you guys are making a mockery.
reply: Kshama chahte hain, humne order cancel kar ke refund de diya hai.

complaint_text: Guwahati me mera internet 2 din se band hai. Recharge bhi kiya tha extra data ke liye par speed 2G jaisi hai. Kaam kaise karu main?
translated_text_en: My internet in Guwahati has been down for 2 days. I even recharged for extra data but the speed is like 2G. How am I supposed to work?
reply: Hamare technician line check kar rahe hain.

complaint_text: I am extremely disappointed with the customer support team in Vizag. No one is responding to my emails regarding the missing items in my grocery bag. This is blatant cheating.
translated_text_en: I am extremely disappointed with the customer support team in Vizag. No one is responding to my emails regarding the missing items in my grocery bag. This is blatant cheating.
reply: We have credited the missing items' value to your wallet.

complaint_text: The furniture I ordered from Jaipur arrived with several scratches and a broken leg. I paid a premium price for quality and received junk instead. I want this picked up tomorrow.
translated_text_en: The furniture I ordered from Jaipur arrived with several scratches and a broken leg. I paid a premium price for quality and received junk instead. I want this picked up tomorrow.
reply: We are arranging a pickup and full refund for the furniture.

complaint_text: I ordered a pair of Nike shoes on 5th October and they haven't arrived yet. The tracking shows it is still in the warehouse. I need this for a wedding next week and I am very stressed. Please resolve this immediately.
translated_text_en: I ordered a pair of Nike shoes on 5th October and they haven't arrived yet. The tracking shows it is still in the warehouse. I need this for a wedding next week and I am very stressed. Please resolve this immediately.
reply: We apologize for the delay, we are checking with the courier partner.

complaint_text: मेरा लैपटॉप पिछले तीन दिनों से फंसा हुआ है और कोई अपडेट नहीं मिल रहा। डिलीवरी बॉय फोन नहीं उठा रहा है और मैं काम नहीं कर पा रहा हूँ। यह बहुत ही गैर-जिम्मेदाराना व्यवहार है। तुरंत मेरा पैसा वापस करो या सामान भेजो।
translated_text_en: My laptop has been stuck for the last three days and I am not getting any updates. The delivery boy is not picking up the phone and I am unable to work. This is very irresponsible behavior. Refund my money or send the item immediately.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है, हम आपकी डिलीवरी की स्थिति की जांच कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Maine Zomato se khana order kiya tha par 2 ghante ho gaye. Delivery partner keh raha hai ki restaurant band hai. My money was deducted but I haven't got my food or refund. Customer support is not responding at all.
translated_text_en: I ordered food from Zomato but it has been 2 hours. Delivery partner is saying the restaurant is closed. My money was deducted but I haven't got my food or refund. Customer support is not responding at all.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain, aapka refund process kar diya gaya hai.

complaint_text: The UPI payment I made for my electricity bill failed but the amount was debited from my HDFC bank account. This is the third time this month that your app has glitched. I am tired of calling the helpline. Please credit my 1200 rupees back right now.
translated_text_en: The UPI payment I made for my electricity bill failed but the amount was debited from my HDFC bank account. This is the third time this month that your app has glitched. I am tired of calling the helpline. Please credit my 1200 rupees back right now.
reply: Please wait for 3-5 business days for the refund to reflect in your account.

complaint_text: मैंने दो हफ्ते पहले एसी सर्विस की बुकिंग की थी पर कोई नहीं आया। मैंने पहले ही एडवांस पेमेंट कर दिया है। कस्टमर केयर वाले सिर्फ तारीख बदल रहे हैं। मुझे मेरा पैसा वापस चाहिए वरना मैं कंज्यूमर कोर्ट जाऊँगा।
translated_text_en: I booked an AC service two weeks ago but nobody came. I have already made the advance payment. Customer care is just changing dates. I want my money back or I will go to consumer court.
reply: क्षमा करें, हम आज ही एक तकनीशियन भेज रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Mera parcel aaj receive hua par usme galat item hai. Maine ek smart watch mangayi thi aur box mein sirf ek sasti ghadi nikli. I am shocked ki itni badi company aisa fraud kaise kar sakti hai. Please exchange karke do fast.
translated_text_en: I received my parcel today but it contains the wrong item. I ordered a smart watch and the box contained only a cheap watch. I am shocked how such a big company can do such fraud. Please exchange it fast.
reply: We have initiated a return request for your order.

complaint_text: The flight ticket I booked through your portal was canceled by the airline, yet you are charging me a high cancellation fee. I was promised a full refund in such cases. This is daylight robbery of a loyal customer. I will never book from here again.
translated_text_en: The flight ticket I booked through your portal was canceled by the airline, yet you are charging me a high cancellation fee. I was promised a full refund in such cases. This is daylight robbery of a loyal customer. I will never book from here again.
reply: As per airline policy, the refund is being processed minus the service fee.

complaint_text: मैंने अपना मोबाइल रिचार्ज किया था पर वो अभी तक एक्टिव नहीं हुआ है। बैंक से पैसा कट गया है और मैसेज भी आ गया है। कृपया इसे जल्दी से ठीक करें क्योंकि मुझे बहुत जरूरी कॉल करने हैं। यह बहुत दुखद है।
translated_text_en: I recharged my mobile but it has not been activated yet. Money has been deducted from the bank and I have received the message. Please fix this quickly as I have to make urgent calls. This is very sad.
reply: आपका रिचार्ज सफल हो गया है, कृपया अपना फोन रीस्टार्ट करें।

complaint_text: Mere credit card se 50000 ki shopping hui hai jo maine nahi ki. Main foreign mein bhi nahi hoon phir bhi dollar mein transaction hua hai. Block my card immediately and stop this payment. I am very scared about my money security.
translated_text_en: 50000 worth of shopping was done from my credit card which I did not do. I am not even abroad yet the transaction happened in dollars. Block my card immediately and stop this payment. I am very scared about my money security.
reply: Your card has been blocked and we are investigating the transaction.

complaint_text: The sofa delivered today has several scratches and a torn fabric on the left side. I paid for a premium product and received a damaged piece. I want a replacement or a full refund by tomorrow. The delivery staff was also very rude when I pointed it out.
translated_text_en: The sofa delivered today has several scratches and a torn fabric on the left side. I paid for a premium product and received a damaged piece. I want a replacement or a full refund by tomorrow. The delivery staff was also very rude when I pointed it out.
reply: We are sorry for the damage, a replacement has been scheduled.

complaint_text: मेरा बैंक अकाउंट बिना किसी नोटिस के ब्लॉक कर दिया गया है। मुझे अपनी बेटी की फीस भरनी है और मैं पैसे नहीं निकाल पा रहा हूँ। बैंक ब्रांच मैनेजर कह रहे हैं कि सर्वर डाउन है। यह बहुत ही तनावपूर्ण स्थिति है।
translated_text_en: My bank account has been blocked without any notice. I have to pay my daughter's fees and I am unable to withdraw money. The bank branch manager is saying the server is down. This is a very stressful situation.
reply: आपके खाते की केवाईसी प्रक्रिया अधूरी है, कृपया दस्तावेजों के साथ शाखा आएं।

complaint_text: Maine pichle mahine ki sale mein 10000 ki shopping ki thi par cashback nahi aaya. Terms and conditions mein likha tha ki 48 hours mein credit ho jayega. It has been 15 days now, aapki team sirf tickets close kar rahi hai. Bad experience.
translated_text_en: I did shopping of 10000 in last month's sale but the cashback did not come. It was written in terms and conditions that it will be credited in 48 hours. It has been 15 days now, your team is only closing tickets. Bad experience.
reply: We are verifying your eligibility for the cashback offer.

complaint_text: I received a notification that my order was delivered, but there is nothing at my doorstep. I have checked with my neighbors and the security guard as well. I suspect the delivery boy stole the package. Please check the GPS location of the delivery.
translated_text_en: I received a notification that my order was delivered, but there is nothing at my doorstep. I have checked with my neighbors and the security guard as well. I suspect the delivery boy stole the package. Please check the GPS location of the delivery.
reply: We are investigating the delivery with our logistics partner.

complaint_text: गैस बुकिंग किए हुए 5 दिन हो गए हैं पर सिलेंडर अभी तक नहीं आया। घर में खाना बनाने के लिए गैस खत्म हो गई है। हेल्पलाइन नंबर हमेशा बिजी रहता है। हमें बहुत परेशानी हो रही है।
translated_text_en: It has been 5 days since the gas booking but the cylinder has not arrived yet. Gas has run out for cooking at home. The helpline number is always busy. We are facing a lot of trouble.
reply: क्षमा करें, आपके क्षेत्र में डिलीवरी आज शाम तक हो जाएगी।

complaint_text: Maine bill pay kiya tha par transaction double baar ho gaya. Mere account se 2400 rupaye do baar cut gaye hain. Ek payment fail dikha raha hai par bank se debit hua hai. Please mera extra amount wapas kijiye.
translated_text_en: I paid the bill but the transaction happened twice. 2400 rupees have been deducted twice from my account. One payment is showing as failed but it has been debited from the bank. Please refund my extra amount.
reply: The duplicate amount will be refunded to your source account within 7 days.

complaint_text: I canceled my premium subscription last month, yet I was charged again today. This is completely unacceptable and feels like a scam to keep charging customers. I want an immediate refund and a confirmation that my account is closed.
translated_text_en: I canceled my premium subscription last month, yet I was charged again today. This is completely unacceptable and feels like a scam to keep charging customers. I want an immediate refund and a confirmation that my account is closed.
reply: We have processed your refund and terminated the subscription.

complaint_text: नया फोन खरीदे हुए सिर्फ एक हफ्ता हुआ है और यह चार्जिंग के समय बहुत ज्यादा गर्म हो रहा है। कल तो फोन अपने आप बंद हो गया था। मुझे डर है कि कहीं यह फट न जाए। कृपया इसे बदल दीजिए।
translated_text_en: It has been only one week since I bought the new phone and it is getting very hot while charging. Yesterday the phone turned off on its own. I am afraid it might explode. Please replace it.
reply: कृपया नजदीकी सर्विस सेंटर पर जाएं, हमने आपका अपॉइंटमेंट बुक कर दिया है।

complaint_text: Pichle 3 din se mera wifi nahi chal raha hai. Work from home hone ki wajah se mera bahut nuksan ho raha hai. Aapka technician bolta hai wire cut gaya hai par theek karne koi nahi aata. Very pathetic service.
translated_text_en: My wifi has not been working for the last 3 days. Due to work from home, I am suffering a lot of loss. Your technician says the wire is cut but no one comes to fix it. Very pathetic service.
reply: We have escalated your request to the local field team.

complaint_text: I tried to claim the warranty for my washing machine as the motor stopped working. The service center says this model is no longer covered, but my invoice clearly shows 2 years of warranty left. I am extremely frustrated with this misinformation.
translated_text_en: I tried to claim the warranty for my washing machine as the motor stopped working. The service center says this model is no longer covered, but my invoice clearly shows 2 years of warranty left. I am extremely frustrated with this misinformation.
reply: Please share a copy of your invoice so we can update our records.

complaint_text: The saree I ordered for my mother's birthday arrived today, but the color is completely different from what was shown on the website. It looks dull and cheap. This was supposed to be a gift and now it's ruined. I want a return pick up and refund.
translated_text_en: The saree I ordered for my mother's birthday arrived today, but the color is completely different from what was shown on the website. It looks dull and cheap. This was supposed to be a gift and now it's ruined. I want a return pick up and refund.
reply: We are sorry for the mismatch, a return has been initiated.

complaint_text: My order #ORD1092 was supposed to be delivered yesterday. The delivery agent called me and then switched off his phone. I have been waiting at home all day and nobody showed up.
translated_text_en: My order #ORD1092 was supposed to be delivered yesterday. The delivery agent called me and then switched off his phone. I have been waiting at home all day and nobody showed up.
reply: We are sorry for the delay. We have escalated this to the hub manager and your order will be delivered by EOD.

complaint_text: मेरा पैसा कट गया है लेकिन टिकट बुक नहीं हुई। कृपया मुझे तुरंत रिफंड दें वरना मुझे कानूनी कार्रवाई करनी पड़ेगी। यह बहुत ही निराशाजनक अनुभव है।
translated_text_en: My money has been deducted but the ticket was not booked. Please give me a refund immediately or I will have to take legal action. This is a very disappointing experience.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका रिफंड प्रोसेस कर दिया गया है और 5-7 दिनों में आपके खाते में आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: Bhai mera UPI payment fail ho gaya par bank account se 5000 nikal gaye. Na product mila na paisa wapas aaya. Customer care phone nahi utha raha hai.
translated_text_en: Brother my UPI payment failed but 5000 was deducted from my bank account. Neither did I get the product nor the money back. Customer care is not picking up the phone.
reply: Hume dukh hai aapko pareshani hui. Aapka paisa 3-4 working days mein auto-refund ho jayega.

complaint_text: The quality of the saree I received is pathetic. It looks nothing like the picture shown on the app and the fabric is torn in several places. I want an immediate replacement or full refund.
translated_text_en: The quality of the saree I received is pathetic. It looks nothing like the picture shown on the app and the fabric is torn in several places. I want an immediate replacement or full refund.
reply: We apologize for the damaged product. A return pickup has been scheduled for tomorrow morning.

complaint_text: मैने दो बार भुगतान कर दिया है और अब आपके एजेंट कह रहे हैं कि उन्हें पैसा नहीं मिला। मेरे पास बैंक स्टेटमेंट का प्रमाण है। कृपया मेरा पैसा वापस करें।
translated_text_en: I have paid twice and now your agents are saying they did not get the money. I have proof of the bank statement. Please return my money.
reply: हम इस मामले की जांच कर रहे हैं। कृपया अपना बैंक स्टेटमेंट support@brand.com पर भेजें।

complaint_text: Delivery boy ne mera parcel gate pe chhod diya bina kisi call ke. Jab maine check kiya toh box khula hua tha aur andar se headphones missing hai. Ye toh chori hai!
translated_text_en: The delivery boy left my parcel at the gate without any call. When I checked, the box was open and the headphones were missing from inside. This is theft!
reply: This is serious. We are investigating the delivery partner and will provide a resolution within 24 hours.

complaint_text: I am unable to login to my account even after resetting the password multiple times. This is causing me a lot of stress as I need to track my expensive purchase. Fix this technical glitch immediately.
translated_text_en: I am unable to login to my account even after resetting the password multiple times. This is causing me a lot of stress as I need to track my expensive purchase. Fix this technical glitch immediately.
reply: Our technical team is working on your account access. Please try logging in after 2 hours.

complaint_text: क्या आप बता सकते हैं कि मेरा ऑर्डर जयपुर के गोदाम में तीन दिनों से क्यों पड़ा है? अभी तक डिलीवरी क्यों नहीं हुई? मुझे आज जन्मदिन के लिए इसकी बहुत ज़रूरत थी।
translated_text_en: Can you tell me why my order has been sitting in the Jaipur warehouse for three days? Why hasn't it been delivered yet? I really needed it for a birthday today.
reply: देरी के लिए क्षमा करें। स्थानीय हड़ताल के कारण डिलीवरी में बाधा आई है, हम इसे कल तक पहुँचा देंगे।

complaint_text: Service bahut bekar hai aap logo ki. Refund initiate karke 10 din ho gaye par bank me nahi aaya. Please check karke bataiye delay kyun hai.
translated_text_en: Your service is very bad. It has been 10 days since the refund was initiated but it has not reached the bank. Please check and tell me why there is a delay.
reply: Refund status check kiya gaya hai. Bank ki taraf se thoda delay hai, please 2 din aur intezar karein.

complaint_text: The food delivered was cold and the packaging was completely damaged. I had guests over and it was so embarrassing to serve such food. I demand a full credit for this mess.
translated_text_en: The food delivered was cold and the packaging was completely damaged. I had guests over and it was so embarrassing to serve such food. I demand a full credit for this mess.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the bad experience. We have credited the full amount back to your wallet.

complaint_text: फोन का कैमरा खराब निकला और अब आप कह रहे हैं कि रिटर्न नहीं होगा। मैंने 40000 रुपये दिए हैं कोई मज़ाक नहीं। मुझे नया फोन चाहिए या मेरे पैसे।
translated_text_en: The phone's camera turned out to be defective and now you are saying there will be no return. I paid 40000 rupees, it's not a joke. I want a new phone or my money.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफी। हम आपके फोन को रिप्लेस करने के लिए एक तकनीशियन को जांच के लिए भेज रहे हैं।

complaint_text: App me error dikha raha hai baar baar jab main checkout karne ki koshish karta hoon. Mere cart items gayab ho gaye hain. Bahut frustration ho rahi hai.
translated_text_en: The app is showing an error repeatedly when I try to checkout. My cart items have disappeared. It is very frustrating.
reply: Hum is technical issue ko fix kar rahe hain. Please app update karke dubara koshish karein.

complaint_text: Wrong size shoes were sent to me for the second time. I specifically requested UK 10 but got UK 8 again. Please train your warehouse staff properly to read orders.
translated_text_en: Wrong size shoes were sent to me for the second time. I specifically requested UK 10 but got UK 8 again. Please train your warehouse staff properly to read orders.
reply: We apologize for the recurring error. We are manually verifying the next shipment before dispatch.

complaint_text: कस्टमर केयर का कोई भी व्यक्ति कॉल नहीं उठा रहा है। पिछले 2 घंटों से मैं संगीत सुन रहा हूँ। क्या कोई ज़िम्मेदार इंसान मदद कर सकता है?
translated_text_en: No one from customer care is picking up the call. I have been listening to music for the last 2 hours. Can any responsible person help?
reply: कॉल वेटिंग समय अधिक होने के लिए क्षमा करें। हमने आपके लिए कॉल-बैक शेड्यूल कर दिया है।

complaint_text: Mera KYC verify nahi ho raha hai do hafte se. Saare documents upload kar diye hain phir bhi pending dikha raha hai. Mera wallet block ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: My KYC is not getting verified for two weeks. I have uploaded all documents yet it shows pending. My wallet is blocked.
reply: Aapke documents clear nahi the. Humne link bheja hai, please high-quality photo phir se upload karein.

complaint_text: Extremely disappointed with the hidden charges applied to my invoice. This was not mentioned during the checkout process. I feel cheated by your brand.
translated_text_en: Extremely disappointed with the hidden charges applied to my invoice. This was not mentioned during the checkout process. I feel cheated by your brand.
reply: We apologize for the confusion. The additional charges are for state taxes as per recent regulations.

complaint_text: The delivery partner was very rude and used abusive language because I asked him to wait for two minutes at the gate. I do not feel safe using your service anymore.
translated_text_en: The delivery partner was very rude and used abusive language because I asked him to wait for two minutes at the gate. I do not feel safe using your service anymore.
reply: We take this very seriously. The agent has been suspended pending an internal investigation.

complaint_text: My subscription was renewed without my consent and money was deducted from my credit card. I had already cancelled the auto-renewal last month. Refund it now.
translated_text_en: My subscription was renewed without my consent and money was deducted from my credit card. I had already cancelled the auto-renewal last month. Refund it now.
reply: We have cancelled the subscription and initiated a full refund to your original payment method.

complaint_text: मुझे अभी तक कैशबैक नहीं मिला जो आपके ऑफर में बताया गया था। प्रोमो कोड लगाने के बाद भी बैलेंस उतना ही है। कृपया इसे चेक करें।
translated_text_en: I haven't received the cashback mentioned in your offer yet. Even after applying the promo code, the balance is the same. Please check this.
reply: कैशबैक ऑर्डर डिलीवर होने के 24 घंटे बाद आपके वॉलेट में जमा कर दिया जाएगा। कृपया धैर्य रखें।

complaint_text: Order status delivered dikha raha hai par mujhe kuch nahi mila. Security guard ne bhi mana kar diya hai. Paisa gaya aur samaan bhi nahi aaya.
translated_text_en: Order status is showing delivered but I haven't received anything. The security guard also denied receiving it. Money is gone and the item hasn't arrived.
reply: Hum delivery partner se contact kar rahe hain. Agar parcel nahi mila toh hum full refund denge.

complaint_text: Maine kal local kirana shop pe UPI payment kiya tha par transaction fail ho gaya. Bank account se 450 rupaye kat gaye hain lekin shopkeeper bol raha hai use nahi mile. Please mera paisa jald se jald refund karwao, ye bahut galat baat hai.
translated_text_en: I made a UPI payment at a local grocery shop yesterday but the transaction failed. 450 rupees were deducted from my bank account but the shopkeeper says he didn't receive it. Please refund my money as soon as possible, this is very wrong.
reply: We apologize for the inconvenience. The refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.

complaint_text: मैंने तीन दिन पहले एक मोबाइल कवर ऑर्डर किया था जिसकी डिलीवरी आज होनी थी। अभी तक कोई डिलीवरी पार्टनर का कॉल नहीं आया और ऐप पर स्टेटस भी नहीं बदल रहा। मुझे समझ नहीं आ रहा कि मेरा सामान कहाँ है। कृपया जल्दी सहायता करें क्योंकि मुझे इसकी बहुत ज़रूरत है।
translated_text_en: I ordered a mobile cover three days ago which was supposed to be delivered today. I haven't received any call from the delivery partner yet and the status on the app isn't changing either. I don't understand where my item is. Please help quickly as I really need it.
reply: क्षमा करें, आपके ऑर्डर में देरी हो रही है। हम इसे जल्द से जल्द पहुंचाने की कोशिश कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: I am absolutely appalled by the state of the package I received today from your Pune warehouse. The external box was completely crushed and the electronics inside are damaged beyond use. This was supposed to be a gift for my sister's wedding tomorrow. I need an immediate replacement or a full refund right now.
translated_text_en: I am absolutely appalled by the state of the package I received today from your Pune warehouse. The external box was completely crushed and the electronics inside are damaged beyond use. This was supposed to be a gift for my sister's wedding tomorrow. I need an immediate replacement or a full refund right now.
reply: We are extremely sorry for the damaged product. A replacement has been initiated on priority.

complaint_text: I have been trying to log into my account for the past three hours but it keeps saying 'Incorrect Password'. I have already reset it twice and the OTP arrives very late every time. This is extremely frustrating as I need to book a flight urgently for a family emergency. Please look into this technical glitch immediately.
translated_text_en: I have been trying to log into my account for the past three hours but it keeps saying 'Incorrect Password'. I have already reset it twice and the OTP arrives very late every time. This is extremely frustrating as I need to book a flight urgently for a family emergency. Please look into this technical glitch immediately.
reply: Our technical team is fixing the OTP delay issue. Please try again in 15 minutes.

complaint_text: मैंने नीले रंग का सूट मंगवाया था लेकिन आपने मुझे पीले रंग का और गलत साइज का भेज दिया। रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट डाली थी पर कूरियर वाला अभी तक नहीं आया लेने। आप लोग ग्राहकों को बहुत परेशान करते हो, अब मुझे पैसे वापस चाहिए। मैं दोबारा यहाँ से शॉपिंग नहीं करुँगी।
translated_text_en: I ordered a blue suit but you sent me a yellow one and the wrong size. I raised a return request but the courier person hasn't come yet to pick it up. You people trouble customers a lot, now I want my money back. I will not shop from here again.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका रिटर्न कल सुबह पिकअप कर लिया जाएगा।

complaint_text: Mera cashback promise kiya gaya tha ₹200 ka par abhi tak wallet mein show nahi kar raha. Customer care ko phone kiya toh bolte hain 24 hours wait karo lekin 3 din ho gaye. Ye toh dhokadhadi hai customers ke saath. Please isko credit kar do ya check karo kya problem hai.
translated_text_en: I was promised a cashback of ₹200 but it is still not showing in my wallet. When I called customer care, they said wait for 24 hours but it has been 3 days. This is fraud with customers. Please credit it or check what the problem is.
reply: We checked your account and the cashback will be credited within 48 hours. Thank you for your patience.

complaint_text: The milk and bread I received this morning were already expired and the bread had mold on it. This is a serious health hazard and totally unacceptable for a premium delivery service. I have small children at home and this could have been dangerous. I expect a formal apology and a refund for this negligence.
translated_text_en: The milk and bread I received this morning were already expired and the bread had mold on it. This is a serious health hazard and totally unacceptable for a premium delivery service. I have small children at home and this could have been dangerous. I expect a formal apology and a refund for this negligence.
reply: We deeply apologize for this safety lapse. A full refund has been issued and we are investigating the vendor.

complaint_text: डिलीवरी बॉय ने घर आने से मना कर दिया और कहा कि नीचे आकर सामान ले लो। मैं एक बुजुर्ग हूँ और सीढ़ियां नहीं चढ़ सकता, इसलिए तो ऑनलाइन मंगवाया था। उसका व्यवहार बहुत ही बदतमीजी भरा था। ऐसे लोगों को काम पर क्यों रखते हो आप?
translated_text_en: The delivery boy refused to come to the house and said come down and take the items. I am an elderly person and cannot climb stairs, that is why I ordered online. His behavior was very rude. Why do you hire such people?
reply: हमें यह जानकर बहुत दुख हुआ। उस डिलीवरी पार्टनर के खिलाफ सख्त कार्रवाई की जाएगी।

complaint_text: Maine premium subscription liya tha taki ads na dekhne padein par fir bhi movie ke beech mein ads aa rahe hain. My money is wasted if I still have to see advertisements. Please fix my account status immediately otherwise cancel my plan. Mere 999 rupaye waste ho gaye hain.
translated_text_en: I took a premium subscription so that I wouldn't have to watch ads but ads are still appearing in the middle of movies. My money is wasted if I still have to see advertisements. Please fix my account status immediately otherwise cancel my plan. My 999 rupees have been wasted.
reply: We have refreshed your subscription status. Please logout and login again to enjoy ad-free content.

complaint_text: Your customer service representative was extremely rude and hung up the phone while I was explaining my issue. I am a loyal customer for five years and I have never been treated this poorly. I will be closing my account and moving to a competitor if this is not addressed. This is no way to talk to people.
translated_text_en: Your customer service representative was extremely rude and hung up the phone while I was explaining my issue. I am a loyal customer for five years and I have never been treated this poorly. I will be closing my account and moving to a competitor if this is not addressed. This is no way to talk to people.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the bad experience. Our manager will call you shortly to resolve your concerns.

complaint_text: मैंने कल अपना ऑर्डर कैंसिल किया था लेकिन आपने 150 रुपये कैंसलेशन फीस काट ली। नियम के मुताबिक 24 घंटे के अंदर कोई फीस नहीं लगनी चाहिए थी। यह तो सरासर लूट है। कृपया मेरी पूरी राशि वापस करें क्योंकि यह आपकी पॉलिसी के खिलाफ है।
translated_text_en: I cancelled my order yesterday but you deducted 150 rupees as a cancellation fee. According to rules, no fee should have been charged within 24 hours. This is sheer looting. Please return my full amount as this is against your policy.
reply: पॉलिसी के अनुसार रिफंड प्रोसेस कर दिया गया है। आपके खाते में यह 2 दिन में दिखेगा।

complaint_text: Mera wallet balance bank transfer kiya tha 2 din pehle par paisa bank account mein nahi aaya. Wallet se debit dikha raha hai par bank statement mein entry nahi hai. Customer care ko lagta hai hum free baithe hain, koi dhang ka response nahi mil raha. Please settle this fast.
translated_text_en: I transferred my wallet balance to my bank 2 days ago but the money hasn't reached the bank account. It shows debited from the wallet but there is no entry in the bank statement. Customer care thinks we are free, no proper response is being given. Please settle this fast.
reply: The bank is taking longer than usual to process the credit. Please wait for 24 more hours or share the UTR.

complaint_text: There is an unauthorized transaction of ₹15,400 on my credit card from your website which I did not make. I have already blocked my card but I need you to cancel this order and refund the amount immediately. This looks like a security breach on your portal. Please provide the IP address used for this.
translated_text_en: There is an unauthorized transaction of ₹15,400 on my credit card from your website which I did not make. I have already blocked my card but I need you to cancel this order and refund the amount immediately. This looks like a security breach on your portal. Please provide the IP address used for this.
reply: We have cancelled the order and initiated a refund. Our security team is investigating the source.

complaint_text: The app keeps crashing every time I try to add items to the cart during the flash sale. I lost the opportunity to buy the laptop at 50% discount because of your technical glitches. This is so unfair to genuine buyers. Your servers are clearly not capable of handling traffic.
translated_text_en: The app keeps crashing every time I try to add items to the cart during the flash sale. I lost the opportunity to buy the laptop at 50% discount because of your technical glitches. This is so unfair to genuine buyers. Your servers are clearly not capable of handling traffic.
reply: We apologize for the technical glitch during the sale. We have shared your feedback with the tech team.

complaint_text: मुझे रिटर्न किए हुए 10 दिन हो गए हैं लेकिन अभी तक रिफंड नहीं मिला। ऐप में लिखा है कि रिफंड प्रोसेस हो गया है पर मेरे बैंक में कुछ नहीं आया। मेरा पैसा कहाँ अटका हुआ है? मुझे तुरंत जवाब चाहिए वरना मैं कंज्यूमर कोर्ट जाऊँगा।
translated_text_en: It has been 10 days since I returned the item but I haven't received the refund yet. The app says refund processed but nothing has come to my bank. Where is my money stuck? I want an immediate answer or I will go to consumer court.
reply: आपका रिफंड बैंक एंड पर अटका है। हमने बैंक को रिमाइंडर भेज दिया है।

complaint_text: Promo code DIWALI50 apply nahi ho raha hai mere order pe jabki main eligibility criteria meet karta hoon. Har baar error message aa jata hai ki 'Not applicable for this user'. Agar discount nahi dena toh jhoothe promises kyun karte ho? Mera time waste mat karo.
translated_text_en: The promo code DIWALI50 is not applying to my order even though I meet the eligibility criteria. Every time an error message says 'Not applicable for this user'. If you don't want to give a discount, why make false promises? Don't waste my time.
reply: We checked the code; it was valid for a limited number of users. Here is a personal code for you instead.

complaint_text: The delivery address was correctly updated in my profile, yet the driver went to my old address in another sector. He refused to come to the new location and marked the delivery as 'failed'. I have been waiting for this medicine for my mother all day. This is a life-critical delivery and your logistics is a mess.
translated_text_en: The delivery address was correctly updated in my profile, yet the driver went to my old address in another sector. He refused to come to the new location and marked the delivery as 'failed'. I have been waiting for this medicine for my mother all day. This is a life-critical delivery and your logistics is a mess.
reply: We are extremely sorry. We are re-routing the rider to your correct address immediately.

complaint_text: आज सुबह सब्जी आर्डर की थी और पैसे दो बार कट गए ऐप एरर की वजह से। एक पेमेंट फेल दिखा रहा था पर बैंक से मैसेज आ गया। कृपया मेरा एक्स्ट्रा पैसा वापस करें। गरीब आदमी के लिए 800 रुपये बहुत बड़ी बात होती है सर।
translated_text_en: I ordered vegetables this morning and the money was deducted twice due to an app error. One payment showed failed but I got a message from the bank. Please return my extra money. For a poor man, 800 rupees is a big deal, sir.
reply: अतिरिक्त भुगतान 3 दिनों के भीतर आपके बैंक खाते में वापस आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: I submitted a warranty claim for my blender last week and it was rejected saying 'Physical Damage'. There is not a single scratch on the machine, it just stopped working internally. Your service center at MG Road is lying to avoid free repairs. I will take this to social media if you don't honor the warranty.
translated_text_en: I submitted a warranty claim for my blender last week and it was rejected saying 'Physical Damage'. There is not a single scratch on the machine, it just stopped working internally. Your service center at MG Road is lying to avoid free repairs. I will take this to social media if you don't honor the warranty.
reply: We are re-evaluating your claim. Please share photos of the product for a second opinion.

complaint_text: Box toh receive hua par usmein sirf 3 items the jabki maine 5 order kiye the. Missing items ka bill mein toh naam hai par physical delivery nahi hui. Pura packet seal tha toh delivery boy ki galti nahi lagti, aapke warehouse se hi miss hua hai.
translated_text_en: I received the box but it only had 3 items while I ordered 5. The missing items are mentioned in the bill but physical delivery didn't happen. The whole packet was sealed so it doesn't seem to be the delivery boy's fault, it was missed from your warehouse.
reply: We are checking our CCTV footage. If found missing, we will ship the remaining items today.

complaint_text: I received my order today, but the package was empty. I paid ₹2500 for a pair of headphones and all I got was an empty box with some bubble wrap. I need an immediate investigation and my money back.
translated_text_en: I received my order today, but the package was empty. I paid ₹2500 for a pair of headphones and all I got was an empty box with some bubble wrap. I need an immediate investigation and my money back.
reply: We are sorry for this experience. We have initiated an internal investigation with the logistics partner.

complaint_text: मेरा बिजली का बिल ऐप से भरा था, पर अभी तक रसीद नहीं मिली। बैंक से पैसे कट चुके हैं लेकिन बिजली विभाग वाले बोल रहे हैं कि पेमेंट नहीं हुआ। मुझे बहुत टेंशन हो रही है क्योंकि ड्यू डेट कल ही है।
translated_text_en: I paid my electricity bill through the app, but haven't received the receipt yet. Money is deducted from the bank but the electricity department says payment is not done. I am very stressed as the due date is tomorrow.
reply: परेशान न हों, आपका पेमेंट अपडेट होने में 24 घंटे लग सकते हैं।

complaint_text: Mera ₹2000 ka UPI transaction fail ho gaya, lekin bank se paise kat gaye. Merchant keh raha hai unko paise nahi mile. Please check karke refund kariye urgent basis par.
translated_text_en: My ₹2000 UPI transaction failed, but money was deducted from the bank. The merchant says they haven't received the money. Please check and refund on an urgent basis.
reply: Don't worry, if the amount is deducted it will be refunded within 3-5 business days.

complaint_text: The laptop I bought from your portal is constantly overheating. It has only been 10 days since the purchase and it is already unusable. I want a replacement or a technician visit at the earliest.
translated_text_en: The laptop I bought from your portal is constantly overheating. It has only been 10 days since the purchase and it is already unusable. I want a replacement or a technician visit at the earliest.
reply: We have scheduled a technician visit for tomorrow between 10 AM to 2 PM.

complaint_text: मैंने एक साड़ी आर्डर की थी पर जो कलर दिखाया गया था वो बिल्कुल अलग है। ये बहुत ही घटिया क्वालिटी का कपड़ा है। मुझे ये सामान वापस करना है और पैसे वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: I ordered a saree but the color shown was completely different. This is very poor quality fabric. I want to return this item and get my money back.
reply: हमे खेद है। आप ऐप के माध्यम से रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट डाल सकते हैं।

complaint_text: Bhai mera Amazon Prime subscription cancel kiya tha par phir bhi ₹1499 cut gaye. Ye toh fraud hai bina bataye paise nikal lena. Please refund kariye mera paisa jaldi.
translated_text_en: Brother, I cancelled my Amazon Prime subscription but ₹1499 was still deducted. This is fraud to take money without informing. Please refund my money quickly.
reply: We will check your cancellation logs and process the refund if applicable.

complaint_text: The food delivered by your executive was completely spilled inside the bag. Even the taste was stale and it smelled foul. This is the third time I am facing hygiene issues with your service.
translated_text_en: The food delivered by your executive was completely spilled inside the bag. Even the taste was stale and it smelled foul. This is the third time I am facing hygiene issues with your service.
reply: We sincerely apologize. We have issued a full refund to your wallet as a gesture of goodwill.

complaint_text: मेरा ऑर्डर अभी तक 'शिप्ड' दिखा रहा है जबकि डिलीवरी की तारीख कल की थी। लखनऊ में हमारे यहाँ कोई भी कॉल रिसीव नहीं कर रहा। मुझे ये पैकेट आज ही चाहिए।
translated_text_en: My order is still showing 'Shipped' whereas the delivery date was yesterday. No one is receiving calls here in Lucknow. I need this packet today itself.
reply: देरी के लिए माफ़ी चाहते हैं। आपका आर्डर आज शाम तक पहुँच जाएगा।

complaint_text: App par login nahi ho raha hai OTP nahi aa raha phone par. Maine 5 baar try kiya par session expire dikha deta hai. Kaafi frustrating experience hai ye mere liye.
translated_text_en: Not able to login on the app, OTP is not coming on the phone. I tried 5 times but it shows session expired. This is a very frustrating experience for me.
reply: Please update your app to the latest version and try again after clearing cache.

complaint_text: I booked a flight from Kolkata to Delhi but the payment was stuck and no ticket was issued. Now the prices have increased by ₹2000 and my money is still blocked. This is purely your system's fault.
translated_text_en: I booked a flight from Kolkata to Delhi but the payment was stuck and no ticket was issued. Now the prices have increased by ₹2000 and my money is still blocked. This is purely your system's fault.
reply: We regret the failure. Your refund is processed and will reflect in 2 days.

complaint_text: मेरे क्रेडिट कार्ड पर कुछ अनजान ट्रांसेक्शन हुए हैं जो मैंने नहीं किए। मैंने कार्ड ब्लॉक करने के लिए कॉल किया पर वेटिंग टाइम बहुत ज़्यादा है। तुरंत मेरी मदद कीजिये।
translated_text_en: There are some unknown transactions on my credit card that I did not do. I called to block the card but the waiting time is very high. Help me immediately.
reply: हमने आपका कार्ड ब्लॉक कर दिया है। हम इन ट्रांसेक्शन की जांच करेंगे।

complaint_text: Grocery order mein milk aur bread missing hai, par bill poora charge kiya. Delivery partner ne kaha ki customer care se baat karo. Ab main chai kaise banau subah subah?
translated_text_en: Milk and bread are missing from the grocery order, but full bill was charged. The delivery partner said to talk to customer care. Now how do I make tea early in the morning?
reply: We have added the amount for missing items back to your account credits.

complaint_text: The AC technician arrived 4 hours late and did a very messy job. He left water leaking all over my wooden flooring which is now damaged. I expect compensation for the repair of my floor.
translated_text_en: The AC technician arrived 4 hours late and did a very messy job. He left water leaking all over my wooden flooring which is now damaged. I expect compensation for the repair of my floor.
reply: We are extremely sorry. A senior supervisor will visit you to assess the damage.

complaint_text: ऑनलाइन क्लास के लिए मैंने सब्सक्रिप्शन लिया था पर वीडियो लोड नहीं हो रहे। मेरा इंटरनेट ठीक चल रहा है पर आपकी ऐप में दिक्कत है। बच्चों की पढ़ाई का नुकसान हो रहा है।
translated_text_en: I took a subscription for online classes but videos are not loading. My internet is working fine but there is a problem in your app. Children's studies are being hampered.
reply: तकनीकी समस्या के लिए खेद है। हमारी टीम ऐप फिक्स करने पर काम कर रही है।

complaint_text: Mera refund status 'Success' dikha raha hai par bank account mein balance nahi aaya. Maine statement check kar liya hai, wahan koi entry nahi hai. Kya chal raha hai ye?
translated_text_en: My refund status shows 'Success' but balance has not come in the bank account. I have checked the statement, there is no entry there. What is going on?
reply: Refunds can take up to 7 working days to reflect in your statement. Please wait.

complaint_text: I received a used and dirty t-shirt instead of a new one. The tags were missing and it even smelled of perfume. I am shocked at how your quality check department missed this.
translated_text_en: I received a used and dirty t-shirt instead of a new one. The tags were missing and it even smelled of perfume. I am shocked at how your quality check department missed this.
reply: We apologize for this oversight. We are picking up the item today and sending a fresh one.

complaint_text: होटल की बुकिंग करते समय ₹500 का डिस्काउंट कूपन लगाया था पर फाइनल पेमेंट में वो नहीं घटा। मुझे एक्स्ट्रा पैसे देने पड़े। कृपया मेरे कूपन के पैसे वापस दें।
translated_text_en: I applied a ₹500 discount coupon while booking the hotel but it wasn't deducted in final payment. I had to pay extra. Please refund my coupon money.
reply: माफ़ी चाहते हैं। ₹500 आपके वॉलेट में वापस क्रेडिट कर दिए गए हैं।

complaint_text: Someone is trying to access my account from a different location. I received multiple login notifications from Russia. I need to secure my account immediately before any theft happens.
translated_text_en: Someone is trying to access my account from a different location. I received multiple login notifications from Russia. I need to secure my account immediately before any theft happens.
reply: Your account has been temporarily frozen for security. Please reset your password.

complaint_text: Airtel fiber ka connection subah se down hai. Customer care bol rahe hain ki wire cut gaya hai par koi repair karne nahi aaya. Work from home mein bahut dikkat ho rahi hai.
translated_text_en: Airtel fiber connection is down since morning. Customer care says wire is cut but no one came to repair. Facing a lot of trouble in work from home.
reply: Our field engineers are on-site and the issue will be resolved by 6 PM today.

complaint_text: The washing machine I ordered has a large dent on the side and the drum is making a loud noise. I want a refund instead of a replacement as I no longer trust this brand.
translated_text_en: The washing machine I ordered has a large dent on the side and the drum is making a loud noise. I want a refund instead of a replacement as I no longer trust this brand.
reply: We understand. Your return and full refund request has been approved.

complaint_text: I have been waiting for my laptop delivery for over five days now, despite paying for express shipping. The tracking page shows it is stuck at the warehouse in Nelamangala. Please resolve this immediately as my work is getting hampered.
translated_text_en: I have been waiting for my laptop delivery for over five days now, despite paying for express shipping. The tracking page shows it is stuck at the warehouse in Nelamangala. Please resolve this immediately as my work is getting hampered.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the delay. We have escalated this to our logistics head for priority delivery.

complaint_text: Yaar maine 500 ka recharge kiya tha PhonePe se par abhi tak balance nahi aaya. Bank account se paise deduct ho gaye hain but app pe transaction fail dikha raha hai. Support team bilkul help nahi kar rahi hai, bahut gussa aa raha hai.
translated_text_en: Friend, I did a 500 rupee recharge via PhonePe but the balance hasn't arrived yet. Money has been deducted from the bank account but it shows transaction failed on the app. Support team is not helping at all, I am very angry.
reply: We are sorry. Your transaction is in a pending state and will be cleared or refunded within 48 hours.

complaint_text: नमस्ते, मैंने पिछले हफ्ते एक सूट मंगवाया था लेकिन मुझे गलत साइज भेज दिया गया है। रिटर्न रिक्वेस्ट डालने के बाद भी कोई पिकअप के लिए नहीं आया। कृपया जल्दी से इसे वापस लेकर मेरे पैसे लौटा दें क्योंकि मुझे शादी में जाना है।
translated_text_en: Hello, I ordered a suit last week but the wrong size was sent to me. Even after placing a return request, no one came for pickup. Please take it back quickly and return my money because I have to go to a wedding.
reply: असुविधा के लिए क्षमा करें। हमने आपके क्षेत्र के लिए पिकअप दोबारा शेड्यूल कर दिया है, कल एजेंट आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: My recent refund for order ORD-4451 has not been credited to my bank account yet. It has been over 10 working days since the item was picked up by your executive. Every time I call, the agent tells me to wait another 48 hours which is unacceptable.
translated_text_en: My recent refund for order ORD-4451 has not been credited to my bank account yet. It has been over 10 working days since the item was picked up by your executive. Every time I call, the agent tells me to wait another 48 hours which is unacceptable.
reply: We are looking into the delay with your bank. The refund should reflect in your account by tomorrow evening.

complaint_text: जो जूते मैंने खरीदे थे उनका सोल पहले ही दिन निकल गया। यह बिल्कुल घटिया क्वालिटी का सामान है और मुझे यकीन नहीं हो रहा कि आपने ऐसा उत्पाद भेजा। मैंने इतने पैसे खर्च किए और मुझे ऐसा कबाड़ मिला। मुझे नया पीस चाहिए या पूरा रिफंड।
translated_text_en: The sole of the shoes I bought came off on the very first day. This is absolutely low-quality stuff and I can't believe you sent such a product. I spent so much money and I got such junk. I want a new piece or a full refund.
reply: हमें बहुत दुख है कि आपको ऐसा अनुभव हुआ। कृपया उत्पाद की तस्वीर साझा करें ताकि हम रिप्लेसमेंट भेज सकें।

complaint_text: Delivery boy ne mera order kisi aur ko de diya hai shayad. App pe delivered dikha raha hai but mere ghar pe koi nahi aaya. Call kiya to delivery boy phone nahi utha raha hai aur switch off kar diya. Mere paise wapas chahiye mujhe abhi.
translated_text_en: The delivery boy has probably given my order to someone else. It shows delivered on the app but no one came to my house. When I called, the delivery boy didn't pick up and then switched it off. I want my money back now.
reply: We apologize for the confusion. We are checking the GPS location of the rider and will refund you if the delivery failed.

complaint_text: I am trying to cancel my premium membership for the last three days but the cancel button is not working on the portal. I have already been charged for this month without my consent. This is a very unethical practice to retain customers. Please refund the amount.
translated_text_en: I am trying to cancel my premium membership for the last three days but the cancel button is not working on the portal. I have already been charged for this month without my consent. This is a very unethical practice to retain customers. Please refund the amount.
reply: We regret the technical glitch. Your subscription has been cancelled and the refund process has been initiated.

complaint_text: Gpay pe payment successful dikha raha hai but merchant bol raha hai paise nahi mile. Mere account se 5000 cut gaye hain aur mera bill pay nahi hua. Dusri baar try kiya to phir se fail ho gaya. Help kijiye fast please urgent hai.
translated_text_en: Payment is showing successful on Gpay but the merchant says he didn't receive the money. 5000 have been deducted from my account and my bill isn't paid. When I tried a second time, it failed again. Please help quickly, it's urgent.
reply: Don't worry, if the merchant hasn't received it, the money will be auto-credited to your bank within 5-7 business days.

complaint_text: मेरा नया एयर कंडीशनर कल इंस्टॉल होना था लेकिन अभी तक कोई टेक्नीशियन नहीं आया। इंदौर की इस गर्मी में बिना AC के रहना मुश्किल हो रहा है। आप लोग कॉल भी नहीं उठा रहे हैं। बहुत ही खराब सर्विस है आपकी।
translated_text_en: My new air conditioner was supposed to be installed yesterday but no technician has arrived yet. It is difficult to live without AC in this Indore heat. You people are not even picking up the calls. Your service is very poor.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफी चाहते हैं। हमने टेक्नीशियन को तुरंत आपके पते पर भेज दिया है, वे 1 घंटे में पहुँच जाएंगे।

complaint_text: I received the medicine parcel today but half of the strips are missing from the box. I paid for 10 strips of heart medication but only 5 were inside. This is a critical life-saving medicine, how can you be so careless? I need the remaining strips delivered by tonight.
translated_text_en: I received the medicine parcel today but half of the strips are missing from the box. I paid for 10 strips of heart medication but only 5 were inside. This is a critical life-saving medicine, how can you be so careless? I need the remaining strips delivered by tonight.
reply: This is a serious oversight. We are dispatching the missing strips via express delivery right now at no extra cost.

complaint_text: App login hi nahi ho raha hai, baar baar network error aa raha hai. Mera internet perfectly kaam kar raha hai baaki apps pe but aapka app screen freeze ho jati hai. Order track karna hai mujhe par login nahi ho raha. Please fix this bug immediately.
translated_text_en: The app is not logging in at all, it's showing network error repeatedly. My internet is working perfectly on other apps but your app screen freezes. I need to track my order but can't login. Please fix this bug immediately.
reply: We are aware of a temporary server issue in your region. Please clear your app cache or try again in 15 minutes.

complaint_text: मैंने शॉपिंग कार्ट में कूपन कोड 'WELCOME50' लगाया था लेकिन बिल में कोई डिस्काउंट नहीं मिला। पेमेंट पेज पर एरर आ गया और अब कूपन एक्सपायर्ड दिखा रहा है। मुझे मेरा जायज डिस्काउंट चाहिए वरना मैं ऑर्डर कैंसिल कर दूँगी।
translated_text_en: I applied the coupon code 'WELCOME50' in the shopping cart but did not get any discount in the bill. An error occurred on the payment page and now the coupon is showing as expired. I want my legitimate discount or I will cancel the order.
reply: तकनीकी समस्या के लिए हमें खेद है। हमने आपके खाते में उसी मूल्य के रिवॉर्ड पॉइंट क्रेडिट कर दिए हैं।

complaint_text: I received a suspicious call from someone claiming to be your customer executive asking for my OTP to process a refund. This is a major security concern for your platform. Please look into how my data was leaked to these scammers. I am very worried about my account safety.
translated_text_en: I received a suspicious call from someone claiming to be your customer executive asking for my OTP to process a refund. This is a major security concern for your platform. Please look into how my data was leaked to these scammers. I am very worried about my account safety.
reply: We take security very seriously. Please do not share OTPs; we are investigating this breach with our security team.

complaint_text: मेरे दोस्त ने मुझे 1000 रुपये का गिफ्ट कार्ड भेजा था लेकिन वो काम नहीं कर रहा है। 'Invalid Code' का मैसेज आता है हर बार। मैंने कस्टमर केयर को ईमेल भी किया पर कोई जवाब नहीं मिला। मेरे पैसे बर्बाद हो गए।
translated_text_en: My friend sent me a gift card for 1000 rupees but it's not working. An 'Invalid Code' message comes every time. I even emailed customer care but got no response. My money is wasted.
reply: कृपया अपना गिफ्ट कार्ड कोड हमें मैसेज करें। हम इसे मैन्युअली चेक करके एक्टिवेट कर देंगे।

complaint_text: Delivery boy ka behavior bahut hi badtameezi wala tha aaj. Usne gate pe parcel fek diya aur mujhse behes karne laga jab maine check karne ko bola. Aise logon ko kaam pe kyun rakhte ho aap log? I want strict action against him.
translated_text_en: The delivery boy's behavior was very rude today. He threw the parcel at the gate and started arguing with me when I asked to check it. Why do you people keep such people for work? I want strict action against him.
reply: We are extremely sorry for this incident. We have raised a formal complaint against the delivery partner for investigation.

complaint_text: The Fossil watch I received today is definitely not an original product. The finish is very poor and it doesn't even have the warranty card inside the box. I am a regular customer and I did not expect a counterfeit product from your store. I want a refund.
translated_text_en: The Fossil watch I received today is definitely not an original product. The finish is very poor and it doesn't even have the warranty card inside the box. I am a regular customer and I did not expect a counterfeit product from your store. I want a refund.
reply: We apologize. We have a zero-tolerance policy for fakes. We will pick up the item and issue a full refund after verification.

complaint_text: आज सुबह ग्रोसरी की डिलीवरी मिली लेकिन उसमें आधा सामान गायब था। बिल में दूध और ब्रेड लिखा है पर बैग में वो नहीं थे। पैसे तो आपने पूरे काट लिए पर सामान पूरा नहीं भेजा। ये तो सरासर धोखाधड़ी है ग्राहकों के साथ।
translated_text_en: Got grocery delivery this morning but half the items were missing. Milk and bread are written in the bill but they weren't in the bag. You deducted full money but didn't send full items. This is sheer fraud with customers.
reply: असुविधा के लिए हमें बहुत खेद है। छूटे हुए सामान की राशि आपके वॉलेट में वापस कर दी गई है।

complaint_text: Maine blue color ki shirt order ki thi but mujhe bright pink bhej di gayi hai. Return window abhi bhi close dikha raha hai system mein jabki mujhe aaj hi mili hai. Please meri request accept kijiye, mujhe ye shirt nahi chahiye.
translated_text_en: I ordered a blue color shirt but a bright pink one has been sent to me. The return window is still showing closed in the system even though I received it today. Please accept my request, I don't want this shirt.
reply: Sorry for the wrong item. We have manually opened the return window for you; please schedule the pickup now.

complaint_text: My internet connection has been down for the last 48 hours in Sector 62. I am working from home and this is causing a massive loss in productivity. Your technician promised to visit today morning but no one has shown up yet. Please fix this on priority.
translated_text_en: My internet connection has been down for the last 48 hours in Sector 62. I am working from home and this is causing a massive loss in productivity. Your technician promised to visit today morning but no one has shown up yet. Please fix this on priority.
reply: There is a fiber cut in your area. Our engineers are working on it and services will be restored by 6 PM today.

complaint_text: I checked my monthly credit card statement and there is a mysterious charge of 2500 INR from your platform. I have not made any such purchase in the last month nor did I receive any OTP. This seems like an unauthorized transaction and I need an explanation immediately.
translated_text_en: I checked my monthly credit card statement and there is a mysterious charge of 2500 INR from your platform. I have not made any such purchase in the last month nor did I receive any OTP. This seems like an unauthorized transaction and I need an explanation immediately.
reply: We have flagged this transaction. Our fraud department will contact you within 24 hours to verify the details.

complaint_text: I ordered a laptop from your site but received a box of soaps. This is unacceptable and I demand an immediate refund. I've been calling customer care for hours with no response.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop from your site but received a box of soaps. This is unacceptable and I demand an immediate refund. I've been calling customer care for hours with no response.
reply: We apologize for this experience. We have initiated a refund and are investigating the logistics partner.

complaint_text: The delivery executive was very rude and refused to come to the third floor. He threatened to cancel the order if I didn't come down. I am a senior citizen and this behavior is shocking.
translated_text_en: The delivery executive was very rude and refused to come to the third floor. He threatened to cancel the order if I didn't come down. I am a senior citizen and this behavior is shocking.
reply: We are sorry to hear about this. We have raised a formal complaint against the delivery partner.

complaint_text: मैंने ₹५००० का यूपीआई पेमेंट किया था पर ट्रांजेक्शन फेल हो गया। पैसे मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से कट चुके हैं लेकिन आपके ऐप में अभी भी पेंडिंग दिखा रहा है। कृपया जल्द से जल्द मेरा पैसा वापस करें।
translated_text_en: I made a UPI payment of ₹5000 but the transaction failed. The money has been deducted from my bank account but it is still showing pending in your app. Please refund my money as soon as possible.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। आपका रिफंड 3-5 कार्य दिवसों में मिल जाएगा।

complaint_text: Bhai mera order abhi tak deliver nahi hua hai, teen din ho gaye. Status check karo toh 'Out for delivery' dikhata hai subah se. Please help kijiye urgent hai ghar mein function hai.
translated_text_en: Brother, my order hasn't been delivered yet, it's been three days. When I check the status, it shows 'Out for delivery' since morning. Please help, it's urgent as there is a function at home.
reply: Ham maafi chahte hain. Aapka order aaj shaam tak deliver ho jayega.

complaint_text: मैंने जो साड़ी मंगवाई थी उसका रंग बिल्कुल अलग है। वेबसाइट पर वो लाल दिख रही थी पर मुझे काले रंग की साड़ी मिली है। ये बहुत बड़ी धोखाधड़ी है और मैं इसे वापस करना चाहती हूँ।
translated_text_en: The saree I ordered is of a completely different color. It looked red on the website but I received a black one. This is a big fraud and I want to return it.
reply: क्षमा करें, हमने आपकी वापसी की प्रक्रिया शुरू कर दी है। एजेंट कल साड़ी लेने आएगा।

complaint_text: The app keeps crashing whenever I try to apply the discount coupon. I have tried clearing the cache and reinstalling but nothing works. Please fix this bug immediately as the sale ends tonight.
translated_text_en: The app keeps crashing whenever I try to apply the discount coupon. I have tried clearing the cache and reinstalling but nothing works. Please fix this bug immediately as the sale ends tonight.
reply: We are working on a fix for this technical glitch. Please try using our website in the meantime.

complaint_text: Customer support pe koi call utha nahi raha hai 30 mins se. Mera refund kab aayega uska koi update nahi mila. Bohot hi bekar service hai aap logo ki.
translated_text_en: No one is picking up the call at customer support for 30 mins. I haven't received any update on when my refund will come. Your service is very bad.
reply: Hum maafi chahte hain. Aapka refund process ho chuka hai aur 2 din mein aa jayega.

complaint_text: क्या मुझे बता सकते हैं कि मेरा पार्सल कहाँ है? ट्रैकिंग लिंक काम नहीं कर रहा है। मुझे डर है कि कहीं मेरा पार्सल खो तो नहीं गया।
translated_text_en: Can you tell me where my parcel is? The tracking link is not working. I am afraid my parcel might be lost.
reply: चिंता न करें, आपका पार्सल रास्ते में है। नया ट्रैकिंग लिंक आपको एसएमएस कर दिया गया है।

complaint_text: I received a damaged smartphone screen today. The box was already tampered with when the courier handed it over. I want a replacement or my full money back within 24 hours.
translated_text_en: I received a damaged smartphone screen today. The box was already tampered with when the courier handed it over. I want a replacement or my full money back within 24 hours.
reply: We are sorry for the damage. A replacement order has been created and will reach you soon.

complaint_text: Mera payment double cut gaya hai ek hi order ke liye. Bank message mein do baar 1200 debit dikha raha hai. Please ek amount refund kar dijiye jaldi se.
translated_text_en: My payment has been deducted twice for the same order. The bank message shows 1200 debited twice. Please refund one amount quickly.
reply: Don't worry, extra amount 48 hours mein aapke account mein waapas aa jayega.

complaint_text: The quality of the shoes is very poor, the sole came off within two days of use. I didn't expect such low-quality products from a reputed brand like yours. I need a solution right now.
translated_text_en: The quality of the shoes is very poor, the sole came off within two days of use. I didn't expect such low-quality products from a reputed brand like yours. I need a solution right now.
reply: We regret the inconvenience. Please initiate a return through the app for a full refund.

complaint_text: मोबाइल रिचार्ज के पैसे कट गए पर टॉकटाइम नहीं मिला। कस्टमर केयर वाले बोल रहे हैं कि ऑपरेटर से बात करो। ये आपकी जिम्मेदारी है कि रिचार्ज सफल हो।
translated_text_en: Money was deducted for mobile recharge but I didn't get talktime. Customer care is saying talk to the operator. It is your responsibility that the recharge is successful.
reply: असुविधा के लिए माफ़ी। हम ऑपरेटर के साथ इसकी जाँच कर रहे हैं और जल्द ही अपडेट देंगे।

complaint_text: Size issue hai shirt mein, XL mangwaya tha par M bhej diya aapne. Return request baar baar reject ho rahi hai 'quality check failed' bolke. Maine toh pehna bhi nahi hai.
translated_text_en: There is a size issue with the shirt, I ordered XL but you sent M. The return request is being rejected repeatedly saying 'quality check failed'. I haven't even worn it.
reply: Humne aapki request manually approve kar di hai. Pickup kal ho jayega.

complaint_text: There is a recurring charge on my credit card for a subscription I never authorized. This is fraudulent activity and I will report this to the cyber cell if not resolved. Stop these charges immediately.
translated_text_en: There is a recurring charge on my credit card for a subscription I never authorized. This is fraudulent activity and I will report this to the cyber cell if not resolved. Stop these charges immediately.
reply: We have cancelled the subscription and initiated a refund for the unauthorized charges.

complaint_text: मेरे घर के पास वाला कूरियर वाला हमेशा पैकेट बाहर फेंक कर चला जाता है। आज बारिश में मेरा सामान भीग गया और खराब हो गया। इसकी भरपाई कौन करेगा?
translated_text_en: The courier guy near my house always throws the packet outside and leaves. Today my stuff got wet and ruined in the rain. Who will compensate for this?
reply: हमें यह जानकर दुख हुआ। हम कूरियर पार्टनर के खिलाफ कार्रवाई करेंगे और आपको नया सामान भेजेंगे।

complaint_text: Grocery order mein 4 items missing hain lekin bill pura liya gaya. Delivery boy bola ki store se hi nahi aaya. Mere paise refund karo ya items bhejo.
translated_text_en: 4 items are missing in the grocery order but full bill was charged. The delivery boy said it didn't come from the store. Refund my money or send the items.
reply: Missing items ka refund initiate kar diya gaya hai. Agle 24 hours mein credit ho jayega.

complaint_text: The gift wrapping I paid extra for was torn and looked very messy. This was a birthday present for my sister and the presentation was ruined. I am extremely unhappy with this service.
translated_text_en: The gift wrapping I paid extra for was torn and looked very messy. This was a birthday present for my sister and the presentation was ruined. I am extremely unhappy with this service.
reply: We are deeply sorry for ruining the surprise. We have refunded the gift wrapping charges as a gesture.

complaint_text: क्या आप मेरा पता बदल सकते हैं? गलती से पुराना ऑफिस का एड्रेस डल गया है। ऑर्डर अभी शिप नहीं हुआ है तो कृपया इसे अपडेट कर दें।
translated_text_en: Can you change my address? By mistake, the old office address has been entered. The order has not been shipped yet, so please update it.
reply: जी हाँ, हमने आपका पता अपडेट कर दिया है। अब यह सही पते पर डिलीवर होगा।

complaint_text: Internet bill pay kiya tha par abhi tak update nahi hua. Connection cut gaya hai aur office ka kaam ruka hua hai. Please verify karke line restore karwao.
translated_text_en: Paid the internet bill but it hasn't been updated yet. The connection is cut and office work is stuck. Please verify and get the line restored.
reply: Verify ho gaya hai. Aapka connection 30 minutes mein chalu ho jayega.

complaint_text: I received an expired bottle of health supplements. The expiry date was last month. Selling expired medical products is illegal and dangerous. I need a replacement immediately.
translated_text_en: I received an expired bottle of health supplements. The expiry date was last month. Selling expired medical products is illegal and dangerous. I need a replacement immediately.
reply: We take this very seriously. A fresh replacement is being dispatched today via express delivery.

complaint_text: I am extremely disappointed with the late delivery of my microwave. It was supposed to arrive three days ago but I have received no updates yet. This is affecting my kitchen work significantly and I want a status update right now.
translated_text_en: I am extremely disappointed with the late delivery of my microwave. It was supposed to arrive three days ago but I have received no updates yet. This is affecting my kitchen work significantly and I want a status update right now.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the delay, we are tracking your shipment.

complaint_text: मैंने कल शाम को यूपीआई से पेमेंट किया था लेकिन पैसे कट गए और ऑर्डर सक्सेसफुल नहीं हुआ। मेरे बैंक से मैसेज आ गया है पर आपके एप पर पेंडिंग दिखा रहा है। कृपया जल्द से जल्द मेरे 500 रुपये वापस करें।
translated_text_en: I made a payment via UPI yesterday evening but the money was deducted and the order was not successful. I received a message from my bank but your app shows it as pending. Please refund my 500 rupees as soon as possible.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है, आपका रिफंड 24 घंटों में प्रोसेस हो जाएगा।

complaint_text: Sir, mera parcel galat deliver ho gaya hai kisi aur ko. Delivery boy ne call bhi nahi kiya aur status delivered dikha raha hai. Please check karke bataye mera saman kahan hai because it was expensive.
translated_text_en: Sir, my parcel has been wrongly delivered to someone else. The delivery boy didn't even call and the status shows delivered. Please check and tell me where my items are because it was expensive.
reply: We are investigating the delivery status with the courier partner.

complaint_text: The shoes I received are of the wrong size and the quality is very poor compared to the pictures. I have been trying to initiate a return on the app but it keeps showing an error. Please help me return this and get my money back.
translated_text_en: The shoes I received are of the wrong size and the quality is very poor compared to the pictures. I have been trying to initiate a return on the app but it keeps showing an error. Please help me return this and get my money back.
reply: We have initiated the return request manually for you.

complaint_text: खाने का पैकेट जो आज डिलीवर हुआ है वह पूरी तरह से खुला हुआ था और खाना ठंडा था। जोमैटो पर ऐसी सर्विस की उम्मीद नहीं थी। मैं यह खाना नहीं खा सकता और मुझे पूरा रिफंड चाहिए।
translated_text_en: The food packet delivered today was completely open and the food was cold. This kind of service was not expected from Zomato. I cannot eat this food and I want a full refund.
reply: हमें इस अनुभव के लिए बहुत दुख है, हम तुरंत रिफंड प्रोसेस कर रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Mera account login nahi ho raha hai aur OTP bhi nahi aa raha. Maine char baar try kiya par har baar technical error dikha raha hai. Urgent help chahiye kyunki mujhe flight ticket book karni hai.
translated_text_en: My account is not logging in and I am not receiving the OTP. I tried four times but every time it shows a technical error. Need urgent help because I have to book a flight ticket.
reply: Our technical team is looking into the OTP gateway issue.

complaint_text: I ordered a silk saree for a wedding and it arrived with a huge stain on the border. This is completely unacceptable for a premium product. I need a replacement sent via express delivery before Friday.
translated_text_en: I ordered a silk saree for a wedding and it arrived with a huge stain on the border. This is completely unacceptable for a premium product. I need a replacement sent via express delivery before Friday.
