reply: We are extremely sorry; an express replacement has been scheduled.

complaint_text: मैंने पिछली बार प्रोमो कोड 'SAVE50' इस्तेमाल किया था पर डिस्काउंट नहीं मिला। बिल में पूरा अमाउंट चार्ज किया गया है। कस्टमर केयर वाले कॉल भी नहीं उठा रहे हैं। यह सरासर धोखा है।
translated_text_en: I used the promo code 'SAVE50' last time but did not get the discount. The full amount has been charged in the bill. Customer care is not even picking up calls. This is sheer cheating.
reply: चेक करने पर पता चला है कि कोड एक्सपायर हो गया था, हम आपको कूपन दे रहे हैं।

complaint_text: Delivery partner ka behavior bahut rude tha aur wo ghar ke andar aane ki koshish kar raha tha. Please uske khilaf action lijiye, main safe feel nahi kar rahi. Aise logo ko kaam par nahi rakhna chahiye.
translated_text_en: The delivery partner's behavior was very rude and he was trying to enter the house. Please take action against him, I am not feeling safe. Such people should not be employed.
reply: We take safety seriously; we have suspended the agent for investigation.

complaint_text: The laptop I purchased last week is making a strange buzzing sound and overheating within ten minutes. I believe I have received a defective unit. Please arrange a technician visit or a replacement as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: The laptop I purchased last week is making a strange buzzing sound and overheating within ten minutes. I believe I have received a defective unit. Please arrange a technician visit or a replacement as soon as possible.
reply: A technician has been assigned to visit your location tomorrow.

complaint_text: मेरा गैस सिलेंडर बुक हुए 5 दिन हो गए हैं लेकिन अभी तक डिलीवरी नहीं हुई। हर बार कॉल करने पर कहते हैं कि कल आएगा। घर में खाना बनाने में बहुत दिक्कत हो रही है।
translated_text_en: It has been 5 days since I booked my gas cylinder but the delivery has not happened yet. Every time I call, they say it will come tomorrow. It is very difficult to cook at home.
reply: देरी के लिए माफ़ी, आपका सिलेंडर आज शाम तक पहुँच जाएगा।

complaint_text: Customer care ka number humesha busy rehta hai aur chat bot koi sahi jawab nahi deta. Mera refund 10 din se pending hai aur koi update nahi mil raha. Main social media par complain karungi.
translated_text_en: The customer care number is always busy and the chat bot gives no proper answer. My refund has been pending for 10 days and I am getting no update. I will complain on social media.
reply: We are sorry for the frustration. Your refund has been pushed today.

complaint_text: I am being charged a monthly subscription fee for a service I already cancelled two months ago. This is unauthorized billing and I want a total refund of 1998 rupees. Please fix this immediately or I will contact my bank.
translated_text_en: I am being charged a monthly subscription fee for a service I already cancelled two months ago. This is unauthorized billing and I want a total refund of 1998 rupees. Please fix this immediately or I will contact my bank.
reply: We have cancelled the subscription and initiated the refund.

complaint_text: सब्जियां जो आज मिली हैं वो सड़ी हुई हैं और उनमें से बदबू आ रही है। क्या आप लोग क्वालिटी चेक नहीं करते? मुझे यह कूड़ा नहीं चाहिए, मेरा पैसा वापस करो।
translated_text_en: The vegetables received today are rotten and smelling. Do you guys not do a quality check? I don't want this trash, give me my money back.
reply: हमें खेद है, सड़ी हुई सब्जियों के लिए रिफंड क्रेडिट कर दिया गया है।

complaint_text: Amazon se ek phone mangwaya tha par box ke andar sirf sabun ki tikki nikli. Main bahut shock mein hoon aur delivery boy ne sign bhi le liya jaldi mein. Please meri help kijiye, ye meri mehnat ki kamai hai.
translated_text_en: Ordered a phone from Amazon but only a soap bar was inside the box. I am in shock and the delivery boy took the signature in a hurry. Please help me, this is my hard-earned money.
reply: This is a serious matter; we are investigating the warehouse footage.

complaint_text: The air conditioner installation was promised within 24 hours of delivery, but it has been three days. The heat is unbearable here and the unit is just sitting in my living room. Please send an engineer today.
translated_text_en: The air conditioner installation was promised within 24 hours of delivery, but it has been three days. The heat is unbearable here and the unit is just sitting in my living room. Please send an engineer today.
reply: We apologize for the delay; an engineer is scheduled for 4 PM today.

complaint_text: मेरे बिल में दो बार 'कन्वीनिएंस फीस' जोड़ी गई है जबकि मैंने सिर्फ एक टिकट बुक किया था। यह आप लोगों की वेबसाइट की गलती है। अतिरिक्त पैसे वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: Convenience fee has been added twice to my bill even though I booked only one ticket. This is a mistake of your website. I want the extra money back.
reply: तकनीकी त्रुटि के कारण ऐसा हुआ, अतिरिक्त शुल्क वापस कर दिया गया है।

complaint_text: Maine ek dress order ki thi XL size par aapne S size bhej diya. Ab exchange karne jao toh bol raha hai ki item out of stock hai. Ye toh bahut galat baat hai, mujhe wahi dress chahiye.
translated_text_en: I ordered a dress in XL size but you sent S size. Now when I go to exchange it, it says the item is out of stock. This is very wrong, I want that same dress.
reply: We are checking other warehouses for the XL size for you.

complaint_text: The warranty on my washing machine was supposed to be 2 years but the technician says it expired in 1 year. I have the original invoice clearly stating the 2-year period. Please update your records and provide free service.
translated_text_en: The warranty on my washing machine was supposed to be 2 years but the technician says it expired in 1 year. I have the original invoice clearly stating the 2-year period. Please update your records and provide free service.
reply: We have updated the warranty status based on your invoice copy.

complaint_text: I have been waiting for my refund for over 15 days now. Every time I call your support, they give me a new reference number but no money. I am going to file a complaint in the consumer court if this is not resolved today.
translated_text_en: I have been waiting for my refund for over 15 days now. Every time I call your support, they give me a new reference number but no money. I am going to file a complaint in the consumer court if this is not resolved today.
reply: Your refund has been manually processed and should reflect in 2 hours.

complaint_text: I ordered a high-end gaming laptop but the package delivered today has a completely shattered screen. I have been trying to reach the support executive for the last three hours with no luck. This is absolutely unacceptable for a 54k purchase.
translated_text_en: I ordered a high-end gaming laptop but the package delivered today has a completely shattered screen. I have been trying to reach the support executive for the last three hours with no luck. This is absolutely unacceptable for a 54k purchase.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the damage. Our technician will visit for an inspection within 24 hours.

complaint_text: मेरा पैसा यूपीआई से कट गया है लेकिन मर्चेंट को नहीं मिला। दिल्ली के एक दुकान पर पेमेंट की थी और अब मेरा ५००० रुपया फंस गया है। कृपया जल्द से जल्द रिफंड करें वरना मैं बैंक में शिकायत करूँगा।
translated_text_en: My money was deducted via UPI but the merchant did not receive it. I made a payment at a shop in Delhi and now my 5000 rupees is stuck. Please refund as soon as possible or I will complain to the bank.
reply: हमें खेद है, आपका रिफंड बैंक प्रोसेसिंग के बाद ४८ घंटों में वापस आ जाएगा।

complaint_text: Mera order abhi tak deliver nahi hua, jabki app par status 'out for delivery' dikha raha hai. Mumbai baarish ki wajah se delay samajh aata hai par koi call bhi nahi utha raha. Please tell me where my food is as I am waiting since 2 hours!
translated_text_en: My order hasn't been delivered yet, even though the app shows the status as 'out for delivery'. I understand the delay due to Mumbai rains, but no one is even picking up the call. Please tell me where my food is as I have been waiting for 2 hours!
reply: We are checking with the delivery partner immediately. Please stay online for 2 minutes.

complaint_text: The biryani I ordered from a premium restaurant was completely stale and smelled bad. My family members have developed stomach issues after eating just a few spoons. I want a full refund and compensation for medical expenses.
translated_text_en: The biryani I ordered from a premium restaurant was completely stale and smelled bad. My family members have developed stomach issues after eating just a few spoons. I want a full refund and compensation for medical expenses.
reply: We are extremely sorry for this experience. We have initiated a full refund and are investigating the restaurant.

complaint_text: मैने तीन दिन पहले गैस सिलेंडर बुक किया था लेकिन अभी तक कोई अपडेट नहीं है। लखनऊ की गर्मी में बिना गैस के खाना बनाना मुश्किल हो रहा है। एजेंसी वाले फ़ोन नहीं उठा रहे हैं, कृपया मदद करें।
translated_text_en: I booked a gas cylinder three days ago but there is no update yet. It is difficult to cook without gas in the Lucknow heat. The agency people are not picking up the phone, please help.
reply: असुविधा के लिए खेद है। हमने आपकी एजेंसी को रिमाइंडर भेज दिया है, आज शाम तक डिलीवरी हो जाएगी।

complaint_text: Maine product return kar diya tha 10 din pehle par refund abhi tak nahi aaya. Pune warehouse se confirmation mail bhi aa gaya tha but bank account me paise nahi dikh rahe. Customer care bar bar wahi purani baat bol raha hai.
translated_text_en: I returned the product 10 days ago but the refund hasn't arrived yet. I received a confirmation mail from the Pune warehouse but the money isn't showing in my bank account. Customer care keeps repeating the same old thing.
reply: We have checked the transaction status. It has been processed from our end and should reflect in your bank by Monday.

complaint_text: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor. He started shouting when I asked him to use the lift. This kind of behavior is not expected from a professional service provider in Chennai.
translated_text_en: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor. He started shouting when I asked him to use the lift. This kind of behavior is not expected from a professional service provider in Chennai.
reply: We apologize for the behavior of our partner. We are taking strict action against the individual involved.

complaint_text: जयपुर स्टोर से जो बादाम मंगाए थे उनमें कीड़े निकले हैं। पैकेट की सील बंद थी फिर भी ऐसी ख़राब क्वालिटी कैसे हो सकती है? मुझे अपने पैसे वापस चाहिए और उस वेंडर के खिलाफ एक्शन लो।
translated_text_en: The almonds I ordered from the Jaipur store had insects in them. The packet seal was intact, so how can the quality be so bad? I want my money back and take action against that vendor.
reply: यह सुनकर हमें बहुत दुःख हुआ। हम तुरंत आपका रिफंड जारी कर रहे हैं और क्वालिटी टीम इस बैच की जाँच करेगी।

complaint_text: Gurgaon me aaj subah meri cab driver ne beech raste me drop kar diya kyunki rasta block tha. Usne poore paise liye aur rude behave kiya. My office meeting was delayed because of this nonsense behavior.
translated_text_en: This morning in Gurgaon, my cab driver dropped me off midway because the road was blocked. He took the full fare and behaved rudely. My office meeting was delayed because of this nonsense behavior.
reply: We regret the inconvenience caused. The extra fare has been credited back to your wallet and the driver has been warned.

complaint_text: My savings account has been frozen without any prior notice or explanation. I am currently in Kolkata and unable to withdraw cash for an emergency hospital payment. This is a matter of life and death, please resolve it immediately.
translated_text_en: My savings account has been frozen without any prior notice or explanation. I am currently in Kolkata and unable to withdraw cash for an emergency hospital payment. This is a matter of life and death, please resolve it immediately.
reply: We understand the urgency. Please provide your KYC details on the secure link we just sent to unfreeze the account.

complaint_text: मैने अपना मोबाइल रिचार्ज किया १९९ रुपये का लेकिन टॉकटाइम और डाटा नहीं मिला। पटना सर्कल में नेटवर्क तो आ रहा है पर बैलेंस जीरो दिखा रहा है। मेरे पैसे कट गए हैं मैसेज भी आ गया है।
translated_text_en: I recharged my mobile for 199 rupees but did not get talktime or data. There is network in Patna circle but the balance shows zero. My money has been deducted and I have received the message too.
reply: रिचार्ज सफल हो गया है, कृपया अपना फोन रीस्टार्ट करें। यदि समस्या बनी रहती है तो हमें बताएं।

complaint_text: Ahmedabad branch se jo grocery aayi hai usme 5 items missing hain. Delivery boy ne bola ki shop pe stock nahi tha par bill me unke paise kate hain. Ye toh seedha dhokha hai customers ke saath.
translated_text_en: The grocery that came from the Ahmedabad branch has 5 items missing. The delivery boy said there was no stock at the shop, but I was charged for them in the bill. This is a direct fraud with customers.
reply: We apologize for the missing items. We have initiated a refund for the amount of those 5 items specifically.

complaint_text: The fiber internet connection in Chandigarh Sector 17 has been down for the last 48 hours. I work from home and I am losing billable hours because of your slow service. When will the technician arrive?
translated_text_en: The fiber internet connection in Chandigarh Sector 17 has been down for the last 48 hours. I work from home and I am losing billable hours because of your slow service. When will the technician arrive?
reply: We are sorry for the downtime. A local technician has been assigned and will resolve the line issue by 4 PM today.

complaint_text: भोपाल से मंगाई हुई साड़ी का रंग फोटो से बिलकुल अलग है। कपड़ा भी बहुत घटिया क्वालिटी का है जैसे किसी पुराने थान से काटा हो। मुझे इसे तुरंत बदलवाना है या पैसे वापस चाहिए।
translated_text_en: The color of the saree ordered from Bhopal is completely different from the photo. The fabric is also of very poor quality, like it was cut from an old bolt. I want to exchange it immediately or get my money back.
reply: हमें खेद है कि आपको उत्पाद पसंद नहीं आया। हमने एक्सचेंज रिक्वेस्ट दर्ज कर ली है, कल पिकअप हो जाएगा।

complaint_text: Noida electricity bill is double this month even though I was out of town for 15 days. Meter reading galat lag rahi hai mujhe. Please check kijiye warna itna bill bharna mere liye possible nahi hai.
translated_text_en: The Noida electricity bill is double this month even though I was out of town for 15 days. The meter reading seems wrong to me. Please check it, otherwise paying such a high bill is not possible for me.
reply: We have noted your concern. A meter inspector will visit your premises within 3 working days for re-reading.

complaint_text: My flight from Kochi to Dubai was cancelled last minute and I haven't received the promised alternative booking. I am stranded at the airport with my elderly parents. The ground staff is completely unhelpful.
translated_text_en: My flight from Kochi to Dubai was cancelled last minute and I haven't received the promised alternative booking. I am stranded at the airport with my elderly parents. The ground staff is completely unhelpful.
reply: We deeply regret the situation. We are arranging a seat on the next available flight and providing meal vouchers.

complaint_text: वाराणसी के लिए भेजा गया मेरा पार्सल १० दिनों से गायब है। ट्रैकिंग में वो दिल्ली ही दिखा रहा है और कोई जानकारी नहीं मिल रही। उसमें मेरी ज़रूरी दवाइयां थीं, कृपया इसे ट्रैक करें।
translated_text_en: My parcel sent to Varanasi has been missing for 10 days. Tracking shows it is still in Delhi and no information is available. It contained my essential medicines, please track it.
reply: दवाइयों की गंभीरता को देखते हुए हम इसे तुरंत प्रायोरिटी पर ट्रैक कर रहे हैं। आपको १ घंटे में अपडेट देंगे।

complaint_text: Indore me credit card apply kiya tha par mera limit bahut kam set kiya gaya hai. Mere documents ke hisab se limit zyada honi chahiye thi. Customer support koi clear answer nahi de raha ki aisa kyun hua.
translated_text_en: I applied for a credit card in Indore but my limit has been set very low. According to my documents, the limit should have been higher. Customer support is not giving any clear answer as to why this happened.
reply: The credit limit is decided by the automated risk system. We can re-evaluate your documents if you share your latest ITR.

complaint_text: I bought a luxury watch from your Surat outlet and it stopped working within a month. When I went for a warranty claim, they told me parts are not available. Why do you sell such expensive items if you can't repair them?
translated_text_en: I bought a luxury watch from your Surat outlet and it stopped working within a month. When I went for a warranty claim, they told me parts are not available. Why do you sell such expensive items if you can't repair them?
reply: We apologize for the inconvenience. We are shipping the required parts from our central warehouse to the Surat service center.

complaint_text: The school shoes I ordered for my son in Bhubaneswar are of the wrong size. I requested a size 5 but received a size 8. His school starts tomorrow and I don't have time to wait for a long return process.
translated_text_en: The school shoes I ordered for my son in Bhubaneswar are of the wrong size. I requested a size 5 but received a size 8. His school starts tomorrow and I don't have time to wait for a long return process.
reply: We understand the urgency. We are arranging an express exchange so you get the correct size by tomorrow morning.
